trans-unit.source: If you are comparing DOUBLEs or FLOATs with numeric decimals, it is not safe to use the equality operator.
trans-unit.target: 如果将DOUBLE或FLOAT与数字十进制数进行比较，则不安全使用相等运算符。

trans-unit.source: If you are concerned about these bugs, and you want to perform an operation that supports the INSTANT algorithm, but you want to avoid using that algorithm, then you can set the algorithm to INPLACE and add the FORCE keyword to the ALTER TABLE statement:
trans-unit.target: 如果您担心这些错误，并且想要执行支持 INSTANT 算法的操作，但又不想使用该算法，则可以将算法设置为 INPLACE ，并将 FORCE 关键字添加到 ALTER TABLE 语句中：

trans-unit.source: If you are concerned that a table may be affected by one of these bugs, then your best option would be to normalize the table structure. This can be done by rebuilding the table. For example:
trans-unit.target: 如果你担心一个表可能会受到这些错误的影响,那么你最好的选择是将表结构正常化。这可以通过重建表来实现。比如说

trans-unit.source: If you are connecting from a lot of different machines you should increase host_cache_size to the max number of machines (default 128) to cache the resolving of hostnames. If you don't connect from a lot of machines, you can set this to a very low value!
trans-unit.target: 如果从许多不同的计算机连接，则应将host_cache_size增加到最大计算机数（默认为128），以缓存主机名的解析。如果您没有从很多计算机连接，则可以将其设置为非常低的值！

trans-unit.source: If you are currently running MySQL 5.5 on Debian 8 "Jessie" and are planning an upgrade to MariaDB 10.1 on Debian 9 "Stretch", there are some things to keep in mind:
trans-unit.target: 如果您当前在Debian 8“ Jessie”上运行MySQL 5.5，并计划在Debian 9“ Stretch”上升级到MariaDB 10.1，请牢记以下几点：

trans-unit.source: If you are doing a Amazon Multi-Node install and you want the ColumnStore processes to utilize the Amazon API Tool, you will need to either Provide an IAM role that has the Certifications Keys associated with it or you can update a file locally in the AMI Instance. To add it in the local file, you will need to do the following once the AMI Instance is launched and you are logged in using the <USER> user.
trans-unit.target: 如果您正在执行Amazon Multi-Node安装，并且希望ColumnStore流程使用Amazon API工具，则需要提供一个具有与其相关的认证密钥的IAM角色，或者您可以在AMI中本地更新文件。实例。要将其添加到本地文件中，启动AMI实例并使用<USER>用户登录后，需要执行以下操作。

trans-unit.source: If you are doing a backup on the server and your tables all are MyISAM tables, consider using mysqlhotcopy instead because it can accomplish faster backups and faster restores.
trans-unit.target: 如果要在服务器上进行备份，并且所有表都是MyISAM表，请考虑使用mysqlhotcopy，因为它可以完成更快的备份和更快的还原。

trans-unit.source: If you are doing a lot of fast connections / disconnects, you should increase back_log and if you are running MariaDB 10.1 or below thread_cache_size.
trans-unit.target: 如果要进行大量快速连接/断开连接，则应增加back_log，并且如果您正在运行MariaDB 10.1或thread_cache_size以下。

trans-unit.source: If you are familiar with how sort-merge works, consider the parallels to Tokudb. Each "sort" does some work of ordering things; each "merge" is quite efficient.
trans-unit.target: 如果你熟悉 sort-merge 的工作原理,可以考虑与 Tokudb 的相似之处。每一个 "排序 "都会做一些排序的工作;每一个 "合并 "都是相当高效的。

trans-unit.source: If you are going to start/stop MariaDB a lot of times, you should create a ~/.my.cnf file for the common options you are using.
trans-unit.target: 如果您打算多次启动/停止MariaDB，则应为正在使用的常用选项创建 ~/.my.cnf 文件。

trans-unit.source: If you are having a problem creating a table after an new install is performed and you get the error "Error occurred when calling system catalog", chances are the System Catalog didnt get created by postConfigure. The call to create happens at the very end of postConfigure, so its possible that postConfigure didn't successfully complete or there was an error when trying to create it.
trans-unit.target: 如果你在执行新的安装后遇到创建表的问题,并得到 "调用系统目录时发生错误 "的错误信息,很可能是postConfigure没有创建系统目录。调用创建发生在postConfigure的最后,所以有可能是postConfigure没有成功完成,或者在尝试创建时出现了错误。

trans-unit.source: If you are installing MariaDB to replace MySQL, then you can leave out the call to mysql_install_db. Instead shut down MySQL. MariaDB should find the path to the data directory from your old /etc/my.cnf file (path may vary depending on your system).
trans-unit.target: 如果要安装MariaDB替换MySQL，则可以忽略对 mysql_install_db 的调用。而是关闭MySQL。MariaDB应该从旧的 /etc/my.cnf 文件中找到数据目录的路径（该路径可能因系统而异）。

trans-unit.source: If you are installing as a Single-Node system, you can follow install instructions on how to run postConfigure in the follow document for non-root user:
trans-unit.target: 如果你是以单节点系统的方式安装,你可以按照安装说明来运行postConfigure,在下面的文档中,非root用户。

trans-unit.source: If you are loading large tables, you might have to increase the values of net_read_timeout and net_write_timeout on both the master and slave servers. See Server System Variables.
trans-unit.target: 如果要加载大表，则可能必须在主服务器和从服务器上都增加 net_read_timeout 和 net_write_timeout 的值。请参阅服务器系统变量。

trans-unit.source: If you are not in the database directory, you can check all the tables there by specifying the path to the directory:
trans-unit.target: 如果你不在数据库目录中,你可以通过指定目录的路径来检查那里的所有表。

trans-unit.source: If you are not sure whether a statement has implicitly committed the current transaction, you can query the in_transaction server system variable.
trans-unit.target: 如果不确定语句是否隐式提交了当前事务，则可以查询in_transaction服务器系统变量。

trans-unit.source: If you are not using Amazon Web Services as your S3 provider you must also specify s3-hostname and possibly change s3-protocol-version to "Original".
trans-unit.target: 如果您没有将Amazon Web Services用作S3提供程序，则还必须指定 s3-hostname 并可能将 s3-protocol-version 更改为“ Original”。

trans-unit.source: If you are performing Mariabackup SSTs with IPv6 addresses, then the socat utility needs to be passed the pf=ip6 option. This can be done by setting the sockopt option in the [sst]option group in an option file. For example:
trans-unit.target: 如果要使用IPv6地址执行Mariabackup SST，则需要为 socat 实用程序传递 pf=ip6 选项。这可以通过在选项文件的 [sst] 选项组中设置 sockopt 选项来完成。例如：

trans-unit.source: If you are performing Percona XtraBackup SSTs with IPv6 addresses, then the socat utility needs to be passed the pf=ip6 option. This can be done by setting the sockopt option in the [sst]option group in an option file. For example:
trans-unit.target: 如果要使用IPv6地址执行Percona XtraBackup SST，则需要为 socat 实用程序传递 pf=ip6 选项。这可以通过在选项文件的 [sst] 选项组中设置 sockopt 选项来完成。例如：

trans-unit.source: If you are renaming a table, then it also requires the DROP, CREATE and INSERT privileges for the table or the database as well.
trans-unit.target: 如果要重命名表，那么它还需要表或数据库的 DROP ， CREATE 和 INSERT 特权。

trans-unit.source: If you are running MySQL or an older MariaDB, you should be aware of that if you are running the slave in binlog_format=STATEMENT mode, the slave will stop if the master is used with binlog_format set to anything else than STATEMENT.
trans-unit.target: 如果您运行的是MySQL或更旧的MariaDB，则应注意，如果您在 binlog_format=STATEMENT 模式下运行从属服务器，则在将 binlog_format 设置为 STATEMENT 以外的其他情况下使用主服务器时，从属服务器将停止运行。

trans-unit.source: If you are running an older MariaDB Galera Cluster 10.0 release that still uses Galera 2 (i.e. Galera wsrep provider versions 25.2.x), then it is recommended to first upgrade to the latest MariaDB Galera Cluster 10.0 release that uses Galera 3 (i.e. Galera wsrep provider versions 25.3.x).
trans-unit.target: 如果您运行的MariaDB Galera Cluster 10.0版本较早,且仍在使用Galera 2(即Galera wsrep provider版本25.2.x),那么建议您首先升级到使用Galera 3的最新MariaDB Galera Cluster 10.0版本(即Galera wsrep provider版本25.3.x)。

trans-unit.source: If you are running an older MariaDB Galera Cluster 5.5 release that still uses Galera 2 (i.e. Galera wsrep provider versions 25.2.x), then it is recommended to first upgrade to the latest MariaDB Galera Cluster 5.5 release that uses Galera 3 (i.e. Galera wsrep provider versions 25.3.x).
trans-unit.target: 如果您运行的MariaDB Galera Cluster 5.5版本较早,且仍在使用Galera 2(即Galera wsrep provider版本25.2.x),那么建议您首先升级到使用Galera 3的最新MariaDB Galera Cluster 5.5版本(即Galera wsrep provider版本25.3.x)。

trans-unit.source: If you are starting a slave against a fresh master that was configured for replication from the start, then you don't have to specify MASTER_LOG_FILE and MASTER_LOG_POS.
trans-unit.target: 如果要针对从一开始就配置用于复制的 MASTER_LOG_FILE 启动从属服务器，则不必指定MASTER_LOG_FILE和 MASTER_LOG_POS 。

trans-unit.source: If you are starting the server with mysqld_safe, then you can set the system time zone with the --timezone option either on the command-line or in the [mysqld_safe]option group in an option file. For example:
trans-unit.target: 如果要使用 mysqld_safe 启动服务器，则可以在命令行或选项文件的 [mysqld_safe] 选项组中使用 --timezone 选项设置系统时区。例如：

trans-unit.source: If you are trying to get a nested dynamic column as a string use 'as BINARY' as the last argument of COLUMN_GET (otherwise problems with character set conversion and illegal symbols are possible):
trans-unit.target: 如果你想获得一个嵌套的动态列作为一个字符串,请使用'as BINARY'作为COLUMN_GET的最后一个参数(否则可能会出现字符集转换和非法符号的问题)。

trans-unit.source: If you are unsure which GPG public key you need, then it is perfectly safe to import both keys.
trans-unit.target: 如果你不确定你需要的是哪一个GPG公钥,那么导入两个密钥是完全安全的。

trans-unit.source: If you are upgrading from 1.1.7 or have upgraded in the past you should run the MariaDB ColumnStore stored procedure. This updates the MariaDB FRM files by altering every ColumnStore table with a blank table comment. This will not affect options set using table comments but will erase any table comment the user has manually set.
trans-unit.target: 如果你是从1.1.7升级的,或者在过去升级过,你应该运行MariaDB ColumnStore存储过程。这将通过改变每个ColumnStore表的空白表注释来更新MariaDB FRM文件。这不会影响使用表注释设置的选项,但会删除用户手动设置的任何表注释。

trans-unit.source: If you are upgrading from the most recent MariaDB 10.1 release to MariaDB 10.2, then the versions will be compatible. Both MariaDB 10.1 and MariaDB 10.2 use Galera 3 (i.e. Galera wsrep provider versions 25.3.x), so they should be compatible.
trans-unit.target: 如果要从最新的MariaDB 10.1版本升级到MariaDB 10.2，则这些版本将兼容。无论MariaDB的10.1和MariaDB的10.2使用加莱拉3（即加莱拉wsrep提供商版本25.3.x），所以他们应该是兼容的。

trans-unit.source: If you are upgrading from the most recent MariaDB 10.2 release to MariaDB 10.3, then the versions will be compatible. Both MariaDB 10.2 and MariaDB 10.3 use Galera 3 (i.e. Galera wsrep provider versions 25.3.x), so they should be compatible.
trans-unit.target: 如果要从最新的MariaDB 10.2版本升级到MariaDB 10.3，则这些版本将兼容。无论MariaDB的10.2和MariaDB的10.3使用加莱拉3（即加莱拉wsrep提供商版本25.3.x），所以他们应该是兼容的。

trans-unit.source: If you are upgrading from the most recent MariaDB 10.3 release to MariaDB 10.4, then the versions will be compatible. MariaDB 10.3 uses Galera 3 (i.e. Galera wsrep provider versions 25.3.x), and MariaDB 10.4 uses Galera 4 (i.e. Galera wsrep provider versions 26.4.x). This means that upgrading to MariaDB 10.4 also upgrades the system to Galera 4. However, Galera 3 and Galera 4 should be compatible for the purposes of a rolling upgrade, as long as you are using Galera 26.4.2 or later.
trans-unit.target: 如果要从最新的MariaDB 10.3版本升级到MariaDB 10.4，则这些版本将兼容。MariaDB 10.3使用Galera 3（即Galera wsrep提供程序版本25.3.x），MariaDB 10.4使用Galera 4（即Galera wsrep提供程序版本26.4.x）。这意味着升级到MariaDB 10.4也会将系统升级到Galera4。但是，只要您使用的是Galera 26.4.2或更高版本，Galera 3和Galera 4就应该兼容，以进行滚动升级。

trans-unit.source: If you are upgrading from the most recent MariaDB Galera Cluster 10.0 release to MariaDB 10.1, then the versions will be compatible. The latest releases of MariaDB Galera Cluster 10.0 and all releases of MariaDB 10.1 use Galera 3 (i.e. Galera wsrep provider versions 25.3.x), so they should be compatible.
trans-unit.target: 如果您要从最新的MariaDB Galera Cluster 10.0版本升级到MariaDB 10.1，则这些版本将兼容。MariaDB Galera Cluster 10.0的最新版本和MariaDB 10.1的所有版本都使用Galera 3（即Galera wsrep提供程序版本25.3.x），因此它们应该兼容。

trans-unit.source: If you are upgrading from the most recent MariaDB Galera Cluster 5.5 release to MariaDB Galera Cluster 10.0, then the versions will be compatible. The latest releases of MariaDB Galera Cluster 5.5 and MariaDB Galera Cluster 10.0 use Galera 3 (i.e. Galera wsrep provider versions 25.3.x), so they should be compatible.
trans-unit.target: 如果你是从最新的MariaDB Galera Cluster 5.5版本升级到MariaDB Galera Cluster 10.0,那么这两个版本将是兼容的。最新版本的MariaDB Galera Cluster 5.5和MariaDB Galera Cluster 10.0使用Galera 3(即Galera wsrep provider版本25.3.x),所以它们应该是兼容的。

trans-unit.source: If you are using MariaDB Galera Cluster, then keep in mind that the first node will have to be bootstrapped.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用的是MariaDB Galera Cluster，则请记住，第一个节点必须被引导。

trans-unit.source: If you are using MariaDB Galera Cluster, then you may want to try one of the following pages instead:
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用的是MariaDB Galera Cluster，则可能需要尝试以下页面之一：

trans-unit.source: If you are using MariaDB MaxScale proxy, then you can use MaxScale to handle the whole process of taking down the master and replacing it with one of the slaves.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用的是MariaDB MaxScale proxy，则可以使用MaxScale来处理拆除主服务器并将其替换为从服务器之一的整个过程。

trans-unit.source: If you are using multi-source replication and if you would like to make this filter persist server restarts by adding it to a server option group in an option file, then the option file can also include the connection name that each filter would apply to. For example:
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用的是多源复制，并且希望通过将此持久过滤器添加到选项文件中的服务器选项组中来使服务器重新启动，那么该选项文件还可以包含每个过滤器将应用到的连接名称。例如：

trans-unit.source: If you are using multi-source replication, then you need to specify a connection name when you execute CHANGE MASTER. There are two ways to do this:
trans-unit.target: 如果使用的是多源复制，则在执行 CHANGE MASTER 时需要指定一个连接名称。有两种方法可以做到这一点：

trans-unit.source: If you are using mysqldump for state transfer, and it failed for whatever reason (e.g. you do not have the database account it attempts to connect with, or it does not have necessary permissions), you will see an SQL SYNTAX error in the server error log. Don't let it fool you, this is just a fancy way to deliver a message (the pseudo-statement inside of the bogus SQL will actually contain the error message).
trans-unit.target: 如果您正在使用mysqldump进行状态传输，并且由于某种原因而失败（例如，您没有尝试与其连接的数据库帐户，或者它没有必要的权限），则服务器错误中将显示SQL SYNTAX 错误日志。不要让它愚弄您，这只是一种传递消息的好方法（伪SQL内部的伪语句实际上将包含错误消息）。

trans-unit.source: If you are using SELinux, then you may also need to set the SELinux context for the directory. See SELinux: Setting the File Context for Log Files for more information. For example:
trans-unit.target: 如果使用SELinux，则可能还需要为目录设置SELinux上下文。有关更多信息，请参见SELinux：设置日志文件的文件上下文。例如：

trans-unit.source: If you are using Semisynchronous Replication you can just stop the server with the SHUTDOWN command as the slaves should be automatically up to date.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用的是半同步复制，则只需使用SHUTDOWN命令停止服务器，因为从属服务器应自动更新。

trans-unit.source: If you are using MariaDB 10.2, then you would need to install Percona XtraBackup 2.4:
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用的是MariaDB 10.2，则需要安装Percona XtraBackup 2.4：

trans-unit.source: If you are using MariaDB 10.3 or earlier, you should checkout mariadb-3.x instead.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用的是MariaDB 10.3或更早版本，则应 mariadb-3.x 。

trans-unit.source: If you are using mysqld_safe to start mysqld, then see the instructions at mysqld_safe: Configuring the Core File Size.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用 mysqld_safe 启动 mysqld ，请参见mysqld_safe上的说明：配置核心文件大小。

trans-unit.source: If you are using mysqld_safe to start mysqld, then see the instructions at mysqld_safe: Configuring the Open Files Limit.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用 mysqld_safe 启动 mysqld ，请参见mysqld_safe上的说明：配置打开文件数限制。

trans-unit.source: If you are using systemd to start mysqld, then see the instructions at systemd: Configuring the Core File Size.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用 systemd 启动 mysqld ，请参见systemd：配置核心文件大小中的说明。

trans-unit.source: If you are using systemd to start mysqld, then see the instructions at systemd: Configuring the Open Files Limit.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用 systemd 启动 mysqld ，请参见systemd上的说明：配置打开文件数限制。

trans-unit.target: 如果您使用 systemd ，那么有一些有关启动失败的注意事项：

trans-unit.source: If you are using MIT Kerberos KDC, then you can create a keytab file using the kadmin utility. To do so, follow the steps listed below.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用的是MIT Kerberos KDC，则可以使用 kadmin 实用程序创建密钥表文件。这样做，请按照下面列出的步骤。

trans-unit.source: If you are using Microsoft Active Directory KDC, then you may need to create a keytab using the ktpass.exe utility on a Windows host. The service principal will need to be mapped to an existing domain user. To do so, follow the steps listed below.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用的是Microsoft Active Directory KDC，则可能需要使用Windows主机上的 ktpass.exe 实用程序来创建密钥表。服务主体将需要映射到现有域用户。这样做，请按照下面列出的步骤。

trans-unit.source: If you are using CONNECT to analyze files that can be modified by an external process, the indexes are of course not modified by it and become outdated. Use the OPTIMIZE TABLE command to update them before using the tables based on them.
trans-unit.target: 如果你使用CONNECT来分析可以被外部进程修改的文件,索引当然不会被它修改而变得过时。在使用基于它们的表之前,使用OPTIMIZE TABLE命令更新它们。

trans-unit.source: If you are using DirectAdmin and you encounter any issues with Installing MariaDB with YUM, then the directions below may help. The process is very straightforward.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用的是DirectAdmin，并且在使用YUM安装MariaDB时遇到任何问题，那么以下说明可能会有所帮助。这个过程非常简单。

trans-unit.source: If you are using LIMIT, then in case of >= or > then there is an implicit NEXT implied, while if you are using <= or < then there is an implicit PREV implied.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用LIMIT，则在> =或>的情况下隐含NEXT，而如果使用<=或<则隐含的PREV。

trans-unit.source: If you are using Linux and if you installed MariaDB with a package manager, then MariaDB's files will probably be owned by the mysql user and the mysql group.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用的是Linux，并且使用包管理器安装了MariaDB，则MariaDB的文件可能归 mysql 用户和 mysql 组所有。

trans-unit.source: If you are using MySQL 8.0 or above, you have to use mysqldump to move your database to MariaDB.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用的是MySQL 8.0或更高版本，则必须使用mysqldump将数据库移至MariaDB。

trans-unit.target: 如果您将Spider与复制一起使用，则可以通过将slave_transaction_retry_errors设置为以下内容来避免网络问题，从而扩展要重试的事务错误的列表：

trans-unit.source: If you are using Windows, then you will need to import pre-populated time zone tables. Some are available at MySQL's documentation.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用Windows，则需要导入预填充的时区表。有些可以在MySQL的文档中找到。

trans-unit.source: If you are using Windows, then you will need to import pre-populated time zone tables. Some are available at MySQL's documentation.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用Windows，则需要导入预填充的时区表。有些可以在MySQL的文档中找到。

trans-unit.source: If you are using a SAN for storage, the following must be taken into account:
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用SAN进行存储,必须考虑到以下因素。

trans-unit.source: If you are using a SAN to store the database files, an ‘users‘ option will need to be added to the fstab entries (by the root user). For more information, please see the “SAN Mounted Database Files” section earlier in this guide.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用SAN存储数据库文件，则需要（由root用户）将“用户”选项添加到fstab条目中。有关更多信息，请参阅本指南前面的“ SAN挂载的数据库文件”部分。

trans-unit.source: If you are using a SAN to store the database files, the following must be taken into account:
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用SAN存储数据库文件,必须考虑到以下几点。

trans-unit.source: If you are using a Unix-like operating system, then you can populate these tables using the mysql_tzinfo_to_sql utility, which uses the zoneinfo data available on Linux, Mac OS X, FreeBSD and Solaris.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用的是类似Unix的操作系统，则可以使用 mysql_tzinfo_to_sql 实用程序填充这些表，该实用程序使用Linux，Mac OS X，FreeBSD和Solaris上可用的 zoneinfo 数据。

trans-unit.source: If you are using a Unix-like operating system, then you can set the system time zone by setting the TZenvironment variable in your shell before starting the server. For example:

trans-unit.source: If you are using a log of on-disk temporary tables, increase the above to as much as you can afford. See Aria Storage Engine for more details.

trans-unit.target: 如果您正在使用最新版本的 mysqldump 生成转储以重新加载到非常老的MySQL服务器中，则不应使用 --opt 或 --extended-insert 选项。请改用 --skip-opt 。

trans-unit.target: 如果您正在使用Puppet之类的配置管理，您将很高兴地注意到，有多个Puppet模块可让您使用MariaDB。

trans-unit.source: If you are using internal storage, the DBRoot directories will be created under the installation directory, for example /usr/local/mariadb/columnstore/data<N> where N is the DBRoot number. There is no performance gain from assigning more than one DBRoot to a single storage device.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用内部存储，则将在安装目录下创建DBRoot目录，例如/ usr / local / mariadb / columnstore / data <N>，其中N是DBRoot编号。将多个DBRoot分配给单个存储设备不会提高性能。

trans-unit.source: If you are using local disk to store the database files, the DBRoot directories will be created under the installation directory, for example /usr/local/mariadb/columnstore/data<N> where N is the DBRoot number. You should setup to have 1 DBRoot per Performance Module when configuring the system.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用本地磁盘存储数据库文件，则将在安装目录下创建DBRoot目录，例如/ usr / local / mariadb / columnstore / data <N>，其中N是DBRoot编号。配置系统时，应设置每个性能模块具有1个DBRoot。

trans-unit.source: If you are using rsync for state transfer, and a node crashes before the state transfer is over, rsync process might hang forever, occupying the port and not allowing to restart the node. The problem will show up as 'port in use' in the server error log. Find the orphan rsync process and kill it manually.
trans-unit.target: 如果你使用rsync进行状态传输,而节点在状态传输结束前崩溃,rsync进程可能会永远挂起,占用端口,不允许重新启动节点。这个问题会在服务器错误日志中显示为 "使用中的端口"。找到rsync孤儿进程并手动杀死它。

trans-unit.source: If you are using statement-based logging (the default) the output includes the SQL statement, the ID of the server the statement was executed on, a timestamp, and how much time the statement took to execute. If you are using row-based logging the output of an event will not include an SQL statement but will instead output how individual rows were changed.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用基于语句的日志记录(默认),输出包括SQL语句、语句执行的服务器ID、时间戳以及语句执行的时间。如果使用基于行的日志记录,事件的输出将不包括SQL语句,而是输出各个行的变化情况。

trans-unit.source: If you are using this option with --check, it will ensure that the table is 100 percent consistent, but will take a long time. If you are using this option with --repair, it will force using the old, slow, repair with keycache method, instead of the much faster repair by sorting.
trans-unit.target: 如果将此选项与 --check 一起使用，它将确保该表是100％一致的，但是会花费很长时间。如果将此选项与 --repair 一起使用，它将强制使用旧的，缓慢的，通过keycache方法进行修复，而不是通过排序进行的修复快得多。

trans-unit.source: If you are using this option with CHECK TABLE, it prevents the check from scanning the rows to check for wrong links. This is the fastest check. If you are using this option with REPAIR TABLE, it will try to repair only the index tree. This is the fastest repair method for a table.
trans-unit.target: 如果你使用这个选项和CHECK TABLE一起使用,它可以防止检查扫描行来检查错误的链接。这是最快的检查方法。如果这个选项和REPAIR TABLE一起使用,它将只尝试修复索引树。这是最快的表的修复方法。

trans-unit.source: If you change my.cnf then you need to restart mysqld
trans-unit.target: 如果更改 my.cnf ,则需要重新启动 mysqld

trans-unit.source: If you change my.cnf then you need to restart mysqld with e.g. sudo service mysql restart or sudo service mariadb restart.
trans-unit.target: 如果更改 my.cnf ,则需要使用 sudo service mysql restart 或 sudo service mariadb restart 重新启动 mysqld 。

trans-unit.source: If you change the table-level starting autoincrement value to a value higher than any value in the table, ColumnStore will begin using that new value on the next insert or update (and possibly introduce a gap in the numbers).
trans-unit.target: 如果你把表级的起始自动递增值改成比表中任何值都高的值,ColumnStore将在下一次插入或更新时开始使用这个新值(可能会在数字中引入一个间隙)。

trans-unit.source: If you change the value to a value lower than any value in the table, ColumnStore will still begin using that new value on subsequent inserts and updates, and thus duplicates will be created. No error or warning will be issued in either case.
trans-unit.target: 如果将该值改为比表中任何值都低的值,ColumnStore仍将在随后的插入和更新中开始使用该新值,因此会创建重复的值。在这两种情况下,都不会发出错误或警告。

trans-unit.target: 如果您通过使用MariaDB软件包存储库设置脚本将 zypper 配置为从MariaDB公司的MariaDB软件包存储库安装，则可以通过再次运行脚本来更新存储库使用的主要版本。

trans-unit.source: If you configured zypper to install from MariaDB Foundation's MariaDB Repository by using the MariaDB Repository Configuration Tool, then you can update the major release that the repository uses by removing the repository for the old version and adding the repository for the new version.
trans-unit.target: 如果您通过使用MariaDB存储库配置工具将 zypper 配置为从MariaDB Foundation的MariaDB存储库安装，则可以通过删除旧版本的存储库并添加新版本的存储库来更新存储库使用的主要版本。

trans-unit.source: If you connect as joffrey from 192.168.0.3, you will have the SELECT privilege on the table test.t1, but not on the table test.t2. If you connect as joffrey from any other IP address, you will have the SELECT privilege on the table test.t2, but not on the table test.t1.
trans-unit.target: 如果您以 192.168.0.3 的 joffrey身份连接，则将对表 test.t1 拥有 SELECT 特权，但对表 test.t2 则没有选择特权。如果您以joffrey的身份从任何其他IP地址进行连接，则将在表 test.t2 上具有 SELECT 特权，而在表 test.t1 上则没有。

trans-unit.target: 如果将非确定性函数声明为 DETERMINISTIC ，则可能会得到错误的结果。如果将确定性函数声明为 NOT DETERMINISTIC ，则在某些情况下查询会变慢。

trans-unit.source: If you do an ALTER TABLE, all your HANDLER's for that table are automatically closed.
trans-unit.target: 如果您执行ALTER TABLE，则该表的所有HANDLER都会自动关闭。

trans-unit.source: If you do an ALTER TABLE for a table that is used by some other connection with HANDLER, the ALTER TABLE will wait for the HANDLER to be closed.
trans-unit.target: 如果你为一个表做了ALTER TABLE,而这个表是由其他一些带有HANDLER的连接使用的,那么ALTER TABLE将等待HANDLER被关闭。

trans-unit.source: If you do edit mysqld_safe, then you should be aware of the fact that a package upgrade can overwrite your changes. If you would like to preserve your changes, be sure to have a backup.
trans-unit.target: 如果您确实编辑了 mysqld_safe ，那么您应该意识到软件包升级会覆盖您的更改。如果您想保留更改，请确保进行备份。

trans-unit.source: If you do not have the ODBC library installed, then you may get an error about a missing library when you attempt to install the plugin. For example:
trans-unit.target: 如果你没有安装ODBC库,那么当你试图安装插件时,你可能会得到一个关于缺少库的错误。比如说,如果你没有安装ODBC库,那么当你试图安装插件时,你可能会得到一个关于缺少库的错误信息。

trans-unit.source: If you do not have the SUPER privilege, the only legal user value is your own account, either specified literally or by using CURRENT_USER. You cannot set the definer to some other account.
trans-unit.target: 如果您没有 SUPER 权限,唯一合法的用户值是您自己的帐户,可以按字面意思或使用 CURRENT_USER 指定。您不能将定义器设置为其他账户。

trans-unit.source: If you do not name any tables following db_name or if you use the --databases or --all-databases option, entire databases are dumped.
trans-unit.target: 如果未在db_name之后命名任何表，或者使用 --databases 或 --all-databases 选项，则将转储整个数据库。

trans-unit.source: If you do not specify a password with the IDENTIFIED BY clause, the user will be able to connect without a password. A blank password is not a wildcard to match any password. The user must connect without providing a password if no password is set.
trans-unit.target: 如果未使用 IDENTIFIED BY 子句指定密码，则用户将无需密码即可连接。空密码不是与任何密码匹配的通配符。如果未设置密码，则用户必须在不提供密码的情况下进行连接。

trans-unit.source: If you do not use systemd, you may have to start MariaDB using some other mechanism.
trans-unit.target: 如果你不使用systemd,你可能需要使用其他机制来启动MariaDB。

trans-unit.source: If you do not want MariaDB to use all CPUs on the system for some reason, then you can set it to a lower value than the number of CPUs. For example, this would make sense if the MariaDB Server process is limited to certain CPUs with the taskset utility on Linux.
trans-unit.target: 如果出于某种原因不希望MariaDB使用系统上的所有CPU，则可以将其设置为比CPU数量低的值。例如，如果在Linux上使用 taskset 实用程序将MariaDB Server进程限于某些CPU，这将很有意义。

trans-unit.source: If you do not want to automatically encrypt every InnoDB table, then it is possible to manually enable encryption for just the subset of InnoDB tables that you would like to encrypt. MariaDB provides the ENCRYPTED and ENCRYPTION_KEY_ID table options that can be used to manually enable encryption for specific InnoDB tables. These table options can be used with CREATE TABLE and ALTER TABLE statements. These table options can only be used with InnoDB tables that have their own InnoDB's file-per-table tablespaces, meaning that tables that were created with innodb_file_per_table=ON set.
trans-unit.target: 如果您不想自动加密每个InnoDB表，则可以仅对要加密的InnoDB表的子集手动启用加密。 MariaDB提供了 ENCRYPTED 和 ENCRYPTION_KEY_ID 表选项，可用于为特定的InnoDB表手动启用加密。这些表选项可以与 CREATE TABLE 和 ALTER TABLE 语句一起使用。这些表选项只能与具有自己的InnoDB的每表文件表空间的 InnoDB表一起使用，这意味着使用 innodb_file_per_table=ON 设置的表将被设置。

trans-unit.source: If you execute many statements that don't affect any rows, then row-based logging will be more efficient than statement-based logging for the slave to download.
trans-unit.target: 如果你执行了很多不影响任何行的语句,那么基于行的日志记录将比基于语句的日志记录更高效的从属下载。

trans-unit.source: If you execute single statements that update many rows, then statement-based logging will be more efficient than row-based logging for the slave to download.
trans-unit.target: 如果你执行的是更新很多行的单条语句,那么基于语句的日志记录将比基于行的日志记录更高效的从属下载。

trans-unit.source: If you execute statements that take a long time to complete, but they ultimately only insert, update, or delete a few rows in the table, then row-based logging will be more efficient than statement-based logging for the slave to apply.
trans-unit.target: 如果你执行的语句需要很长时间才能完成,但它们最终只是在表中插入、更新或删除几行,那么基于行的日志记录将比基于语句的日志记录对从机应用更有效。

trans-unit.target: 如果你执行查询。

trans-unit.source: If you find any issues with any of the default behavior, then we encourage you to submit a bug report.
trans-unit.target: 如果您发现任何默认行为的问题，我们建议您提交错误报告。

trans-unit.source: If you get an error like [ERROR] /usr/libexec/mysqld: Out of memory (Needed xxx bytes), it probably means that MySQL exceeded what the OS is willing to give it. Decrease the cache settings.
trans-unit.target: 如果出现类似 [ERROR] /usr/libexec/mysqld: Out of memory (Needed xxx bytes) ，则可能意味着MySQL超出了操作系统愿意提供的数量。减少缓存设置。

trans-unit.source: If you get errors such as:
trans-unit.target: 如果你得到的错误,如。

trans-unit.source: If you get the error:
trans-unit.target: 如果你得到的错误。

trans-unit.source: If you get this for HANDLER OPEN it means the storage engine doesn't support HANDLER calls.
trans-unit.target: 如果你的HANDLER OPEN出现这种情况,说明存储引擎不支持HANDLER调用。

trans-unit.source: If you get this for HANDLER READ it means you are trying to use an incomplete HASH key.
trans-unit.target: 如果你的HANDLER READ出现这种情况,说明你正试图使用一个不完整的HASH键。

trans-unit.source: If you get to the point where it says Starting system processes, but it seems to hang or not return. Here are some things to check:
trans-unit.target: 如果你到了说启动系统进程,但似乎挂起或不返回。这里有一些事情需要检查。

trans-unit.source: If you have many concurrent, long, non-yielding queries, then the thread pool may not work well for you. In this context, a "non-yielding" query is one that never waits or which does not indicate waits to the thread pool. These kinds of workloads are mostly used in data warehouse scenarios. Long-running, non-yielding queries will delay execution of other queries. However, the thread pool has stall detection to prevent them from totally monopolizing the thread pool. See Thread Groups in the Unix Implementation of the Thread Pool: Thread Group Stalls for more information. Even when the whole thread pool is blocked by non-yielding queries, you can still connect to the server through the extra-port TCP/IP port.
trans-unit.target: 如果您有许多并发的，长的，不屈服的查询，则线程池可能对您而言效果不佳。在这种情况下，“不屈服”查询是从不等待或不表示等待线程池的查询。这些工作负载主要用于数据仓库场景。长时间运行且不屈服的查询将延迟其他查询的执行。但是，线程池具有停滞检测功能，以防止它们完全垄断线程池。有关更多信息，请参见“线程池的Unix实现：线程组停顿”中的线程组。即使整个线程池被非屈服的查询所阻塞，您仍然可以通过 extra-port TCP / IP端口连接到服务器。

trans-unit.source: If you have Windows 10 Creators update installed, then you can install the Ubuntu 16 installation into the bash console. Please follow the Ubuntu instructions in getting started. If you have recently upgraded and had bash installed previously, ensure you uninstall and reinstall bash first to have a clean Ubuntu16 version. Note that ColumnStore will be terminated should you terminate the bash console.
trans-unit.target: 如果您已经安装了Windows 10 Creators更新,那么您可以将Ubuntu 16安装到bash控制台中。请按照Ubuntu的说明开始安装。如果你最近升级过,并且之前安装过bash,请确保你先卸载并重新安装bash,以获得一个干净的Ubuntu16版本。请注意,如果你终止了bash控制台,ColumnStore将被终止。

trans-unit.source: If you have a master-slave setup, the normal procedure is to first upgrade your slaves to MariaDB, then move one of your slaves to be the master and then upgrade your original master. In this scenario you can upgrade from MySQL to MariaDB or upgrade later to a new version of MariaDB without any downtime.
trans-unit.target: 如果您具有主从设置，通常的过程是先将您的从服务器升级到MariaDB，然后将其中一个从服务器移为主服务器，然后再升级原始主服务器。在这种情况下，您可以从MySQL升级到MariaDB，或稍后升级到新版本的MariaDB，而无需停机。

trans-unit.source: If you have a very bursty workload, then the thread pool may not work well for you. These tend to be workloads in which there are long periods of inactivity followed by short periods of very high activity by many users. These also tend to be workloads in which delays cannot be tolerated, so the throttling of thread creation that the thread pool uses is not ideal. Even in this situation, performance can be improved by tweaking how often threads are retired. For example, with thread_pool_idle_timeout on Unix, or with thread_pool_min_threads on Windows.
trans-unit.target: 如果您的工作量非常繁重，则线程池可能对您而言效果不佳。这些往往是工作量，其中许多用户长时间处于不活动状态，随后处于短暂的高活动状态。这些也往往是无法容忍延迟的工作负载，因此线程池使用的线程创建限制并不理想。即使在这种情况下，也可以通过调整线程退役的频率来提高性能。例如， thread_pool_idle_timeout 在Unix，或者 thread_pool_min_threads 在Windows上。

trans-unit.source: If you have a LOT of connections (> 100) that mostly run short running queries, you should consider using the thread pool. For example using : thread_handling=pool-of-threads and thread_pool_size=128 could give a notable performance boost in this case. Where the thread_pool_size should be about 2 * number of cores on your machine.
trans-unit.target: 如果您有很多连接（> 100），它们大多运行短期查询，则应考虑使用线程池。例如，在这种情况下，使用： thread_handling=pool-of-threads 和 thread_pool_size=128 可以显着提高性能。其中 thread_pool_size 应为 2 * number of cores on your machine 大约2 *。

trans-unit.source: If you have a lot (> 128) of simultaneous running fast queries, you should consider setting thread_handling to pool_of_threads.
trans-unit.target: 如果您有大量（> 128）同时运行的快速查询，则应考虑将thread_handling设置为 pool_of_threads 。

trans-unit.source: If you have a mixture of engines, lower both numbers.
trans-unit.target: 如果你有混合动力的发动机,请降低这两个数字。

trans-unit.target: 如果您对 mysql_upgrade 有问题，请尝试以非常详细的模式运行它：

trans-unit.source: If you have been using MariaDB Galera Cluster 5.5 or 10.0 on Debian 8 "Jessie" it is worth mentioning that Galera Cluster is included by default in MariaDB 10.1, there is no longer a need to install a separate mariadb-galera-server package.
trans-unit.target: 如果您在Debian 8“ Jessie”上使用过MariaDB Galera Cluster 5.5或10.0，那么值得一提的是，默认情况下，MariaDB 10.1中包括了Galera Cluster，不再需要安装单独的 mariadb-galera-server 软件包。

trans-unit.source: If you have both the MariaDB client package and the MySQL client packages installed this error will happen if your system finds the MySQL version of libmysqlclient.so first.
trans-unit.target: 如果同时安装了MariaDB客户端软件包和MySQL客户端软件包，并且系统先找到 libmysqlclient.so 的MySQL版本，则会发生此错误。

trans-unit.source: If you have bulk inserts (Batch INSERT or LOAD DATA) then consider doing the normalization and summarization immediately after each bulk insert.
trans-unit.target: 如果你有批量插入(Batch INSERT或LOAD DATA),那么可以考虑在每次批量插入后立即进行归一化和汇总。

trans-unit.source: If you have comments or suggestions on things we can add or change to improve this page. Please add them as comments below.
trans-unit.target: 如果你有意见或建议,我们可以添加或改变的东西,以改善这个页面。请在下面添加评论。

trans-unit.source: If you have installed MariaDB 5.5 or MariaDB 10.0 on your Debian 8 "Jessie" machine from the MariaDB repositories you will need to upgrade to MariaDB 10.1 when upgrading to Debian 9 "Stretch". You can choose to continue using the MariaDB repositories or move to using the Debian repositories.
trans-unit.target: 如果您已从MariaDB存储库中的Debian 8“ Jessie”计算机上安装了MariaDB 5.5或MariaDB 10.0，则在升级到Debian 9“ Stretch”时需要升级到MariaDB 10.1。您可以选择继续使用MariaDB存储库，也可以选择使用Debian存储库。

trans-unit.source: If you have installed MariaDB to a non-standard location, then you may need to edit the mysql.server script to get it to work right.
trans-unit.target: 如果您已将MariaDB安装到非标准位置，则可能需要编辑 mysql.server 脚本以使其正常工作。

trans-unit.source: If you have just compiled MariaDB from source, and if you want to use mysql_install_db from your source tree, then that can be done without having to actually install MariaDB. This is very useful if you want to test your changes to MariaDB without disturbing any existing installations of MariaDB.
trans-unit.target: 如果您刚刚从source编译了MariaDB，并且想要从源代码树中使用 mysql_install_db ，那么无需实际安装MariaDB即可完成。如果您想测试对MariaDB的更改而又不干扰任何现有的MariaDB安装，这将非常有用。

trans-unit.source: If you have lots of SELECTs and they generate lots of INDEXes, this may cause a different problem. Each index must be updated (sooner or later) for each INSERT. More indexes ⇒ slower INSERTs. Limit the number of indexes on a table to about 6 (Rule of Thumb).
trans-unit.target: 如果您有很多SELECT，并且它们生成许多INDEX，则可能会导致其他问题。必须为每个INSERT更新（较早或更晚）每个索引。索引更多⇒插入速度较慢。将表上的索引数限制为大约6（经验法则）。

trans-unit.source: If you have made code changes and want to increase the version number or tag our version with a specific tag you can do this by editing the VERSION file. Tags are shown when running the 'mysqld --version' command.
trans-unit.target: 如果您更改了代码并想要增加版本号或使用特定标签标记我们的版本，则可以通过编辑 VERSION 文件来完成。运行“ mysqld --version ”命令时显示标签。

trans-unit.source: If you have many threads simultaneously INSERTing into one staging table, then here is an efficient way to handle a large load: Have a process that flips that staging table with another, identical, staging table, and performs bulk normalization, Fact insertion, and bulk summarization.
trans-unit.target: 如果你有很多线程同时insert到一个暂存表中,那么这里有一个有效的方法来处理大负载。建立一个进程,用另一个相同的暂存表翻转该暂存表,并执行批量归一化,事实插入和批量汇总。

trans-unit.source: If you have multiple Inserters and a single Staging table, InnoDB is desirable due to row-level, not table-level, locking.
trans-unit.target: 如果你有多个Inserters和一个Staging表,InnoDB是可取的,因为行级而不是表级的锁定。

trans-unit.source: If you have multiple instances of MariaDB, then you may also want to set SyslogIdentifier with a different tag for each instance.
trans-unit.target: 如果您有多个MariaDB实例，则可能还需要为每个实例使用不同的标签设置 SyslogIdentifier 。

trans-unit.source: If you have no privileges for a base table or view, it does not show up in the output from SHOW TABLES or mysqlshow db_name.
trans-unit.target: 如果您没有基表或视图的特权，则它不会显示在 SHOW TABLES 或 mysqlshow db_name 的输出中。

trans-unit.source: If you have performance problems with the S3 engine, here are some things you can try:
trans-unit.target: 如果你的S3发动机有性能问题,这里有一些事情你可以尝试。

trans-unit.source: If you have problems due to insufficient memory for large result sets, use the --quick option. This forces mysql to retrieve results from the server a row at a time rather than retrieving the entire result set and buffering it in memory before displaying it. This is done by returning the result set using the mysql_use_result() C API function in the client/server library rather than mysql_store_result().
trans-unit.target: 如果由于大结果集的内存不足而遇到问题，请使用 --quick 选项。这迫使mysql一次一次从服务器检索结果，而不是检索整个结果集并在显示之前将其缓冲在内存中。这是通过使用客户端/服务器库中的 mysql_use_result() C API函数而不是 mysql_store_result() 返回结果集来完成的。

trans-unit.source: If you have problems with the above gunzip command line, you can instead, if you have gnu tar, do:
trans-unit.target: 如果你在使用上面的gunzip命令行时遇到问题,你可以代替,如果你有gnu tar,可以这样做。

trans-unit.source: If you have root access to the system, you probably want to install MariaDB under the user and group 'mysql' (to keep compatibility with MySQL installations):
trans-unit.target: 如果你有系统的root权限,你可能想在用户和组'mysql'下安装MariaDB(以保持与MySQL安装的兼容性)。

trans-unit.source: If you have run a FLUSH TABLES statement and not accessed the table using SQL from that time until the tables have been copied.
trans-unit.target: 如果您已经运行了 FLUSH TABLES 语句，并且从那时起直到使用完表之后才使用SQL访问该表。

trans-unit.source: If you have specified a root database password (which is good practice), then you must configure a .my.cnf file with user credentials for the upgrade process to use. Create a .my.cnf file in the user home directory with 600 file permissions with the following content (updating PASSWORD as appropriate):

trans-unit.source: If you have specified a root user database password (which is good practice), then you must configure a .my.cnf file with user credentials for the upgrade process to use. Create a .my.cnf file in the user home directory with 600 file permissions with the following content (updating PASSWORD as appropriate):
trans-unit.target: 如果你已经指定了根用户数据库密码(这是一个很好的做法),那么你必须配置一个.my.cnf文件,其中包含用户凭证,供升级过程使用。在用户主目录下创建一个600文件权限的.my.cnf文件,内容如下(根据情况更新PASSWORD)。

trans-unit.source: If you have specified a root user database password (which is good practice), then you must configure a .my.cnf file with user credentials for the upgrade process to use. Create a .my.cnf file in the user home directory, which is /root for root install and /home/'user' for non-root install. Set 600 as the file permissions with the following content (updating PASSWORD as appropriate):

trans-unit.source: If you have the PROCESS privilege, you can see all threads. If you have the SUPER privilege, you can kill all threads and statements. Otherwise, you can see and kill only your own threads and statements.
trans-unit.target: 如果您具有 PROCESS 特权，则可以看到所有线程。如果您具有 SUPER 特权，则可以杀死所有线程和语句。否则，您只能看到并杀死自己的线程和语句。

trans-unit.source: If you have the SUPER privilege, you can specify any syntactically legal account name. If the account does not actually exist, a warning is generated.
trans-unit.target: 如果你有超级权限,你可以指定任何语法上合法的账户名。如果账户实际上并不存在,则会产生一个警告。

trans-unit.source: If you have tried everything here, and still need help, you can ask for help on IRC or on the forums - see Where to find other MariaDB users and developers - or ask a question at the Starting and Stopping MariaDB page.
trans-unit.target: 如果您在这里尝试了所有操作后仍然需要帮助，则可以在IRC或论坛上寻求帮助-请参阅在何处查找其他MariaDB用户和开发人员 -或在“ 启动和停止MariaDB”页面上提问。

trans-unit.source: If you have trouble making the module, you can post an issue on JIRA.
trans-unit.target: 如果您在制作模块时遇到问题，可以在JIRA上发布问题。

trans-unit.source: If you have turned on binary logging (via log_bin) for replication and/or point-in-time recovery, the system will create binary logs forever. That is, they can slowly fill up the disk. Suggest setting expire_logs_days = 14 to keep only 14 days' worth of logs.
trans-unit.target: 如果您已打开二进制日志记录（通过log_bin）以进行复制和/或时间点恢复，则系统将永久创建二进制日志。也就是说，它们可以缓慢填满磁盘。建议设置expire_logs_days = 14，以仅保留14天的日志。

trans-unit.source: If you have two or more XA-capable storage engines enabled, then a transaction coordinator log must be available.
trans-unit.target: 如果您启用了两个或两个以上的XA功能存储引擎,那么必须有一个事务协调器日志。

trans-unit.source: If you haven't yet imported the MariaDB GPG public key, then yum will prompt you to import it after it downloads the packages, but before it prompts you to install them.
trans-unit.target: 如果尚未导入MariaDB GPG公钥，则 yum 将在下载软件包之后但提示您安装它们之前提示您导入它。

trans-unit.source: If you haven't yet imported the MariaDB GPG public key, then zypper will prompt you to import it after it downloads the packages, but before it prompts you to install them.
trans-unit.target: 如果尚未导入MariaDB GPG公共密钥，则 zypper 将在下载软件包之后但提示您安装它们之前提示您导入它。

trans-unit.source: If you insist on EAV, set optimizer_search_depth=1.
trans-unit.target: 如果您坚持使用EAV，请设置optimizer_search_depth = 1。

trans-unit.source: If you install MariaDB from source or from a binary tarball that does not install mysql.server automatically, and if you are on a system that uses sysVinit, then you can manually install mysql.server with sysVinit. See mysql.server: Manually Installing with SysVinit for more information.
trans-unit.target: 如果从安装MariaDB的来源或从二进制压缩包，不安装 mysql.server 的自动的，如果您是使用一个系统上的SysVinit，这时你可以手动安装 mysql.server 的与sysvinit的。有关更多信息，请参见mysql.server：使用SysVinit手动安装。

trans-unit.source: If you install MariaDB from source or from a binary tarball that does not install mysql.server automatically, and if you are on a system that uses sysVinit, then you can manually install mysql.server with sysVinit. This is usually done by copying it to /etc/init.d/ and then creating specially named symlinks in the appropriate /etc/rcX.d/ directories (where 'X' is a number between 0 and 6).
trans-unit.target: 如果从安装MariaDB的来源或从二进制压缩包，不安装 mysql.server 的自动的，如果您是使用一个系统上的SysVinit，这时你可以手动安装 mysql.server 的与sysvinit的。这通常是通过将其复制到 /etc/init.d/ ，然后在适当的 /etc/rcX.d/ 目录（其中“ X”是介于0和6之间的数字）中创建专门命名的符号链接来完成的。

trans-unit.source: If you install MariaDB locally (say from a tarball), you would not want to use sudo to be able to login. This is why MariaDB creates a second all-powerful user with the same name as a system user that owns the data directory. In local (not system-wide) installations, this will be the user who installed MariaDB — they automatically get convenient password-less root-like access, because they can access all the data files anyway.
trans-unit.target: 如果您在本地安装MariaDB（例如从tarball安装），则不希望使用sudo进行登录。这就是MariaDB创建第二个全能用户的原因，该用户与拥有数据目录的系统用户同名。在本地（非系统范围）安装中，这将是安装MariaDB的用户-他们会自动获得便捷的无密码的类根访问，因为他们始终可以访问所有数据文件。

trans-unit.source: If you install a binary tarball package in a non standard path, like your home directory, and if you already have a MariaDB / MySQL package installed, then you may get conflicts with the default /etc/my.cnf. This often results in permissions errors.
trans-unit.target: 如果在非标准路径（例如主目录）中安装二进制tarball软件包，并且已经安装了MariaDB / MySQL软件包，则可能会与默认的 /etc/my.cnf 发生冲突。这通常会导致权限错误。

trans-unit.source: If you install the MSI package for MariaDB 5.2 on a machine where 5.2.5 or earlier is installed, the MSI package will fail and tell you to uninstall the older 5.2 version. This behavior is by design. You can proceed by uninstalling 5.2.x without worries. Existing databases will not be removed.
trans-unit.target: 如果您在安装了5.2.5或更早版本的计算机上安装了用于MariaDB 5.2的MSI软件包，则MSI软件包将失败并告诉您卸载较旧的5.2版本。此行为是设计使然。您可以不用担心而卸载5.2.x。现有数据库将不会被删除。

trans-unit.source: If you installed MariaDB on Linux using RPMs, then the mysql.server script will be installed into the /etc/init.d directory with the name mysql. You need not install it manually.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用RPM在Linux上安装了MariaDB ，则 mysql.server 脚本将安装到名称为 mysql 的 /etc/init.d 目录中。您无需手动安装。

trans-unit.source: If you installed a database instance as service, the service will be running already.
trans-unit.target: 如果你安装了一个数据库实例作为服务,那么服务就已经在运行了。

trans-unit.source: If you installed a database instance, you will need to decide if you want to remove or keep the data in the database directory.
trans-unit.target: 如果您安装了数据库实例,您需要决定是否要删除或保留数据库目录中的数据。

trans-unit.source: If you installed the plugin by providing the --plugin-load or the --plugin-load-add options in a relevant server option group in an option file, then those options should be removed to prevent the plugin from being loaded the next time the server is restarted.
trans-unit.target: 如果通过在选项文件的相关服务器选项组中提供 --plugin-load 或 --plugin-load-add 选项来安装插件，则应删除这些选项以防止下次加载插件服务器重新启动。

trans-unit.source: If you installed version 1.0 of the authentication plugin, then you can uninstall that by executing a similar statement for auth_pam_v1. For example:
trans-unit.target: 如果安装了认证插件的 1.0 版，则可以通过对 auth_pam_v1 执行类似的语句来卸载该插件。例如：

trans-unit.source: If you intend to run MariaDB Server on an EC2 instance, you should create a Role (or modify an existing Role already attached to your instance). If you intent to run MariaDB Server outside of AWS, you may want to create a User.
trans-unit.target: 如果你打算在EC2实例上运行MariaDB服务器,你应该创建一个角色(或者修改已经连接到实例的现有角色)。如果你打算在AWS之外运行MariaDB服务器,你可能需要创建一个用户。

trans-unit.source: If you invoke a view that was created before MySQL 5.1.2, it is treated as though it was created with a SQL SECURITY DEFINER clause and with a DEFINER value that is the same as your account. However, because the actual definer is unknown, MySQL issues a warning. To make the warning go away, it is sufficient to re-create the view so that the view definition includes a DEFINER clause.
trans-unit.target: 如果你调用一个在MySQL 5.1.2之前创建的视图,它将被视为使用SQL SECURITY DEFINER子句创建的,并且DEFINER值与你的账户相同。然而,由于实际定义器未知,MySQL会发出警告。为了使警告消失,只要重新创建视图,使视图定义包含一个DEFINER子句即可。

trans-unit.source: If you issue this statement using the mysql client, you can use a \G statement terminator rather than a semicolon to obtain a more readable vertical layout.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用 mysql 客户端发出此语句，则可以使用 \G 语句终止符而不是分号来获得更具可读性的垂直布局。

trans-unit.source: If you just want to test TokuDB, you can start the mysqld server with TokuDB with the following command:
trans-unit.target: 如果只想测试TokuDB，则可以使用以下命令通过TokuDB 启动 mysqld 服务器：

trans-unit.source: If you know for sure which node is the most advanced you can edit the grastate.dat file in the datadir. You can set safe_to_bootstrap=1 on the most advanced node.
trans-unit.target: 如果您确定哪个节点最先进，则可以编辑 datadir 中的 grastate.dat 文件。您可以在最高级的节点上设置 safe_to_bootstrap=1 。

trans-unit.source: If you know that your next query will be slow and you don't want to log it in the slow query log, do:
trans-unit.target: 如果你知道你的下一次查询会很慢,而你又不想把它记录在慢速查询日志中,那么就。

trans-unit.source: If you know that your user account is configured to require a client-side authentication plugin that isn't mysql_old_password or mysql_native_password, then it can help speed up your connection process to explicitly set the default client-side authentication plugin.
trans-unit.target: 如果您知道用户帐户已配置为需要不是 mysql_old_password 或 mysql_native_password 的客户端身份验证插件，则可以帮助您加快连接过程，以显式设置默认的客户端身份验证插件。

trans-unit.source: If you know the exact position, --start-position can be used instead of --start-datetime.
trans-unit.target: 如果您知道确切的位置，则可以使用 --start-position 代替 --start-datetime 。

trans-unit.source: If you like, you can have a banner promoting your client appear at the bottom of the page. Once you've added support for the EXPLAIN Analyzer to your client application, just send a logo, the name of your client, and what you want the name and logo to link to to bryan AT montyprogram DOT com
trans-unit.target: 如果您愿意,您可以在页面底部出现一个宣传您的客户的横幅。一旦您将EXPLAIN分析器的支持添加到您的客户应用程序中,只需发送一个标志,您的客户名称,以及您希望名称和标志链接到bryan AT montyprogram DOT com的内容。

trans-unit.source: If you modify the table, monitoring is immediately affected, and currently monitored events would use a combination of old and new timers, which is probably undesirable. It is best to reset the Performance Schema statistics if you make changes to this table.
trans-unit.target: 如果您修改了该表,监控会立即受到影响,当前监控的事件会使用新旧计时器的组合,这可能是不可取的。如果您对该表进行修改,最好重新设置性能模式统计。

trans-unit.source: If you navigate to the S3 bucket you created, you should find log files that contain JSON-formatted descriptions of your API interactions.
trans-unit.target: 如果你导航到你创建的S3 bucket,你应该能找到包含JSON格式的API交互描述的日志文件。

trans-unit.source: If you need help with upgrading or setting up replication, you can always contact the MariaDB corporation to find experts to help you with this.
trans-unit.target: 如果您在升级或设置复制方面需要帮助，可以随时联系MariaDB公司以找到专家来帮助您。

trans-unit.source: If you need multi-table updating, deleting, or bulk inserting on a remote table, you can alternatively use the FEDERATED engine or a “send” table specifying the EXECSRC option on.
trans-unit.target: 如果您需要在远程表上进行多表更新，删除或批量插入，则可以选择使用FEDERATED引擎或“发送”表来指定EXECSRC选项。

trans-unit.source: If you need parallelism in Summarization, you will have to sacrifice the transactional integrity of steps 4-7.
trans-unit.target: 如果你需要Summarization中的并行性,你将不得不牺牲步骤4-7的事务完整性。

trans-unit.source: If you need the functionality to only allow access to your database from a given set of hosts, you can create the host table with the following command:
trans-unit.target: 如果你需要只允许从一组给定的主机访问数据库的功能,你可以用下面的命令创建主机表。

trans-unit.source: If you need to be able to support cross-database updates with replication filters and statement-based binary logging, then you should use the following replication filters:
trans-unit.target: 如果你需要能够通过复制过滤器和基于语句的二进制日志来支持跨数据库更新,那么你应该使用以下复制过滤器。

trans-unit.source: If you need to describe a negative error code, use -- before the first error code to end the options.
trans-unit.target: 如果需要描述一个否定的错误代码，请在第一个错误代码之前使用 -- 来结束选项。

trans-unit.source: If you need to execute non-deterministic statements, then it is safer to use row-based logging or mixed logging.
trans-unit.target: 如果你需要执行非确定性语句,那么使用基于行的日志或混合日志是比较安全的。

trans-unit.source: If you need to have the software or the data (dbroot backend data or the mysql data) placed in a different directory than what is required above, you can use soft-links.
trans-unit.target: 如果你需要将软件或数据(dbroot后台数据或mysql数据)放在与上述要求不同的目录下,可以使用软连接。

trans-unit.source: If you need to insert data into several tables at once, the best way to do so is to enable multi-row statements and send many inserts to the server at once:
trans-unit.target: 如果需要同时向多个表插入数据,最好的方法是启用多行语句,一次向服务器发送许多插入数据。

trans-unit.source: If you need to install only one plugin from a library, use the INSTALL PLUGIN statement.
trans-unit.target: 如果您只需要从库中安装一个插件，请使用 INSTALL PLUGIN 语句。

trans-unit.source: If you need to load plugins for a single server startup when the --skip-grant-tables option is given (which tells the server not to read system tables), use the --plugin-loadmysqld option.
trans-unit.target: 如果在给定 --skip-grant-tables 选项（告诉服务器不要读取系统表）时需要为单个服务器启动加载插件（请告诉服务器不要读取系统表），请使用 --plugin-load mysqld选项。

trans-unit.source: If you need to manually edit the binlogs before executing them, combine them all into a single file before processing. Here is an example:
trans-unit.target: 如果你需要在执行之前手动编辑binlogs,那么在处理之前将它们全部合并成一个文件。下面是一个例子。

trans-unit.source: If you need to match the characters _ or %, you must escape them. By default, you can prefix the wildcard characters the backslash character \ to escape them. The backslash is used both to encode special characters like newlines when a string is parsed as well as to escape wildcards in a pattern after parsing. Thus, to match an actual backslash, you sometimes need to double-escape it as "\\\\".
trans-unit.target: 如果需要匹配字符 _ 或 % ，则必须对它们进行转义。默认情况下，您可以在通配符前面加上反斜杠字符 \ ,以使其转义。反斜杠不仅用于在解析字符串时对特殊字符（如换行符）进行编码，还用于在解析后在模式中转义通配符。因此，要匹配实际的反斜杠，有时需要将其双转义为 "\ \ \ \" 。

trans-unit.source: If you need to overcome this issue while replication is already underway,you can stop the slave, prepend the old relay log index file to the new relay log index file, and restart the slave.
trans-unit.target: 如果您需要在复制进行中克服这个问题,您可以停止从站,将旧的中继日志索引文件预置到新的中继日志索引文件,然后重新启动从站。

trans-unit.source: If you need to read/write dynamic column blobs on the client for some reason, this API enables that.
trans-unit.target: 如果出于某种原因需要在客户端上读取/写入动态列Blob ，则可以使用此API启用。

trans-unit.source: If you need to set gtid_slave_pos you need to set this for all masters at the same time.
trans-unit.target: 如果需要设置gtid_slave_pos，则需要同时为所有主机设置。

trans-unit.source: If you never manually update an autoincrement column, ColumnStore will always use a unique value.
trans-unit.target: 如果你从来没有手动更新过自动增加的列,ColumnStore将始终使用一个唯一的值。

trans-unit.source: If you only use InnoDB, you may find it easier to back up all databases and tables.
trans-unit.target: 如果你只使用InnoDB,你可能会发现备份所有数据库和表更容易。

trans-unit.source: If you only want to force the join order for a few tables, use STRAIGHT_JOIN in the FROM clause. When this is done, only tables connected with STRAIGHT_JOIN will have their order forced. For example:
trans-unit.target: 如果只想强制几个表的连接顺序，请在 FROM 子句中使用 STRAIGHT_JOIN 。完成此操作后，只有与 STRAIGHT_JOIN 连接的表才被强制排序。例如：

trans-unit.source: If you originally had a LIMIT, UNION gets complicated. If you started with ORDER BY z LIMIT 190, 10, then the UNION needs to be
trans-unit.target: 如果你原来有一个LIMIT,UNION就变得很复杂。如果你从ORDER BY z LIMIT 190,10开始,那么UNION需要是

trans-unit.source: If you pass this function a key_str argument, that string is used as the key for decrypting the message.
trans-unit.target: 如果通过此函数传递 key_str 参数，则该字符串将用作解密消息的密钥。

trans-unit.source: If you plan on using this feature with other programs, such as buildbot, you should set the <code>MTR_STOP_KEEP_ALIVE</code> environment variable or the <code>--stop-keep-alive</code> command-line option with a value in seconds. This will make the script print messages to whatever program is calling mysql-test-run.pl at the interval you set to prevent timeouts.
trans-unit.target: 如果打算将此功能与其他程序（例如buildbot）一起使用，则应将<code> MTR_STOP_KEEP_ALIVE </ code>环境变量或<code>-stop-keep-alive </ code>命令行选项设置为以秒为单位的值。这将使脚本以您设置的间隔将消息打印消息到调用mysql-test-run.pl的程序，以防止超时。

trans-unit.source: If you plan to setup a root user password in the MariaDB server Database, remember to setup the Password Configuration file on each User Module and Performance Module that has User Modules functionality.
trans-unit.target: 如果打算在MariaDB服务器数据库中设置根用户密码,记得在每个具有用户模块功能的用户模块和性能模块上设置密码配置文件。

trans-unit.source: If you provide a password while attempting to log into the server as an account that doesn't require a password, then MariaDB server will simply ignore the password.
trans-unit.target: 如果你在试图以不需要密码的账户登录服务器时提供了密码,那么MariaDB服务器将直接忽略密码。

trans-unit.source: If you provide an argument to the HELP command, the mysql client uses it as a search string to access server-side help. The proper operation of this command requires that the help tables in the mysql database be initialized with help topic information.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 HELP 命令提供参数，则mysql客户端会将其用作搜索字符串以访问服务器端帮助。此命令的正确操作要求使用帮助主题信息初始化 mysql 数据库中的帮助表。

trans-unit.source: If you query contains something like LIKE '%word%', without a fulltext index you are using a full table scan every time, which is very slow.
trans-unit.target: 如果查询包含类似 LIKE '%word%' ，但没有全文索引，则每次都使用全表扫描，这非常慢。

trans-unit.source: If you ran into issues when moving from MariaDB 5.5.32 to MariaDB 5.5.33, look through each of the three scenarios to see which one applies to you and then follow the steps to apply that fix.
trans-unit.target: 如果从MariaDB 5.5.32迁移到MariaDB 5.5.33时遇到问题，请仔细研究这三种方案中的每一种，以查看哪种方案适用于您，然后按照步骤进行操作以应用此修复程序。

trans-unit.source: If you rely on the fact that simple queries always finish quickly, no matter how loaded you database server is, then the thread pool may not work well for you. When the thread pool is enabled on a busy server, even simple queries might be queued to be executed later. This means that even if the statement itself doesn't take much time to execute, even a simple SELECT 1, might take a bit longer when the thread pool is enabled than with one-thread-per-connection if it gets queued.
trans-unit.target: 如果您依赖简单查询总是很快完成的事实，那么无论数据库服务器的负载如何，线程池可能都不适合您。在繁忙的服务器上启用线程池后，甚至简单的查询也可能会排队等待稍后执行。这意味着即使语句本身不需要花费很多时间来执行，即使启用了简单的 SELECT 1 ，也可能在启用线程池时比在 one-thread-per-connection 情况下花费更长的时间。

trans-unit.source: If you removed an MySQL RPM to install MariaDB, note that the MySQL RPM on uninstall renames /etc/my.cnf to /etc/my.cnf.rpmsave.
trans-unit.target: 如果你删除了一个MySQL RPM来安装MariaDB,请注意卸载时的MySQL RPM将/etc/my.cnf重命名为/etc/my.cnf.rpmsave。

trans-unit.source: If you require routines to be re-created with their original timestamp attributes, do not use --routines. Instead, dump and reload the contents of the mysql.proc table directly, using a MariaDB account which has appropriate privileges for the mysql database.
trans-unit.target: 如果您需要使用原始时间戳属性重新创建例程，请不要使用 --routines 。相反，请使用对MySQL数据库具有适当特权的MariaDB帐户直接转储并重新加载mysql.proc表的内容。

trans-unit.source: If you run SHOW ENGINES on a version of MariaDB with the Performance Schema enabled, you'll see the following storage engine listed.
trans-unit.target: 如果在启用了Performance Schema的MariaDB版本上运行SHOW ENGINES，则会看到以下存储引擎。

trans-unit.source: If you run SET PASSWORD on an account that authenticates with one of these authentication plugins that stores passwords in the mysql.global_priv table, then the PASSWORD() function is evaluated by the specific authentication plugin used by the account. The authentication plugin hashes the password with a method that is compatible with that specific authentication plugin.
trans-unit.target: 如果您在使用这些身份验证插件之一进行身份验证的帐户上运行 SET PASSWORD ，该帐户将密码存储在 mysql.global_priv 表中，则 PASSWORD() 函数将由该帐户使用的特定身份验证插件进行评估。身份验证插件使用与特定身份验证插件兼容的方法对密码进行哈希处理。

trans-unit.source: If you run a join from Countries to the materialized table, the cheapest way to find a match in the materialized table is to make a lookup on its primary key (it has one: we used it to remove duplicates). Because of that, we call the strategy "Materialization-lookup".
trans-unit.target: 如果你从 Countries 运行连接到 Materialized 表,在 Materialized 表中寻找匹配的最便宜的方法是对它的主键进行查找(它有一个:我们用它来删除重复的内容)。正因为如此,我们把这种策略称为 "物化-lookup"。

trans-unit.target: 如果你看到上述任何一个错误,说明你安装的MariaDB二进制包与你的系统不兼容。

trans-unit.source: If you see the error message:
trans-unit.target: 如果你看到错误信息。

trans-unit.source: If you set a root password within the MariaDB Database, you will need to create a .my.cnf file as shown here and it will need to reside on all servers that have a User Module MariaDB running.
trans-unit.target: 如果你在MariaDB数据库中设置了root密码,你需要创建一个.my.cnf文件,如这里所示,它需要驻留在所有有用户模块MariaDB运行的服务器上。

trans-unit.source: If you set the ENCRYPTION_KEY_ID table option for a table that is unencrypted because the innodb_encrypt_tables system variable is set to OFF and the ENCRYPTED table option set to DEFAULT, then this encryption key ID will be saved in the table's .frm file, but the encryption key will not be saved to the table's .ibd file.
trans-unit.target: 如果您将未 ENCRYPTION_KEY_ID 表设置为ENCRYPTION_KEY_ID表选项，因为 innodb_encrypt_tables 系统变量设置为 OFF 且 ENCRYPTED 表选项设置为 DEFAULT ，则此加密密钥ID将保存在表的 .frm 文件中，但是加密密钥将不会保存到表的 .ibd 文件中。

trans-unit.source: If you set the daily directive mentioned above, then it will be configured to only rotate each log file once per day.
trans-unit.target: 如果您设置了上述 daily 指令，那么它将被配置为每天仅循环一次每个日志文件。

trans-unit.source: If you set the minsize 1M directive mentioned above, then it will be configured to skip a log file during log rotation if the log file size is smaller than 1 MB.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置了上面提到的 minsize 1M 伪指令，那么如果日志文件大小小于1 MB，它将被配置为在日志轮换期间跳过日志文件。

trans-unit.source: If you set the notifempty directive mentioned above, then it will be configured to skip a log file during log rotation if the log file is empty.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置了 notifempty 提到的notifempty伪指令，那么它将配置为在日志循环期间跳过日志文件（如果该日志文件为空）。

trans-unit.source: If you set the value of the MASTER_HOST option in a CHANGE MASTER command, then the slave assumes that the master is different from before, even if you set the value of this option to the same value it had previously. In this scenario, the slave will consider the old values for the master's binary log file name and position to be invalid for the new master. As a side effect, if you do not explicitly set the values of the MASTER_LOG_FILE and MASTER_LOG_POS options in the statement, then the statement will be implicitly appended with MASTER_LOG_FILE='' and MASTER_LOG_POS=4. However, if you enable GTID mode for replication by setting the MASTER_USE_GTID option to some value other than no in the statement, then these values will effectively be ignored anyway.
trans-unit.target: 如果您在 CHANGE MASTER 命令中设置了 MASTER_HOST 选项的值，那么即使您将此选项的值设置为以前的值，从站也将假定主站不同于以前。在这种情况下，从服务器将认为主机的二进制日志文件名和位置的旧值对新主机无效。副作用是，如果未在 MASTER_LOG_FILE 显式设置MASTER_LOG_FILE和 MASTER_LOG_POS 选项的值，则该语句将隐式附加 MASTER_LOG_FILE='' 和 MASTER_LOG_POS=4 。但是，如果启用GTID通过将 MASTER_USE_GTID 选项设置为语句中的 no 以外的其他值来进行复制，则无论如何这些值都将有效地被忽略。

trans-unit.source: If you set the value of the MASTER_HOST option to the empty string, then that is not the same as not setting the option's value at all. In MariaDB 5.5 and later, if you set the value of the MASTER_HOST option to the empty string, then the CHANGE MASTER command will fail with an error. In MariaDB 5.3 and before, if you set the value of the MASTER_HOST option to the empty string, then the CHANGE MASTER command would succeed, but the subsequent START SLAVE command would fail.
trans-unit.target: 如果将 MASTER_HOST 选项的值设置为空字符串，则与完全不设置选项的值不同。在MariaDB 5.5和更高版本中，如果将 MASTER_HOST 选项的值设置为空字符串，则 CHANGE MASTER 命令将失败并显示错误。在MariaDB 5.3和更低版本中，如果将 MASTER_HOST 选项的值设置为空字符串，则 CHANGE MASTER 命令将成功，但是随后的 START SLAVE 命令将失败。

trans-unit.source: If you set the value of the MASTER_PORT option in a CHANGE MASTER command, then the slave assumes that the master is different from before, even if you set the value of this option to the same value it had previously. In this scenario, the slave will consider the old values for the master's binary log file name and position to be invalid for the new master. As a side effect, if you do not explicitly set the values of the MASTER_LOG_FILE and MASTER_LOG_POS options in the statement, then the statement will be implicitly appended with MASTER_LOG_FILE='' and MASTER_LOG_POS=4. However, if you enable GTID mode for replication by setting the MASTER_USE_GTID option to some value other than no in the statement, then these values will effectively be ignored anyway.
trans-unit.target: 如果您在 CHANGE MASTER 命令中设置 MASTER_PORT 选项的值，那么即使您将此选项的值设置为以前的值，从站也将假定主站不同于以前。在这种情况下，从服务器将认为主机的二进制日志文件名和位置的旧值对新主机无效。副作用是，如果未在 MASTER_LOG_FILE 显式设置MASTER_LOG_FILE和 MASTER_LOG_POS 选项的值，则该语句将隐式附加 MASTER_LOG_FILE='' 和 MASTER_LOG_POS=4 。但是，如果启用GTID通过将 MASTER_USE_GTID 选项设置为语句中的 no 以外的其他值来进行复制，则无论如何这些值都将有效地被忽略。

trans-unit.source: If you set the value to the number of CPUs and if you find that the CPUs are still underutilized, then try increasing the value.
trans-unit.target: 如果你将该值设置为CPU的数量,如果你发现CPU的利用率仍然不足,那么可以尝试增加该值。

trans-unit.source: If you shut down all nodes at the same time, then you have effectively terminated the cluster. Of course, the cluster's data still exists, but the running cluster no longer exists. When this happens, you'll need to bootstrap the cluster again.
trans-unit.target: 如果你同时关闭了所有节点,那么你已经有效地终止了群集。当然,集群的数据仍然存在,但运行中的集群不再存在。当这种情况发生时,你需要再次引导集群。

trans-unit.source: If you shutdown the MariaDB Server properly with mysqladmin shutdown, so that there is nothing for Aria to recover when it starts.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用 mysqladmin shutdown 正确关闭了MariaDB服务器，那么Aria在启动时将无法恢复。

trans-unit.source: If you specify a connection_name, you only get the information about that connection. If connection_name is not used, then the name set by default_master_connection is used. If the connection name doesn't exist you will get an error: There is no master connection for 'xxx'.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定 connection_name ，则仅获得有关该连接的信息。如果未使用 connection_name ，则使用由 default_master_connection 设置的名称。如果连接名称不存在，则会出现错误： There is no master connection for 'xxx' 。

trans-unit.target: 如果你使用一个不支持的值,那么脚本就会失败,就像你在不支持的操作系统上运行脚本一样。

trans-unit.source: If you use an empty "ip=" value the content of /etc/network/interfaces and /etc/resolv.conf will be used. Without the "ip=" option, dhcp will be used to get an IP address.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用空的“ ip= ”值，则将使用 /etc/network/interfaces 和 /etc/resolv.conf 的内容。如果没有“ ip= ”选项，dhcp将用于获取IP地址。

trans-unit.source: If you use any grouping functions in any of the select expressions, all rows in your results will be implicitly grouped, as if you had used GROUP BY NULL.
trans-unit.target: 如果在任何选择表达式中使用任何分组函数，则结果中的所有行都将隐式分组，就像使用过 GROUP BY NULL 一样。

trans-unit.source: If you use the IGNORE keyword, the update statement does not abort even if errors occur during the update. Rows for which duplicate-key conflicts occur are not updated. Rows for which columns are updated to values that would cause data conversion errors are updated to the closest valid values instead.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用 IGNORE 关键字，即使更新期间发生错误，update语句也不会中止。发生重复键冲突的行不会更新。列更新为会导致数据转换错误的值的行将更新为最接近的有效值。

trans-unit.source: If you use the LOW_PRIORITY keyword, execution of the INSERT is delayed until no other clients are reading from the table. If you use the HIGH_PRIORITY keyword, the statement has the same priority as SELECTs. This affects only storage engines that use only table-level locking (MyISAM, MEMORY, MERGE). However, if one of these keywords is specified, concurrent inserts cannot be used. See HIGH_PRIORITY and LOW_PRIORITY clauses for details.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用 LOW_PRIORITY 关键字，则 INSERT 的执行将延迟，直到没有其他客户端从表中读取为止。如果使用 HIGH_PRIORITY 关键字，则该语句的优先级与 SELECT 的优先级相同。这仅影响仅使用表级锁定（MyISAM，MEMORY，MERGE）的存储引擎。但是，如果指定了这些关键字之一，则不能使用并发插入。有关详细信息，请参见HIGH_PRIORITY和LOW_PRIORITY子句。

trans-unit.source: If you use the LOW_PRIORITY keyword, execution of the UPDATE is delayed until no other clients are reading from the table. This affects only storage engines that use only table-level locking (MyISAM, MEMORY, MERGE). See HIGH_PRIORITY and LOW_PRIORITY clauses for details.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用 LOW_PRIORITY 关键字，则 UPDATE 的执行将延迟，直到没有其他客户端从表中读取为止。这仅影响仅使用表级锁定（MyISAM，MEMORY，MERGE）的存储引擎。有关详细信息，请参见HIGH_PRIORITY和LOW_PRIORITY子句。

trans-unit.source: If you use the second format and you don't give a name to the constraint, then the constraint will get a auto generated name. This is done so that you can later delete the constraint with ALTER TABLE DROP constraint_name.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用第二种格式，并且未给约束指定名称，则约束将获得一个自动生成的名称。这样做是为了以后可以使用ALTER TABLE DROP Constraint_name删除约束。

trans-unit.source: If you use the second format and you don't give a name to the constraint, then the constraint will get an automatically generated name. This is done so that you can later delete the constraint with ALTER TABLE DROP constraint_name.

trans-unit.source: If you want blank output instead of 0 -- Currently the code says "SUM(IF(... 0))"; change the 0 to NULL, then wrap the SUM: IFNULL(SUM(...), ''). Note that this will distinguish between a zero total (showing '0') and no data (blank).

trans-unit.source: If you want to execute the event only once (one time event), you can use the AT keyword, followed by a timestamp. If you use CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, the event acts as soon as it is created. As a convenience, you can add one or more intervals to that timestamp. You can also specify a timestamp in the past, so that the event is stored but not triggered, until you modify it via ALTER EVENT.
trans-unit.target: 如果您只想执行一次事件（一次事件），则可以使用 AT 关键字，后跟一个时间戳。如果使用 CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ，则事件在创建后立即起作用。为方便起见，您可以为该时间戳添加一个或多个间隔。您还可以指定过去的时间戳记，以便事件被存储但不会触发，直到您通过ALTER EVENT对其进行了修改。

trans-unit.source: If you want to have a Debug Sync point with the wait, please place it behind enter_cond(). Only then you can safely decide, if the wait will be taken. Also you will have THD::proc_info correct when the sync point emits a signal. DEBUG_SYNC sets its own proc_info, but restores the previous one before releasing its internal mutex. As soon as another thread sees the signal, it does also see the proc_info from before entering the sync point. In this case it will be "new_message", which is associated with the wait that is to be synchronized.
trans-unit.target: 如果您希望在等待时有一个调试同步点，请将其放在 enter_cond() 之后。只有这样，您才能确定是否需要等待。同样，当同步点发出信号时，您的 THD::proc_info 也将正确。 DEBUG_SYNC 设置其自己的proc_info，但在释放其内部互斥体之前恢复前一个。一旦另一个线程看到了信号，它也会从进入同步点之前看到proc_info。在这种情况下，它将是“ new_message”，与要同步的等待关联。

trans-unit.source: If you want to install MariaDB with apt, then you can configure apt to install from MariaDB Corporation's MariaDB Package Repository by using the MariaDB Package Repository setup script.

trans-unit.source: If you want to make a table containing, for instance, historical dates not being convertible into CONNECT dates, make your column CHAR or VARCHAR and store the dates in the MariaDB format. All date functions applied to these strings will convert them to MariaDB dates and will work as if they were real dates. Of course they must be inserted and will be displayed using the MariaDB format.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想制作一个包含历史日期的表,例如,历史日期不能转换为CONNECT日期,请将你的列设置为CHAR或VARCHAR,并以MariaDB格式存储日期。所有应用于这些字符串的日期函数都会将它们转换为MariaDB日期,并且会像真正的日期一样工作。当然,它们必须被插入并将使用MariaDB格式显示。

trans-unit.source: If you want to monitor user access to specific databases or tables (e.g., mysql.user), you can search the log for them. Then if you want to see a query which accessed a certain table, the audit log entry will include the query identificaiton number. You can use it to search the same log for the query entry. This can be useful when searching a log containing tens of thousands of entries.
trans-unit.target: 如果要监视用户对特定数据库或表（例如 mysql.user ）的访问，则可以在日志中搜索它们。然后，如果要查看访问特定表的查询，审核日志条目将包含查询标识号。您可以使用它在同一日志中搜索查询条目。当搜索包含成千上万个条目的日志时，这很有用。

This may be helpful if you want to avoid upgrades. However, avoiding upgrades is not recommended, since minor releases can contain important bug fixes and fixes for security vulnerabilities.
trans-unit.target: 如果要固定特定次要版本的存储库，例如MariaDB 10.3.9，则还可以指定次要版本。例如， mariadb-10.3.9 。如果您要避免升级，这可能会有所帮助。但是，不建议避免升级，因为次要版本可能包含重要的错误修复程序和安全漏洞修复程序。

trans-unit.source: If you want to setup an install where the Data is stored out in a separate directory in the case you have limit amount local storage, this can be done. It is recommended that the soft-links be setup at the Data Directory Levels, like mariadb/columnstore/data and mariadb/columnstore/dataX. With this setup, you can perform upgrades using any of the package types, rpm, debian, or binary. In the case where you prefer OR have to set a soft-link at the top directory, like /usr/local/mariadb, you will need to install using the binary package. If you install using the rpm package and tool, this soft-link will be deleted when you perform the upgrade process and the upgrade will fail.

trans-unit.source: If you would like to use Mariabackup to set up a replication slave, then you might find the information at Setting up a Replication Slave with Mariabackup helpful.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想用Mariabackup建立一个复制从服务器，那么你可能会发现在信息与Mariabackup建立一个复制从很有帮助。

trans-unit.source: If you would like to use a version of Mariabackup that uses the BACKUP STAGE commands in an efficient way, then one option is to use MariaDB Enterprise Backup that is bundled with MariaDB Enterprise Server.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想使用有效地使用 BACKUP STAGE 命令的Mariabackup版本，那么一种选择是使用与MariaDB Enterprise Server捆绑在一起的MariaDB Enterprise Backup。

trans-unit.source: If you would like to use a version of Mariabackup that uses the BACKUP STAGE commands in the most efficient way, then your best option is to use MariaDB Enterprise Backup that is bundled with MariaDB Enterprise Server.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想使用以最有效的方式使用 BACKUP STAGE 命令的Mariabackup版本，那么最好的选择是使用与MariaDB Enterprise Server捆绑在一起的MariaDB Enterprise Backup。

trans-unit.source: If you would like to view and possibly edit the file before applying it to your database, use the '-r' flag to redirect the output to a file:
trans-unit.target: 如果你想在将文件应用到数据库之前查看并可能编辑该文件,使用'-r'标志将输出结果重定向到一个文件。

trans-unit.source: If you would not like to configure the MariaDB MaxScale Repository on your system, then you can use the --skip-maxscale option to prevent the MariaDB Package Repository setup script from configuring it.
trans-unit.target: 如果您不想在系统上配置MariaDB MaxScale信息库，则可以使用 --skip-maxscale 选项来阻止MariaDB软件包信息库设置脚本对其进行配置。

trans-unit.source: If you would not like to configure the MariaDB Repository on your system, then you can use the --skip-server option to prevent the MariaDB Package Repository setup script from configuring it.
trans-unit.target: 如果您不想在系统上配置MariaDB信息库，则可以使用 --skip-server 选项来阻止MariaDB软件包信息库设置脚本对其进行配置。

trans-unit.source: If you would not like to configure the MariaDB Tools repository on your system, then you can use the --skip-tools option to prevent the MariaDB Package Repository setup script from configuring it.
trans-unit.target: 如果您不想在系统上配置MariaDB工具存储库，则可以使用 --skip-tools 选项来阻止MariaDB软件包存储库安装脚本对其进行配置。

trans-unit.source: If you're considering --no-lock due to backups failing to acquire locks, this may be due to incoming replication events preventing the lock. Consider using the --safe-slave-backup option to momentarily stop the replication slave thread. This alternative may help the backup to succeed without resorting to --no-lock.
trans-unit.target: 如果您正在考虑 --no-lock (由于备份无法获取锁），这可能是由于传入的复制事件阻止了锁。考虑使用 --safe-slave-backup 选项暂时停止复制从属线程。此替代方法可以帮助备份成功，而无需使用 --no-lock 。

trans-unit.source: If you're not running MariaDB Server on an EC2 instance, you can also place the credentials in the MariaDB data directory. The AWS API client looks for a credentials file in the .aws subdirectory of the home directory of the user running the client process. In the case of MariaDB, its home directory is its datadir.
trans-unit.target: 如果您不在EC2实例上运行MariaDB Server，则还可以将凭据放在MariaDB数据目录中。AWS API客户端在运行客户端进程的用户的主目录的 .aws 子目录中查找 credentials 文件。对于MariaDB，其主目录是其 datadir 。

trans-unit.source: If you're scanning small data ranges in a table that is sufficiently small so that it completely fits into the OS disk cache, then you may observe that the only effect of MRR is that extra buffering/sorting adds some CPU overhead.
trans-unit.target: 如果你扫描的表中的小数据范围足够小,以至于完全适合操作系统的磁盘缓存,那么你可能会观察到MRR唯一的影响就是额外的缓冲/排序增加了一些CPU开销。

trans-unit.source: If you're unsure where the option file is located, see Configuring MariaDB with Option Files: Default Option File Locations for information on the default locations.
trans-unit.target: 如果不确定选项文件的位置，请参阅使用选项文件配置MariaDB：默认选项文件位置，以获取有关默认位置的信息。
