trans-unit.target: 如果您忘记了root密码，没问题-您仍然可以使用sudo进行连接并更改密码。而且，如果您还删除了unix_socket身份验证，请按照以下步骤恢复访问权限：

trans-unit.source: If you've never used CloudTrail before, click "Get Started Now".
trans-unit.target: 如果您之前从未使用过CloudTrail,请点击 "立即开始"。

trans-unit.source: If your session time zone is set to SYSTEM (the default), FROM_UNIXTIME() will call the OS function to convert the data using the system time zone. At least on Linux, the corresponding function (localtime_r) uses a global mutex inside glibc that can cause contention under high concurrent load.
trans-unit.target: 如果会话时区设置为 SYSTEM （默认值），则 FROM_UNIXTIME() 将调用OS函数以使用系统时区转换数据。至少在Linux上，相应的函数（ localtime_r ）在glibc内使用全局互斥锁，这会在高并发负载下引起争用。

trans-unit.source: If your MariaDB Server binary is built with OpenSSL, then you can set the ssl_cipher system variable to values like SSLv3 or TLSv1.2 to allow all SSLv3.0 or all TLSv1.2 ciphers. However, this does not necessarily limit the protocol version to TLSv1.2. See MDEV-14101 for more information about that.
trans-unit.target: 如果您的MariaDB Server二进制文件是使用OpenSSL构建的，则可以将 ssl_cipher 系统变量设置为 SSLv3 或 TLSv1.2 之类的值，以允许所有SSLv3.0或所有TLSv1.2密码。但是，这并不一定将协议版本限制为TLSv1.2。有关更多信息，请参见MDEV-14101。

trans-unit.source: If your MariaDB distribution is installed in some non-standard location, you must change the location where mysqlaccess expects to find the mysql client. Edit the mysqlaccess script at approximately line 18. Search for a line that looks like this: <<code> $MYSQL = ´/usr/local/bin/mysql´; # path to mysql executable <</code>> Change the path to reflect the location where mysql actually is stored on your system. If you do not do this, a Broken pipe error will occur when you run mysqlaccess.
trans-unit.target: 如果您的MariaDB发行版安装在某些非标准位置，则必须更改mysqlaccess期望找到mysql客户端的位置。在大约第18行处编辑mysqlaccess脚本。搜索看起来像这样的行：<< code> $ MYSQL =´/ usr / local / bin / mysql´; ＃路径MySQL的可执行<< /代码>>更改，以反映该位置的路径的mysql实际存储在你的系统上。如果不这样做，则在运行mysqlaccess时将发生管道断开错误。

trans-unit.source: If your PRIMARY KEY is compound, the code gets messier.
trans-unit.target: 如果你的PRIMARY KEY是复合的,代码就会变得更乱。

trans-unit.source: If your SELECTs tend to be for "recent" uuids, then they, too, will be easily cached. If, on the other hand, your SELECTs often reach for old uuids, they will be random and not well cached. Still, improving the INSERTs will help the system overall.
trans-unit.target: 如果你的SELECTs倾向于 "最近 "的uuids,那么它们也会很容易被缓存。另一方面,如果你的SELECTs经常接触到老的uuids,那么它们就会是随机的,不好缓存。不过,改进inserts还是会对系统整体有帮助的。

trans-unit.source: If your client does not support the dialog client authentication plugin, then you may need to use the mysql_clear_password client authentication plugin instead.
trans-unit.target: 如果您的客户端不支持 dialog 客户端认证插件，则可能需要使用 mysql_clear_password 客户端认证插件。

trans-unit.source: If your client encounters errors similar to the following, then you may need to set the path to the library's plugin directory:
trans-unit.target: 如果你的客户端遇到类似下面的错误,那么你可能需要设置库的插件目录的路径。

trans-unit.source: If your data is coming in continually, and you are adding a batching layer, let's do some math. Compute your ingestion rate -- R rows per second.
trans-unit.target: 如果你的数据是持续不断地进来的,而且你正在添加一个批处理层,让我们来做一些计算。计算你的摄取率--每秒R行。

trans-unit.source: If your database server is also using the MyRocks storage engine, then the user account that performs the backup will also need the SUPERglobal privilege. This is because Mariabackup creates a checkpoint of this data by setting the rocksdb_create_checkpoint system variable, which requires this privilege. See MDEV-20577 for more information.
trans-unit.target: 如果您的数据库服务器也使用MyRocks存储引擎，则执行备份的用户帐户也将需要 SUPER 全局特权。这是因为Mariabackup通过设置 rocksdb_create_checkpoint 系统变量来创建此数据的检查点，该系统变量需要此特权。有关更多信息，请参见MDEV-20577。

trans-unit.source: If your group commit ratio is too close to 1, then it may help to change your group commit frequency.
trans-unit.target: 如果您的组提交比率太接近1，则可能有助于更改组提交频率。

trans-unit.source: If your queries examine big fraction of the tables (somewhere more than ~ 30%), turn on hash join:
trans-unit.target: 如果您的查询检查了大部分表（超过30％），请打开哈希联接：

trans-unit.source: If your reports need to be up-to-the-second, you need "as needed" or "hybrid". If your reports have less urgency (eg, weekly reports that don't include 'today'), then "periodically" might be best.
trans-unit.target: 如果你的报告需要精确到秒,你需要 "按需 "或 "混合"。如果你的报告不那么紧急(例如,不包括 "今天 "的周报),那么 "定期 "可能是最好的。

trans-unit.source: If your server is started by systemd, then there is a specific way to configure the umask. See Systemd: Configuring the umask for more information.
trans-unit.target: 如果您的服务器由 systemd 启动，则有一种配置umask的特定方法。有关更多信息，请参见Systemd：配置umask。

trans-unit.source: If your source table has millions of records and you plan to pivot only a small subset of it, doing so will make a lot of a difference performance wise. In addition, you have entire liberty to use expressions, scalar functions, aliases, join, where and having clauses in your SQL statement. The only constraint is that you are responsible for the result of this statement to have the correct format for the pivot processing.
trans-unit.target: 如果你的源表有几百万条记录,而你只打算对其中的一小部分进行数据透视,那么这样做会使性能有很大的不同。此外,你可以完全自由地在你的SQL语句中使用表达式、标量函数、别名、join、where和have子句。唯一的限制是,你要负责这个语句的结果要有正确的格式,以便进行pivot处理。

trans-unit.source: If your system is not configured with any of these, you can skip this section.
trans-unit.target: 如果您的系统没有配置这些功能,您可以跳过本节。

trans-unit.source: If your table has a large number of reads and writes, consider using delayed writes. This uses the db engine in a "batch" write mode, which cuts down on disk io, therefore increasing performance.
trans-unit.target: 如果你的表有大量的读和写,考虑使用延迟写入。这在 "批处理 "写模式下使用db引擎,可以减少磁盘io,从而提高性能。

trans-unit.source: If your tables were originally created on an older version of MariaDB or MySQL, then your table may be using one of InnoDB's older row formats:
trans-unit.target: 如果你的表最初是在旧版本的MariaDB或MySQL上创建的,那么你的表可能使用了InnoDB的旧行格式之一。

trans-unit.source: Ignorable
trans-unit.target: Ignorable

trans-unit.source: Ignore SIGINT signals (usually CTRL-C).
trans-unit.target: 忽略SIGINT信号(通常是CTRL-C)。

trans-unit.source: Ignore all INDEX DIRECTORY and DATA DIRECTORY directives when creating a table. Can be useful on slave replication servers.
trans-unit.target: 创建表时，请忽略所有INDEX DIRECTORY和DATA DIRECTORY指令。在从属复制服务器上很有用。

trans-unit.source: Ignore any disabled.def file, and also run tests marked as disabled. Success or failure of those tests will be reported the same way as other tests.
trans-unit.target: 忽略任何disabled.def文件，并运行标记为“禁用”的测试。这些测试的成功或失败将以与其他测试相同的方式报告。

trans-unit.source: Ignore first n lines of data infile.
trans-unit.target: 忽略文件中的前n行数据。

trans-unit.source: Ignore space after function names. Allows one to have spaces (including tab characters and new line characters) between function name and '('. The drawback is that this causes built in functions to become reserved words.
trans-unit.target: 忽略函数名后的空格。允许在函数名和'('之间有空格(包括制表符和换行符)。缺点是这会导致内置函数成为保留字。

trans-unit.source: Ignore statements and transactions affecting any other databases.
trans-unit.target: 忽略影响任何其他数据库的语句和事务。

trans-unit.source: Ignore statements and transactions affecting any other tables and databases.
trans-unit.target: 忽略影响任何其他表和数据库的语句和事务。

trans-unit.source: Ignore statements and transactions affecting any other tables.
trans-unit.target: 忽略影响任何其他表的语句和事务。

trans-unit.source: Ignore statements and transactions affecting databases named db1.
trans-unit.target: 忽略影响名为db1的数据库的语句和事务。

trans-unit.source: Ignore statements and transactions affecting databases named db2.
trans-unit.target: 忽略影响名为db2的数据库的语句和事务。

trans-unit.source: Ignore statements and transactions affecting tables in databases named db1 and which are named tab.
trans-unit.target: 忽略影响名为db1且名为tab的数据库中的表的语句和事务。

trans-unit.source: Ignore statements and transactions affecting tables in databases named db2 and which are named tab.
trans-unit.target: 忽略影响名为db2且名为tab的数据库中的表的语句和事务。

trans-unit.source: Ignore statements and transactions affecting tables in databases that start with db and whose table names start with tab.
trans-unit.target: 忽略影响以db开头且表名以tab开头的数据库中的表的语句和事务。

trans-unit.source: Ignore statements and transactions affecting the database named app1.
trans-unit.target: 忽略影响名为app1的数据库的语句和事务。

trans-unit.source: Ignore statements except those those that occur while the default database is the one named on the command line. This filtering is limited, and based only on USE statements. This is useful for skipping updates to other databases in the binary log.
trans-unit.target: 忽略那些默认数据库是命令行上命名的语句以外的语句。此过滤是有限的，并且仅基于USE语句。这对于跳过二进制日志中对其他数据库的更新很有用。

trans-unit.source: Ignore the checksum verification. Must be used with the --write option.
trans-unit.target: 忽略校验和验证。必须与 --write 选项一起使用。

trans-unit.source: Ignore white space and # comments
trans-unit.target: 忽略白色空间和#评论

trans-unit.source: IgnoreFields instructs cpimport to ignore and skip the particular value at that position in the file.
trans-unit.target: IgnoreFields 指示 cpimport 忽略并跳过文件中该位置的特定值。

trans-unit.source: Ignored errors normally generate a warning.
trans-unit.target: 忽略的错误通常会产生一个警告。

trans-unit.source: Imagine the case where a client performs FLUSH TABLES WITH READ LOCK then pauses. If then the number of other clients connecting to the server to start write operations exceeds the maximum number of threads allowed in the pool, it can block the Server. This makes it impossible to issue the UNLOCK TABLES statement. It can also block MaxScale from monitoring the Server.
trans-unit.target: 假设客户端执行 FLUSH TABLES WITH READ LOCK 然后暂停。如果然后连接到服务器以开始写操作的其他客户端的数量超过池中允许的最大线程数，则它可能会阻塞服务器。这使得不可能发出 UNLOCK TABLES 语句。它还可以阻止MaxScale监视服务器。

trans-unit.target: 立即执行动态SQL语句

trans-unit.target: 隐性账户创建

trans-unit.target: 隐式游标FOR循环

trans-unit.target: 由于触发器和LOCK表而产生的隐性锁。

trans-unit.source: Implicit type conversion also takes place on dyadic arithmetic operations (+,-,*,/). MariaDB chooses the minimum data type that is guaranteed to fit the result and converts both arguments to the result data type.
trans-unit.target: 隐式类型转换也发生在二进位算术运算符（+，-，*，/）上。MariaDB选择保证适合结果的最小数据类型，并将两个参数都转换为结果数据类型。

trans-unit.source: Implicit type conversion takes place when MariaDB is using operands or different types, in order to make the operands compatible.
trans-unit.target: 当MariaDB使用操作数或不同类型时,为了使操作数兼容,会进行隐式类型转换。

trans-unit.source: Implicitly dropped temporary tables can make GTIDs inconsistent. See MDEV-14153 about that.
trans-unit.target: 隐式删除临时表会使GTID不一致。有关此信息，请参见MDEV-14153。

trans-unit.source: Implicitly high defaults of open-files-limit may be missed by the conversion script and require explicit configuration. See Configuring the Open Files Limit.
trans-unit.target: 转换脚本可能会忽略默认的 open-files-limit 默认值，并且需要显式配置。请参阅配置打开文件限制。

trans-unit.target: 导入MariaDB GPG公钥

trans-unit.source: Imports the GPG public key used to verify the signature of MariaDB software package with apt-key from the keyserver.ubuntu.com key server.
trans-unit.target: 从 keyserver.ubuntu.com 密钥服务器导入用于使用 apt-key 验证MariaDB软件包签名的GPG 公钥。

trans-unit.source: Imports the GPG public key used to verify the signature of MariaDB software packages with rpm --import from downloads.mariadb.com.
trans-unit.target: 使用 rpm --import 从 downloads.mariadb.com 导入用于验证MariaDB软件包签名的GPG公钥。

trans-unit.source: Impossible to generate Global Transaction Identifier: the integer component reached the maximal value. Restart the server with a new server_uuid.
trans-unit.target: 无法生成全局事务标识符:整数部分达到最大值。用新的server_uuid重新启动服务器。

trans-unit.source: Improve the security of a MariaDB installation.
trans-unit.target: 提高MariaDB安装的安全性。

trans-unit.source: Improved SQL Document Parser Performance in Updated dbForge Tools for MySQL and MariaDB
trans-unit.target: 在更新后的dbForge工具中提高了MySQL和MariaDB的SQL文档解析器性能。

trans-unit.source: Improved SQL document parser performance;
trans-unit.target: 提高了SQL文档解析器的性能。

trans-unit.source: Improved XML View and new JSON View for Data Editor and Viewer Window;
trans-unit.target: 改进了XML视图和新的JSON视图,用于数据编辑器和查看器窗口。

trans-unit.source: Improved replication using global transaction IDs.
trans-unit.target: 改进使用全局交易ID的复制。

trans-unit.source: Improvement for group commit for InnoDB transactions with the binary log enabled
trans-unit.target: 改进启用二进制日志的InnoDB事务的组提交。

trans-unit.source: Improvements to Dynamic Columns in MariaDB 10
trans-unit.target: 对MariaDB 10中动态列的改进

trans-unit.source: Improvements to ORDER BY Optimization
trans-unit.target: ORDER BY优化的改进

trans-unit.source: Improving performance for data-warehouse-like tables
trans-unit.target: 提高类数据仓库表的性能

trans-unit.source: In 'theory' it should be easy for anyone to get ndb in MariaDB to work as well as in MySQL as all the ndb code is still in the tree. If you are interested in (and capable of) doing this, please join the MariaDB project!
trans-unit.target: 理论上,任何人都可以很容易地让MariaDB中的ndb和MySQL中的ndb一样好用,因为所有的ndb代码都还在树上。如果你有兴趣(并且有能力)做这件事,请加入MariaDB项目。

trans-unit.source: In 'traditional' replication, these steps occur:
trans-unit.target: 在 "传统 "的复制中,会出现这些步骤。

trans-unit.source: In *nix, ulimit tells you what the file limit is. The maximum value is in the tens of thousands, but sometimes it is set to only 1024. This limits you to about 300 tables. More discussion on ulimit
trans-unit.target: 在*nix中,ulimit告诉你文件的限制是什么。最大值是以万为单位的,但有时它被设置为只有1024。这就限制了你大约300个表。更多关于ulimit的讨论

trans-unit.source: In 1.0.2, the configuration file name was changed to Columnstore.xml. Check the 1.0.2 Release Notes on how to perform the upgrade from the 1.0.1 to the 1.0.2. There is a work-around procedure to follow.
trans-unit.target: 在1.0.2中,配置文件的名称改为Columnstore.xml。请查看1.0.2版本说明,了解如何从1.0.1升级到1.0.2。有一个变通的过程可以遵循。

trans-unit.source: In 1.0.6, if you were running on a multi-node system and utilizing the AWS EC2 API toolset, you was required to have the Certification Keys (Access and Secret) in files that were referenced during the postConfigure install. in 1.0.7, these keys are now read from the IAM role that is provided or is read from a file called .aws/certification. Please check the Amazon AMI Installation Guide for additional details.
trans-unit.target: 在 1.0.6 中,如果您在多节点系统上运行并利用 AWS EC2 API 工具集,则需要在 postConfigure 安装过程中引用的文件中拥有认证密钥(Access 和 Secret)。在 1.0.7 中,现在可以从提供的 IAM 角色中读取这些密钥,或从名为 .aws/certification 的文件中读取。请查看《Amazon AMI 安装指南》以了解其他细节。

trans-unit.source: In 1.1.0 and later, MariaDB ColumnStore supports Data Redundancy by utilize the third party software GlusterFS. So if you wanted to utilize the Data Redundancy feature, you would need to install the the GlusterFS package on all nodes that will be used as Performance Modules. Requires 3.3.1 version or later.
trans-unit.target: 在1.1.0及以后的版本中,MariaDB ColumnStore通过使用第三方软件GlusterFS来支持数据冗余功能,所以如果你想使用数据冗余功能,你需要在所有作为性能模块的节点上安装GlusterFS包。因此,如果你想利用数据冗余功能,你需要在所有被用作性能模块的节点上安装GlusterFS包。需要3.3.1或更高版本。

trans-unit.source: In 10.0.2, the name of the table that stores the GTID position was called rpl_slave_state. The syntax master_use_gtid=0|1 was used instead of master_use_gtid=no|current_pos. The master_use_gtid=slave_pos option did not have any equivalent.
trans-unit.target: 在10.0.2中，存储GTID位置的表的名称称为 rpl_slave_state 。使用语法 master_use_gtid=0|1 代替 master_use_gtid=no|current_pos 。该 master_use_gtid=slave_pos 选项没有任何等价的。

trans-unit.source: In 10.1 one can disable it for a connection by setting local.slow_query_log to 0.
trans-unit.target: 在10.1中，可以通过将local.slow_query_log设置为0 来禁用该连接。

trans-unit.source: In 5.1, ALTER ONLINE TABLE can speed up some operations significantly. (Normally ALTER TABLE copies the table over and rebuilds the indexes.)
trans-unit.target: 在5.1中,ALTER ONLINE TABLE可以大大加快一些操作的速度。通常ALTER TABLE会把表复制过来,然后重建索引)。

trans-unit.source: In 5.6 (or MariaDB 5.5), optional thread pooling interacts with max_connections. This is a more advanced topic.
trans-unit.target: 在5.6（或MariaDB 5.5）中，可选线程池与max_connections交互。这是一个更高级的主题。

trans-unit.source: In row-basedreplication, only the master checks constraints, and failed statements will not be replicated. In statement-based replication, the slaves will also check constraints. Constraints should therefore be identical, as well as deterministic, in a replication environment.
trans-unit.target: 在基于行的复制中，只有主服务器检查约束，并且失败的语句将不会被复制。在基于语句的复制中，从服务器还将检查约束。因此，在复制环境中，约束应相同且具有确定性。

trans-unit.source: In Oracle mode, from MariaDB 10.3, there are a number of extra reserved words:
trans-unit.target: 在Oracle模式下，从MariaDB 10.3开始，还有许多额外的保留字：

trans-unit.source: In Oracle mode from MariaDB 10.3:
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.3中的Oracle模式下：

trans-unit.source: In Oracle mode from MariaDB 10.3, CONCAT ignores NULL.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.3中的Oracle模式下， CONCAT 会忽略NULL。

trans-unit.source: In Oracle mode from MariaDB 10.3, || ignores NULL.
trans-unit.target: 在从MariaDB 10.3开始的Oracle模式下， || 。忽略NULL。

trans-unit.source: In Oracle mode, CONCAT and the Logical OR operator || ignore NULL.
trans-unit.target: 在Oracle模式下，CONCAT和逻辑OR运算符|| 忽略NULL。

trans-unit.source: In Oracle mode, NULL can be used as a statement:
trans-unit.target: 在Oracle模式下，可以将NULL用作语句：

trans-unit.source: In Oracle mode, from MariaDB 10.3:
trans-unit.target: 在Oracle模式下，从MariaDB 10.3开始：

trans-unit.source: In Oracle mode from MariaDB 10.3, PREPARE stmt FROM 'SELECT :1, :2' is used, instead of ?.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.3的Oracle模式下，使用 PREPARE stmt FROM 'SELECT :1, :2' 代替 ? 。

trans-unit.source: In Oracle mode from MariaDB 10.3, BLOB is a synonym for LONGBLOB.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.3中的Oracle模式下， BLOB 是 LONGBLOB 的同义词。

trans-unit.source: In Oracle mode from MariaDB 10.3, CLOB is a synonym for LONGTEXT.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.3中的Oracle模式下， CLOB 是 LONGTEXT 的同义词。

trans-unit.source: In Oracle mode from MariaDB 10.3, DATE with a time portion is a synonym for DATETIME.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.3中的Oracle模式下，带有时间部分的 DATE 是 DATETIME 的同义词。

trans-unit.source: In Oracle mode from MariaDB 10.3, NUMBER is a synonym.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.3中的Oracle模式下， NUMBER 是同义词。

trans-unit.source: In Oracle mode from MariaDB 10.3, RAW is a synonym for VARBINARY.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.3中的Oracle模式下， RAW 是 VARBINARY 的同义词。

trans-unit.source: In Oracle mode from MariaDB 10.3, VARCHAR2 is a synonym.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.3中的Oracle模式下， VARCHAR2 是同义词。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.0 and above, group commit is also used to enable conservative mode of in-order parallel replication.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.0及更高版本中，组提交也用于启用有序并行复制的保守模式。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.0 and above, setting innodb_flush_log_at_trx_commit=1 when sync_binlog=1 is not set can also cause the transaction to be missing from the server's InnoDB redo log due to some optimizations added in those versions. In that case, it is recommended to always set sync_binlog=1. If you can't do that, then it is recommended to set innodb_flush_log_at_trx_commit to 3, rather than 1. See Non-durable Binary Log Settings for more information.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.0及更高版本中，未设置 sync_binlog=1 innodb_flush_log_at_trx_commit=1 时设置innodb_flush_log_at_trx_commit = 1也会由于服务器的InnoDB重做日志中的某些版本中的某些优化而导致事务丢失。在这种情况下，建议始终设置 sync_binlog=1 。如果您不能这样做，那么建议将 innodb_flush_log_at_trx_commit 设置为 3 ，而不是 1 。有关更多信息，请参见非持久二进制日志设置。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.0 and above, when both innodb_flush_log_at_trx_commit=1 (the default) is set and the binary log is enabled, there is now one less sync to disk inside InnoDB during commit (2 syncs shared between a group of transactions instead of 3). See Binary Log Group Commit and InnoDB Flushing Performance for more information.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.0及更高版本中，当同时设置了innodb_flush_log_at_trx_commit = 1（默认值）并且启用了二进制日志时，现在在提交期间与InnoDB内部磁盘的同步减少了一个（一组事务之间共享2个同步，而不是3个）。有关更多信息，请参见二进制日志组提交和InnoDB刷新性能。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.0 and above, when both innodb_flush_log_at_trx_commit=1 (the default) is set and the binary log is enabled, there is now one less sync to disk inside InnoDB during commit (2 syncs shared between a group of transactions instead of 3).
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.0及更高版本中，当同时 innodb_flush_log_at_trx_commit=1 了innodb_flush_log_at_trx_commit = 1（默认值）并且启用了二进制日志时，现在在提交期间与InnoDB内部磁盘的同步减少了一个（一组事务之间共享2个同步，而不是3个）。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.0 and above, when both innodb_flush_log_at_trx_commit=1 (the default) is set and the binary log is enabled, there is now one less sync to disk inside InnoDB during commit (2 syncs shared between a group of transactions instead of 3). See Binary Log Group Commit and InnoDB Flushing Performance for more information.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.0及更高版本中，当同时 innodb_flush_log_at_trx_commit=1 了innodb_flush_log_at_trx_commit = 1（默认值）并且启用了二进制日志时，现在在提交期间与InnoDB内部磁盘的同步减少了一个（一组事务之间共享2个同步，而不是3个）。有关更多信息，请参见二进制日志组提交和InnoDB刷新性能。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.0 and before, Percona XtraBackup 2.3 is supported.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.0和更低版本中，支持Percona XtraBackup 2.3。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.0 and later, ANALYZE TABLE supports engine-independent statistics. See Engine-Independent Table Statistics: Collecting Statistics with the ANALYZE TABLE Statement for more information.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.0和更高版本中， ANALYZE TABLE 支持与引擎无关的统计信息。有关更多信息，请参见引擎无关的表统计信息：使用ANALYZE TABLE语句收集统计信息。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.0 and later, InnoDB supports multiple algorithms for performing DDL operations. This offers a significant performance improvement over previous versions. The supported algorithms are:
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.0和更高版本中，InnoDB支持多种算法来执行DDL操作。与以前的版本相比，这可以显着提高性能。支持的算法是：

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.0 and later, InnoDB supports multiple locking strategies for performing DDL operations. This offers a significant performance improvement over previous versions. The supported locking strategies are:
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.0和更高版本中，InnoDB支持多种锁定策略来执行DDL操作。与以前的版本相比，这可以显着提高性能。支持的锁定策略是：

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.0 and later, InnoDB supports the ALGORITHM clause.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.0和更高版本中，InnoDB支持 ALGORITHM 子句。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.0 and later, if you aren't sure whether your server is linked with OpenSSL or the bundled TLS library, then you can check the value of the have_openssl system variable. For example:
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.0和更高版本中，如果不确定服务器是与OpenSSL链接还是绑定的TLS库链接，则可以检查 have_openssl 系统变量的值。例如：

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.0 and later, online DDL is supported with the ALGORITHM and LOCK clauses.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.0和更高版本中， ALGORITHM 和 LOCK 子句支持联机DDL 。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.0 and later, the information_schema.INNODB_SYS_TABLES table can be queried to see the file format used by a table.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.0和更高版本中，可以查询information_schema.INNODB_SYS_TABLES表以查看表使用的文件格式。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.0 and later, the ALTER TABLE statement supports online DDL for storage engines that have implemented the relevant online DDL algorithms and locking strategies.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB的10.0及更高版本， ALTER TABLE 语句支持在线DDL对于已实施了相关的在线DDL存储引擎的算法和锁定策略。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.0 and later, the ALTER TABLE statement supports the LOCK clause.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.0和更高版本中， ALTER TABLE 语句支持 LOCK 子句。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.0 and later, the ALTER TABLE statement supports two clauses that are used to implement online DDL:
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.0和更高版本中， ALTER TABLE 语句支持用于实现在线DDL的两个子句：

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.0 and later, the information_schema.INNODB_SYS_TABLES table can also be queried to see the row format used by a table. For example:
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.0和更高版本中，还可以查询 information_schema.INNODB_SYS_TABLES 表以查看表使用的行格式。例如：

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.0 and later, the ALTER TABLE statement supports the ALGORITHM clause. This clause is one of the clauses that is used to implement online DDL. ALTER TABLE supports several different algorithms. An algorithm can be explicitly chosen for an ALTER TABLE operation by setting the ALGORITHM clause. The supported values are:
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.0和更高版本中， ALTER TABLE 语句支持 ALGORITHM 子句。此子句是用于实现在线DDL的子句之一。 ALTER TABLE 支持几种不同的算法。通过设置 ALGORITHM 子句，可以为 ALTER TABLE 操作显式选择一种算法。支持的值为：

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.0 and later, the ALTER TABLE statement supports the LOCK clause. This clause is one of the clauses that is used to implement online DDL. ALTER TABLE supports several different locking strategies. A locking strategy can be explicitly chosen for an ALTER TABLE operation by setting the LOCK clause. The supported values are:
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.0和更高版本中， ALTER TABLE 语句支持 LOCK 子句。此子句是用于实现在线DDL的子句之一。 ALTER TABLE 支持几种不同的锁定策略。通过设置 LOCK 子句，可以为 ALTER TABLE 操作明确选择锁定策略。支持的值为：

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.0 and later, the COPY algorithm refers to the original ALTER TABLE algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.0和更高版本中， COPY 算法引用原始的 ALTER TABLE 算法。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.0 and later, the FORCE option can be used instead. For example, :
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.0和更高版本中，可以改为使用 FORCE 选项。例如， ：

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.0 and later, the INPLACE algorithm is supported.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.0和更高版本中，支持 INPLACE 算法。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.0 and later, the number or size of redo log files can be changed with the following process:
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.0和更高版本中，可以通过以下过程更改重做日志文件的数量或大小：

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.0 and later, this system variable has been deprecated. In those versions, the innodb_stats_transient_sample_pages system variable should be used instead.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.0及更高版本中，不建议使用此系统变量。在这些版本中，应 innodb_stats_transient_sample_pages 系统变量。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.0 and later, this table is no longer used.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.0和更高版本中，不再使用此表。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.1 and above, MariaDB Galera Cluster supports Data at Rest Encryption. See SSTs and Data at Rest Encryption for some disclaimers on how SSTs are affected when encryption is configured.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.1及更高版本中，MariaDB Galera Cluster支持静态数据加密。有关配置加密时如何影响SST的一些免责声明，请参阅SST和静态数据加密。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.1 and before, InnoDB can silently ignore and override some row format choices if you do not have the innodb_file_format system variable set to Barracuda and the innodb_file_per_table system variable set to ON.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.1及更低版本中，如果您没有将 innodb_file_format 系统变量设置为 Barracuda 并将 innodb_file_per_table 系统变量设置为 ON ，则InnoDB可以静默忽略和覆盖某些行格式选择。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.1 and before, MariaDB uses XtraDB by default. In those versions, the checkpoint age can be determined by the Innodb_checkpoint_age status variable.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.1和更低版本中，MariaDB默认使用XtraDB。在那些版本中，检查点寿命可以通过Innodb_checkpoint_age状态变量来确定。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.1 and before, MariaDB's clients and utilities and libmysqlclient are statically linked with the bundled yaSSL library in binary tarballs on Linux.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.1和更低版本中，MariaDB的客户端和实用程序以及libmysqlclient在Linux上的二进制tarball中与捆绑的yaSSL库静态链接。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.1 and before, MariaDB's clients and utilities and libmysqlclient are statically linked with the bundled yaSSL library in MSI and ZIP packages on Windows.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.1及更低版本中，MariaDB的客户端和实用程序以及libmysqlclient与Windows上MSI和ZIP包中捆绑的yaSSL库静态链接。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.1 and before, and in MySQL 5.6 and before, the COMPACT row format was the default row format.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.1和更低版本以及MySQL 5.6和 COMPACT 版本中，COMPACT行格式是默认行格式。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.1 and before, error message localization is supported for the following languages:
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.1和更低版本中，以下语言支持错误消息本地化：

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.1 and before, the Barracuda file format is only supported if the innodb_file_per_table system variable is set to ON. In MariaDB 10.2.2 and later, the default file format is Barracuda and Antelope is deprecated.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.1和 Barracuda 版本中，仅当innodb_file_per_table系统变量设置为 ON 时,才支持梭子鱼文件格式。在MariaDB 10.2.2及更高版本中，默认文件格式为 Barracuda ，不建议使用 Antelope 。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.1 and before, the COMPRESSED row format is also only supported if the table is in a file per-table tablespace. Therefore, the innodb_file_per_table system variable must be set to ON to use this row format in those versions.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.1和更早版本中，仅当表位于每个表的文件表空间中时，才支持 COMPRESSED 行格式。因此，必须将 innodb_file_per_table 系统变量设置为 ON 才能在这些版本中使用此行格式。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.1 and before, the DYNAMIC row format is also only supported if the table is in a file per-table tablespace. Therefore, the innodb_file_per_table system variable must be set to ON to use this row format in those versions.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.1和 DYNAMIC 版本中，仅当表位于每个表的文件表空间中时，才支持DYNAMIC行格式。因此，必须将 innodb_file_per_table 系统变量设置为 ON 才能在这些版本中使用此行格式。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.1 and before, the root@localhost user account can be altered to use unix_socket authentication with the GRANT statement. For example:
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.1和更低版本中，可以将 root@localhost 用户帐户更改为通过 GRANT 语句使用 unix_socket 身份验证。例如：

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.1 and before, the default InnoDB implementation is based on Percona's XtraDB. XtraDB is a performance enhanced fork of InnoDB. For compatibility reasons, the system variables still retain their original innodb prefixes. If the documentation says that something applies to InnoDB, then it usually also applies to the XtraDB fork, unless explicitly stated otherwise. In these versions, it is still possible to use InnoDB instead of XtraDB. See Using InnoDB instead of XtraDB for more information.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.1和更低版本中，默认的InnoDB实现基于Percona的XtraDB。XtraDB是InnoDB的性能增强分支。出于兼容性原因，系统变量仍保留其原始 innodb 前缀。如果文档中说某些内容适用于InnoDB，则除非另有明确说明，否则它通常也适用于XtraDB分支。在这些版本中，仍然可以使用InnoDB代替XtraDB。有关更多信息，请参见使用InnoDB代替XtraDB。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.1 and before, the latter two row formats are also only supported if the table is in a file per-table tablespace. Therefore, the innodb_file_per_table system variable must be set to ON to use these row formats in those versions.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.1及更高版本中，仅当表位于文件每表表空间中时，才支持后两种行格式。因此，必须将 innodb_file_per_table 系统变量设置为 ON 才能在那些版本中使用这些行格式。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.1 and before, the latter two row formats are only supported if the InnoDB file format is Barracuda. Therefore, the innodb_file_format system variable must be set to Barracuda to use these row formats in those versions.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.1及更高版本中，仅当InnoDB文件格式为 Barracuda 时才支持后两种行格式。因此，必须将 innodb_file_format 系统变量设置为 Barracuda 才能在这些版本中使用这些行格式。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.1 and before, to Install the most common packages, execute the following command:
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.1和更低版本中，要安装最常见的软件包，请执行以下命令：

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.1 and earlier, MariaDB's clients and utilities and libmysqlclient are statically linked with the bundled yaSSL libraries in .deb packages provided by Debian's and Ubuntu's default repositories.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.1和更早版本中，MariaDB的客户端和实用程序以及libmysqlclient与Debian和Ubuntu的默认存储库提供的 .deb 软件包中捆绑的yaSSL库静态链接。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.1 and earlier, MariaDB's clients and utilities and libmysqlclient are statically linked with the bundled yaSSL library in .deb packages provided by Debian's and Ubuntu's default repositories.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.1和更早版本中，MariaDB的客户端和实用程序以及libmysqlclient与Debian和Ubuntu的默认存储库提供的 .deb 软件包中捆绑的yaSSL库静态链接。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.1 and later, Mariabackup is the recommended backup method to use instead of Percona XtraBackup.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB的10.1和以后，Mariabackup是改为使用的Percona XtraBackup的推荐的备份方法。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.1 and later, Galera Cluster support has been included in the standard MariaDB Server packages, so you will need to install the MariaDB-server package, as you normally would.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.1和更高版本中，Galera Cluster支持已包含在标准MariaDB Server软件包中，因此您需要像往常一样安装 MariaDB-server 软件包。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.1 and later, Galera Cluster support has been included in the standard MariaDB Server packages, so you will need to install the mariadb-server package, as you normally would.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.1和更高版本中，Galera Cluster支持已包含在标准MariaDB Server软件包中，因此您将需要像 mariadb-server 安装mariadb-server软件包。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.1 and later, InnoDB's page size can be as large as 64k for tables using the following row formats: DYNAMIC, COMPACT, and REDUNDANT.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.1和更高版本中，对于使用以下行格式的表，InnoDB的页面大小可以高达 64k ： DYNAMIC ， COMPACT 和 REDUNDANT 。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.1 and later, InnoDB's page size must still be 16k or less for tables using the COMPRESSED row format.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.1和更高版本中，对于使用 COMPRESSED 行格式的表，InnoDB的页面大小仍必须为 16k 或更小。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.1 and later, a user can disable logging to the slow query log for a connection by setting the slow_query_log system variable to 0. For example:
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.1和更高版本中，用户可以通过将 slow_query_log 系统变量设置为 0 来禁用对连接的慢速查询日志的日志记录。例如：

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.1 and later, an alternative way to compress InnoDB tables is by using InnoDB Page Compression.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.1和更高版本中，压缩InnoDB表的另一种方法是使用InnoDB页面压缩。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.1 and later, if you want to see what version of OpenSSL your server is using, then you can check the value of the version_ssl_library system variable. For example:
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.1和更高版本中，如果要查看服务器使用的OpenSSL版本，则可以检查 version_ssl_library 系统变量的值。例如：

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.1 and later, the MySQL-wsrep patch has been merged into MariaDB Server. This means that the functionality of MariaDB Galera Cluster can be obtained by installing the standard MariaDB Server packages and the Galera wsrep provider library package. The following Galera version corresponds to each MariaDB Server version:
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.1和更高版本中，MySQL-wsrep补丁已合并到MariaDB Server中。这意味着可以通过安装标准MariaDB Server软件包和Galera wsrep提供程序库软件包来获得MariaDB Galera Cluster的功能。以下Galera版本与每个MariaDB Server版本相对应：

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.1 and later, the implementation of this system variable is the version from MySQL 5.6.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.1和更高版本中，此系统变量的实现是MySQL 5.6的版本。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.1 and later, the value of the innodb_page_size system variable can be set to 32k and 64k. This is especially useful because the larger page size permits more columns using the VARBINARY, VARCHAR, BLOB and TEXT data types. Regardless, even when the value of the innodb_page_size system variable is set to some value higher than 16k, 16 is still the maximum value for the KEY_BLOCK_SIZE table option for InnoDB tables using the COMPRESSED row format.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.1和更高版本中，可以将 innodb_page_size 系统变量的值设置为 32k 和 64k 。这特别有用，因为较大的页面大小允许使用 VARBINARY ， VARCHAR ， BLOB 和 TEXT 数据类型的更多列。无论如何，即使将 innodb_page_size 系统变量的值设置为大于 16k 的某个值，使用 COMPRESSED 行格式的InnoDB表， KEY_BLOCK_SIZE 表选项的最大值仍为 16 。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.1 and later, you can dynamically enable this feature using a SET GLOBAL statement. For example:
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.1和更高版本中，您可以使用 SET GLOBAL 语句动态地启用此功能。例如：

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.1, Mariabackup is the recommended backup method to use instead of Percona XtraBackup.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB的10.1，Mariabackup是改为使用的Percona XtraBackup的推荐的备份方法。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.1, Percona XtraBackup 2.3 is supported if InnoDB page compression is not used, and if data at rest encryption is not used, and if innodb_page_size is set to 16k.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.1中，如果不使用InnoDB页面压缩，不使用静态数据加密以及innodb_page_size设置为 16k ，则支持Percona XtraBackup 2.3 。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.2 and before, InnoDB can be configured to use the punch hole technique to create sparse files by configuring the innodb_use_trim and innodb_use_fallocate system variables. These system variables can be set in a server option group in an option file prior to starting up the server. For example:
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.2和 innodb_use_trim ，可以通过配置innodb_use_trim和 innodb_use_fallocate 系统变量来配置InnoDB使用穿孔技术来创建稀疏文件。在启动服务器之前，可以在选项文件的服务器选项组中设置这些系统变量。例如：

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.2 and before, semisynchronous replication requires the user to install a plugin on both the master and the slave before it can be enabled.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.2及更低版本中，半同步复制需要用户在主服务器和从服务器上都安装一个插件，然后才能启用它。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.2 and before, the old_alter_table system variable can be used to specify whether the COPY algorithm should be used.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.2及 old_alter_table ，old_alter_table系统变量可用于指定是否应使用 COPY 算法。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.2 and before, the default file format for InnoDB tables can be chosen by setting the innodb_file_format.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.2和更低版本中，可以通过设置innodb_file_format来选择InnoDB表的默认文件格式。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.2 and before, the purge process wouldn't touch the value of the row's DB_TRX_ID column.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.2及 DB_TRX_ID ，清除过程不会涉及该行的DB_TRX_ID列的值。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.2 and later, MariaDB Connector/C has been included as the client library.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.2和更高版本中，MariaDB Connector / C已包含为客户端库。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.2 and later, MariaDB Connector/C has been included as the client library. However, the package name for the client library has not been changed.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.2和更高版本中，MariaDB Connector / C已包含为客户端库。但是，客户端库的软件包名称未更改。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.2 and later, MariaDB Connector/C has been included with MariaDB Server, and the bundled and the clients and utilities are linked with it. On some platforms, MariaDB Connector/C and these clients and utilities may use a different TLS library than the one used by MariaDB Server and libmysqlclient.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.2和更高版本中，MariaDB Server / MariaDB已包含MariaDB Connector / C，并且捆绑的客户端和实用程序已与其链接。在某些平台上，MariaDB Connector / C以及这些客户端和实用程序可能使用与MariaDB Server和libmysqlclient使用的TLS库不同的TLS库。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.2 and later, mysql is linked with MariaDB Connector/C. However, MariaDB Connector/C does not yet handle the parsing of option files for this client. That is still performed by the server option file parsing code. See MDEV-19035 for more information.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.2和更高版本中， mysql 与MariaDB Connector / C链接。但是，MariaDB Connector / C尚未处理此客户端的选项文件的解析。这仍然由服务器选项文件解析代码执行。有关更多信息，请参见MDEV-19035。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.2 and later, mysql_upgrade is linked with MariaDB Connector/C. However, MariaDB Connector/C does not yet handle the parsing of option files for this client. That is still performed by the server option file parsing code. See MDEV-19035 for more information.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.2和更高版本中， mysql_upgrade 与MariaDB Connector / C链接。但是，MariaDB Connector / C尚未处理此客户端的选项文件的解析。这仍然由服务器选项文件解析代码执行。有关更多信息，请参见MDEV-19035。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.2 and later, mysqladmin is linked with MariaDB Connector/C. However, MariaDB Connector/C does not yet handle the parsing of option files for this client. That is still performed by the server option file parsing code. See MDEV-19035 for more information.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.2和更高版本中， mysqladmin 与MariaDB Connector / C链接。但是，MariaDB Connector / C尚未处理此客户端的选项文件的解析。这仍然由服务器选项文件解析代码执行。有关更多信息，请参见MDEV-19035。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.2 and later, mysqlbinlog is linked with MariaDB Connector/C. However, MariaDB Connector/C does not yet handle the parsing of option files for this client. That is still performed by the server option file parsing code. See MDEV-19035 for more information.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.2和更高版本中， mysqlbinlog 与MariaDB Connector / C链接。但是，MariaDB Connector / C尚未处理此客户端的选项文件的解析。这仍然由服务器选项文件解析代码执行。有关更多信息，请参见MDEV-19035。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.2 and later, mysqlcheck is linked with MariaDB Connector/C. However, MariaDB Connector/C does not yet handle the parsing of option files for this client. That is still performed by the server option file parsing code. See MDEV-19035 for more information.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.2和更高版本中， mysqlcheck 与MariaDB Connector / C链接。但是，MariaDB Connector / C尚未处理此客户端的选项文件的解析。这仍然由服务器选项文件解析代码执行。有关更多信息，请参见MDEV-19035。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.2 and later, mysqldump is linked with MariaDB Connector/C. However, MariaDB Connector/C does not yet handle the parsing of option files for this client. That is still performed by the server option file parsing code. See MDEV-19035 for more information.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.2和更高版本中， mysqldump 与MariaDB Connector / C链接。但是，MariaDB Connector / C尚未处理此客户端的选项文件的解析。这仍然由服务器选项文件解析代码执行。有关更多信息，请参见MDEV-19035。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.2 and later, mysqlimport is linked with MariaDB Connector/C. Therefore, it may be helpful to see Configuring MariaDB Connector/C with Option Files for more information on how MariaDB Connector/C handles option files.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.2和更高版本中， mysqlimport 与MariaDB Connector / C链接。因此，有关使用MariaDB Connector / C处理选项文件的更多信息，请参阅使用选项文件配置MariaDB Connector / C。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.2 and later, mysqlshow is linked with MariaDB Connector/C. However, MariaDB Connector/C does not yet handle the parsing of option files for this client. That is still performed by the server option file parsing code. See MDEV-19035 for more information.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.2和更高版本中， mysqlshow 与MariaDB Connector / C链接。但是，MariaDB Connector / C尚未处理此客户端的选项文件的解析。这仍然由服务器选项文件解析代码执行。有关更多信息，请参见MDEV-19035。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.2 and later, mysqlslap is linked with MariaDB Connector/C. However, MariaDB Connector/C does not yet handle the parsing of option files for this client. That is still performed by the server option file parsing code. See MDEV-19035 for more information.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.2和更高版本中， mysqlslap 与MariaDB Connector / C链接。但是，MariaDB Connector / C尚未处理此客户端的选项文件的解析。这仍然由服务器选项文件解析代码执行。有关更多信息，请参见MDEV-19035。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.2 and later, MariaDB Server can create multiple instances of the table open cache. It initially creates just a single instance. However, whenever it detects contention on the existing instances, it will automatically create a new instance. When the number of instances has been increased due to contention, it does not decrease again.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.2和更高版本中，MariaDB Server可以创建表打开缓存的多个实例。它最初仅创建一个实例。但是，只要它检测到现有实例上的争用，它将自动创建一个新实例。当实例数由于争用而增加时，它不会再次减少。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.2 and later, MariaDB uses InnoDB. In those versions, the checkpoint age can be determined by the process shown below.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.2和更高版本中，MariaDB使用InnoDB。在那些版本中，检查点使用期限可以通过以下所示的过程确定。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.2 and later, MariaDB's clients and utilities and MariaDB Connector/C are are dynamically linked with the system's Schannel libraries in MSI and ZIP packages on Windows. libmysqlclient is still statically linked with the bundled yaSSL library.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.2和更高版本中，MariaDB的客户端和实用程序以及MariaDB Connector / C与Windows上MSI和ZIP包中系统的Schannel库动态链接。libmysqlclient仍然与捆绑的yaSSL库静态链接。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.2 and later, MariaDB's clients and utilities and MariaDB Connector/C are dynamically linked with the system's GnuTLS libraries in .deb packages provided by Debian's and Ubuntu's default repositories. libmysqlclient is still statically linked with the bundled yaSSL libraries.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.2和更高版本中，MariaDB的客户端和实用程序以及MariaDB Connector / C在Debian和Ubuntu的默认存储库提供的 .deb 软件包中与系统的GnuTLS库动态链接。libmysqlclient仍与捆绑的yaSSL库静态链接。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.2 and later, MariaDB's clients and utilities and MariaDB Connector/C are dynamically linked with the system's GnuTLS library in .deb packages provided by Debian's and Ubuntu's default repositories. libmysqlclient is still statically linked with the bundled yaSSL libraries.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.2和更高版本中，MariaDB的客户端和实用程序以及MariaDB Connector / C在Debian和Ubuntu的默认存储库提供的 .deb 软件包中与系统的GnuTLS库动态链接。libmysqlclient仍与捆绑的yaSSL库静态链接。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.2 and later, MariaDB's clients and utilities and MariaDB Connector/C are statically linked with the GnuTLS library in binary tarballs on Linux. libmysqlclient is still statically linked with the bundled yaSSL library.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.2和更高版本中，MariaDB的客户端和实用程序以及MariaDB Connector / C在Linux上的二进制tarball中与GnuTLS库静态链接。libmysqlclient仍与绑定的yaSSL库静态链接。

trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.2和更高版本中，以下语言支持错误消息本地化：

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.2 and later, perform the following process:
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.2和更高版本中，执行以下过程：

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.2 and later, the DYNAMIC row format is the default row format. If your tables were originally created on one of these newer versions, then they may already be using this row format. In that case, you may need to try the next solution.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.2和更高版本中， DYNAMIC 行格式是默认行格式。如果您的表最初是在这些较新版本之一上创建的，则它们可能已经在使用此行格式。在这种情况下，您可能需要尝试下一个解决方案。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.2 and later, the root@localhost user account can be altered to use unix_socket authentication with the ALTER USER statement. For example:
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.2和更高版本中，可以将 root@localhost 用户帐户更改为通过 ALTER USER 语句使用 unix_socket 身份验证。例如：

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.2 and later, the default InnoDB implementation is based on InnoDB from MySQL 5.7. See Why MariaDB uses InnoDB instead of XtraDB from MariaDB 10.2 for more information.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.2和更高版本中，默认的InnoDB实现基于MySQL 5.7中的InnoDB。有关更多信息，请参见为什么MariaDB使用InnoDB而不是MariaDB 10.2中的XtraDB。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.2, Mariabackup is the recommended backup method to use instead of Percona XtraBackup.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB的10.2，Mariabackup是改为使用Percona的XtraBackup推荐的备份方法。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.2, Percona XtraBackup 2.4 is supported in some cases if InnoDB page compression is not used, and if data at rest encryption is not used, and if innodb_page_size is set to 16k.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.2中，如果不使用InnoDB页面压缩，不使用静态数据加密以及innodb_page_size设置为 16k ，则在某些情况下支持Percona XtraBackup 2.4 。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.3 and before, SET PASSWORD (with or without PASSWORD()) only works for accounts authenticated via mysql_native_password or mysql_old_password authentication plugins
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.3和 mysql_native_password ， SET PASSWORD （带有或不带有 PASSWORD() ）仅适用于通过mysql_native_password或 mysql_old_password 身份验证插件进行身份验证的帐户

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.3 and before, mysql_install_db sets --auth-root-authentication-method=normal by default. When this is set, the following default accounts are created with no password:
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.3及 --auth-root-authentication-method=normal ， mysql_install_db 默认设置--auth-root-authentication-method = normal。设置此选项后，将创建以下默认帐户，并且不设置密码：

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.3 and before, InnoDB does not support key rotation for the Redo Log. Key rotation for the Redo Log is supported in MariaDB 10.4 and later. See InnoDB / XtraDB Encryption Keys: Key Rotation for more information.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.3和更低版本中，InnoDB不支持重做日志的键旋转。MariaDB 10.4和更高版本支持重做日志的键旋转。有关更多信息，请参见InnoDB / XtraDB加密密钥：密钥旋转。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.3 and before, MariaDB Galera Cluster uses Galera 3. This means that the MySQL-wsrep patch is version 25 and the Galera wsrep provider library is version 3.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB的10.3和前，MariaDB的加莱拉Cluster使用加莱拉 3.这意味着在MySQL-wsrep补丁版本25和加莱拉wsrep提供程序库是第3版。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.3 and before, a user account is only able to have one authentication method at a time. In these versions, this means that once you enable unix_socket authentication for the root@localhost user account, you will no longer be able to use a password to log in with that user account. The user account will only be able to use unix_socket authentication.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.3及更低版本中，一个用户帐户一次只能使用一种身份验证方法。在这些版本中，这意味着一旦为 root@localhost 用户帐户启用 unix_socket 身份验证，您将不再能够使用密码登录该用户帐户。该用户帐户将只能使用 unix_socket 身份验证。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.3 and before, it is recommended to manually switchover slaves to a new master before shutting down the old master.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.3及更低版本中，建议在关闭旧的主服务器之前手动将从服务器切换到新的主服务器。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.3 and before, the BACKUP STAGE commands are not supported, so Mariabackup executes the FLUSH TABLES WITH READ LOCK command to lock the database. When the backup is complete, it executes the UNLOCK TABLES command to unlock the database.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.3和更低版本中，不支持 BACKUP STAGE 命令，因此Mariabackup执行带 FLUSH TABLES WITH READ LOCK 的FLUSH TABLES WITH READ LOCK命令来锁定数据库。备份完成后，它将执行 UNLOCK TABLES 命令来解锁数据库。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.3 and before, the PASSWORD() function and SET PASSWORD statement did not work with the ed25519 authentication plugin. Instead, you would have to use the UDF that comes with the authentication plugin to calculate the password hash. For example:
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.3和 ed25519 ， PASSWORD() 函数和 SET PASSWORD 语句不适用于ed25519身份验证插件。相反，您必须使用身份验证插件随附的UDF来计算密码哈希。例如：

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.3 and before, this table uses the MyISAM storage engine.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.3和更低版本中，此表使用MyISAM存储引擎。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.3 and before, this table was created the MyISAM storage engine.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.3及更低版本中，此表是MyISAM存储引擎创建的。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.3 and before, to Install the most common packages, execute the following command:
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.3和更低版本中，要安装最常见的软件包，请执行以下命令：

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.3 and before, to install MariaDB Galera Cluster, you could execute the following command:
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.3和更低版本中，要安装MariaDB Galera Cluster，可以执行以下命令：

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.3 and before, to install the arbitrator package, you could execute the following command:
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.3及更低版本中，要安装仲裁程序包，您可以执行以下命令：

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.3 and before, you also need to install the galera package to obtain the Galera 3 wsrep provider library.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB的10.3和前，你还需要安装 galera 包获得加莱拉 3 wsrep供应商库。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.3 and before, you can find MariaDB's error log messages by searching for the SourceMySQL.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.3及更低版本中，您可以通过搜索Source MySQL 来查找MariaDB的错误日志消息。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.3 and before, you need to install the unix_socket plugin before you can configure the root@localhost user account to use it. For example:
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.3和更低版本中，需要先安装unix_socket插件，然后才能配置 root@localhost 用户帐户使用它。例如：

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.3 and below, the following server-side authentication plugins are installed by default:
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.3和更低版本中，默认情况下安装了以下服务器端身份验证插件：

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.3 and later, Mariabackup is the recommended backup method to use instead of Percona XtraBackup.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB的10.3及更高版本，Mariabackup是改为使用Percona的XtraBackup推荐的备份方法。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.3 and later, InnoDB uses the punch hole technique to create sparse files used automatically when the underlying file system supports sparse files.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.3和更高版本中，InnoDB使用打孔技术创建当基础文件系统支持稀疏文件时自动使用的稀疏文件。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.3 and later, Percona XtraBackup is not supported.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.3和更高版本中，不支持Percona XtraBackup。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.3 and later, semisynchronous replication is built into the server, so it can be enabled immediately in those versions.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.3和更高版本中，服务器中内置了半同步复制，因此可以在那些版本中立即启用它。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.3 and later, the alter_algorithm system variable can be used to pick the least efficient algorithm that the user is willing to accept.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.3和更高版本中， alter_algorithm 系统变量可用于选择用户愿意接受的效率最低的算法。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.3 and later, the INSTANT algorithm is supported.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.3和更高版本中，支持 INSTANT 算法。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.3 and later, the NOCOPY algorithm is supported.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.3和更高版本中，支持 NOCOPY 算法。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.3 and later, the above operation would actually use the INSTANT algorithm, because the ADD COLUMN operation supports the INSTANT algorithm, and the INSTANT algorithm is more efficient than the INPLACE algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.3和更高版本中，上述操作实际上将使用 INSTANT 算法，因为 ADD COLUMN 操作支持 INSTANT 算法，并且 INSTANT 算法比 INPLACE 算法更有效。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.3 and later, this mode also configures the server to understand a large subset of Oracle's PL/SQL language instead of MariaDB's traditional syntax for stored routines. See SQL_MODE=ORACLE From MariaDB 10.3.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.3和更高版本中，此模式还将服务器配置为了解Oracle的PL / SQL语言的很大一部分，而不是MariaDB的存储例程的传统语法。请参阅MariaDB 10.3中的SQL_MODE = ORACLE。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.3, ALTER TABLE … DROP COLUMN requires the table to be rebuilt. In MariaDB 10.4, this restriction has been lifted.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.3中， ALTER TABLE … DROP COLUMN 要求重建表。在MariaDB 10.4中，此限制已取消。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.3, Percona XtraBackup is not supported. See Percona XtraBackup Overview: Compatibility with MariaDB for more information.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.3中，不支持 Percona XtraBackup 。有关更多信息，请参见Percona XtraBackup概述：与MariaDB的兼容性。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.3, instant ALTER TABLE ... ADD COLUMN only applies when the added columns appear last in the table. The place specifier LAST is the default. If AFTER col is specified, then col must be the last column, or the operation will require the table to be rebuilt. In MariaDB 10.4, this restriction has been lifted.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.3中，仅当添加的列出现在表的最后时，即时 ALTER TABLE ... ADD COLUMN 才适用。位置说明符 LAST 是默认设置。如果指定了 AFTER col，则col必须是最后一列，否则该操作将需要重建表。在MariaDB 10.4中，此限制已取消。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.4 and before, thread creation is throttled when a thread group has more than 3 threads:
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.4和更低版本中，当线程组具有3个以上线程时，将限制线程创建：

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.4 and later, SET PASSWORD (with or without PASSWORD()) works for accounts authenticated via any authentication plugin that supports passwords stored in the mysql.global_priv table.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.4和更高版本中， SET PASSWORD （带有或不带有 PASSWORD() ）适用于通过支持存储在 mysql.global_priv 表中的密码的任何身份验证插件进行身份验证的帐户。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.4 and later, mysql_install_db sets --auth-root-authentication-method=socket by default. When this is set, the default root@localhost user account is created with the ability to use two authentication plugins:
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.4和更高版本中， mysql_install_db 默认情况下设置 --auth-root-authentication-method=socket 。设置此选项后，将使用两个身份验证插件创建默认的 root@localhost 用户帐户：

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.4 and later, InnoDB supports adding columns to a table with ALGORITHM set to INSTANT, regardless of where in the column list the new column is added.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.4和更高版本中，InnoDB支持将列添加到 ALGORITHM 设置为 INSTANT 的表中，而不管在新列表中列的添加位置如何。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.4 and later, InnoDB supports dropping columns from a table with ALGORITHM set to INSTANT. See MDEV-15562 for more information.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.4和更高版本中，InnoDB支持从 ALGORITHM 设置为 INSTANT 的表中删除列。有关更多信息，请参见MDEV-15562。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.4 and later, InnoDB supports dropping columns from a table with ALGORITHM set to NOCOPY in the cases where the operation supports having the ALGORITHM clause set to INSTANT.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.4和更高版本中，在操作支持将 ALGORITHM 子句设置为 INSTANT 的情况下，InnoDB支持从 ALGORITHM 设置为 NOCOPY 的表中删除列。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.4 and later, InnoDB supports reordering columns within a table with ALGORITHM set to INSTANT. See MDEV-15562 for more information.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.4和更高版本中，InnoDB支持将 ALGORITHM 设置为 INSTANT 的表中的列重新排序。有关更多信息，请参见MDEV-15562。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.4 and later, InnoDB supports reordering columns within a table with ALGORITHM set to NOCOPY in the cases where the operation supports having the ALGORITHM clause set to INSTANT.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.4和更高版本中，在操作支持将 ALGORITHM 子句设置为 INSTANT 的情况下，InnoDB支持将 ALGORITHM 设置为 NOCOPY 的表中的列重新排序。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.4 and later, MariaDB Galera Cluster uses Galera 4. This means that the MySQL-wsrep patch is version 26 and the Galera wsrep provider library is version 4.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB的10.4和以后，MariaDB的加莱拉Cluster使用加莱拉 4.这意味着，在MySQL-wsrep补丁版本26和加莱拉wsrep提供程序库是版本4。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.4 and later, a user account can be associated with multiple authentication plugins.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.4和更高版本中，一个用户帐户可以与多个身份验证插件关联。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.4 and later, a user account can be defined to use multiple authentication plugins in a specific order of preference. This specific scenario may be more noticeable in these versions, since an account could be associated with some authentication plugins that require a password, and some that do not.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.4和更高版本中，可以将用户帐户定义为以特定的优先顺序使用多个身份验证插件。由于一个帐户可能与某些需要密码的身份验证插件相关联，而某些不需要密码，因此该特定方案在这些版本中可能更引人注意。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.4 and later, it is still not possible to enable this behavior by default. This means that this behavior is currently inaccessible when shutting down the server using tools like systemd or sysVinit.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.4和更高版本中，默认情况下仍无法启用此行为。这意味着使用诸如 systemd 或 sysVinit 之类的工具关闭服务器时，当前无法访问此行为。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.4 and later, the BACKUP STAGE commands are supported. However, the version of Mariabackup that is bundled with MariaDB Community Server does not yet use the BACKUP STAGE commands in the most efficient way. Mariabackup simply executes the following BACKUP STAGE commands to lock the database:
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.4和更高版本中，支持 BACKUP STAGE 命令。但是，与MariaDB社区服务器捆绑在一起的Mariabackup版本尚未以最有效的方式使用 BACKUP STAGE 命令。Mariabackup只需执行以下 BACKUP STAGE 命令即可锁定数据库：

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.4 and later, the mysql.global_priv table has replaced the mysql.user table, and mysql.user is now a view.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.4和更高版本中， mysql.global_priv table 已替换 mysql.user 表，并且 mysql.user 现在是view。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.4 and later, the use_stat_tables system variable is set to preferably_for_queries by default. With this value, engine-independent statistics are used by default, but they are not collected by default. If you want to use engine-independent statistics with the default configuration, then you will have to collect them by executing the ANALYZE TABLE statement and by specifying the PERSISTENT FOR clause. It is recommended to collect engine-independent statistics on as-needed basis, so typically one will not have engine-independent statistics for all indexes/all columns.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB的10.4和以后， use_stat_tables 系统变量设置为 preferably_for_queries 默认。使用此值，默认情况下使用独立于引擎的统计信息，但默认情况下不收集它们。如果要使用默认配置的独立于引擎的统计信息，则必须通过执行 ANALYZE TABLE 语句并指定 PERSISTENT FOR 子句来收集它们。建议根据需要收集与引擎无关的统计信息，因此通常不会为所有索引/所有列提供与引擎无关的统计信息。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.4 and later, the FLUSH SSL command can be used to dynamically reinitialize the server's TLS context.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.4和更高版本中，可以使用 FLUSH SSL 命令动态地重新初始化服务器的TLS上下文。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.4 and later, the FLUSH SSL command can be used to dynamically reinitialize the server's TLS context. This is most useful if you need to replace a certificate that is about to expire without restarting the server.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.4和更高版本中，可以使用 FLUSH SSL 命令动态地重新初始化服务器的TLS上下文。如果您需要替换即将过期的证书而无需重新启动服务器，这将非常有用。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.4 and later, the USING or AS keyword can also be used to provide a plain-text password to a plugin if it's provided as an argument to the PASSWORD() function. This is only valid for authentication plugins that have implemented a hook for the PASSWORD() function. For example, the ed25519 authentication plugin supports this:
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.4和更高版本中，如果将 USING 或 AS 关键字作为PASSWORD（）函数的参数提供，则也可以使用该关键字为插件提供纯文本密码。这仅对已实现PASSWORD（）函数挂钩的身份验证插件有效。例如， ed25519 身份验证插件支持以下功能：

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.4 and later, the following server-side authentication plugins are installed by default:
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.4和更高版本中，默认情况下安装了以下服务器端身份验证插件：

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.4 and later, the the root@localhost user account is configured to use unix_socket authentication by default, so this part can be skipped in those versions.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.4和更高版本中，默认情况下 root@localhost 用户帐户配置为使用 unix_socket 身份验证，因此在那些版本中可以跳过此部分。

trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.4和更高版本中，可以通过使用 mysqladmin 实用程序或 SHUTDOWN 命令关闭服务器并提供特殊选项来解决此问题。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.4 and later, this problem can be solved by shutting down the server with the mysqladmin utility and by providing the --wait-for-all-slaves option to the utility and by executing the shutdown command with the utility. For example:
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.4和更高版本中，可以通过使用 mysqladmin 实用程序关闭服务器并为实用程序提供 --wait-for-all-slaves 选项，并通过使用该实用程序执行 shutdown 命令来解决此问题。例如：

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.4 and later, this table is no longer created. However if the table is created it will be used.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.4和更高版本中，不再创建该表。但是，如果创建了表，则将使用它。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.4 and later, this table uses the Aria storage engine.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.4和更高版本中，此表使用Aria存储引擎。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.4 and later, to Install the most common packages, execute the following command:
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.4和更高版本中，要安装最常用的软件包，请执行以下命令：

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.4 and later, to install MariaDB Galera Cluster, you could execute the following command:
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.4和更高版本中，要安装MariaDB Galera Cluster，您可以执行以下命令：

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.4 and later, to install the arbitrator package, you could execute the following command:
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.4和更高版本中，要安装仲裁程序包，可以执行以下命令：

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.4 and later, you also need to install the galera-4 package to obtain the Galera 4 wsrep provider library.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.4和更高版本中，您还需要安装 galera-4 软件包以获得Galera 4 wsrep提供程序库。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.4 and later, you can change a user account's password by executing the SET PASSWORD statement followed by the PASSWORD() function and providing the plain-text password as an argument. For example:
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.4和更高版本中，可以通过执行 SET PASSWORD 语句后跟 PASSWORD() 函数并提供纯文本密码作为参数来更改用户帐户的密码。例如：

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.4 and later, you can create a user account by executing the CREATE USER statement and providing the IDENTIFIED VIA clause followied by the the name of the plugin, which is ed25519, and providing the the USING clause followed by the PASSWORD() function with the plain-text password as an argument. For example:
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB的10.4及更高版本，可以通过执行创建用户帐户 CREATE USER 语句，并提供 IDENTIFIED VIA 的插件，这是的名称followied条款 ed25519 ，并提供了 USING 条款其次 PASSWORD() 函数以纯文本密码作为参数。例如：

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.4 and later, you can find MariaDB's error log messages by searching for the SourceMariaDB.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.4和更高版本中，您可以通过搜索Source MariaDB 来查找MariaDB的错误日志消息。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.4 and later, you can use the CAST() function with the INTERVAL keyword.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.4和更高版本中，可以将 CAST() 函数与 INTERVAL 关键字一起使用。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.4, it is possible to set a Unique index on a column that uses the BLOB data type. In previous releases this was not possible, as the index would only guarantee the uniqueness of a fixed number of characters.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.4中，可以在使用 BLOB 数据类型的列上设置唯一索引。在以前的版本中，这是不可能的，因为索引只能保证固定数量的字符的唯一性。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.4, the following DEBs are available:
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.4中，可以使用以下DEB：

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.4, the following RPMs are available:
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.4中，可以使用以下RPM：

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.5 and later, thread creation is not throttled until a thread group has more than 1 + thread_pool_oversubscribe threads:
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.5和更高版本中，直到线程组具有1个以上的线程+ thread_pool_oversubscribe 线程，才会限制线程的创建：

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.5, this system variable is deprecated.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.5中，不建议使用此系统变量。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 5.1 it was known as maria_chk.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 5.1中，它称为 maria_chk 。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 5.2, you will get a warning if you try to update a virtual column. In MariaDB 5.3 and later, this warning will be converted to an error if strict mode is enabled in sql_mode.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 5.2中，如果尝试更新虚拟列，则会收到警告。在MariaDB 5.3和更高版本中，如果在 sql_mode 中启用了严格模式，此警告将转换为错误。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 5.3 and above, the server supports group commit. This is an important optimization that helps MariaDB reduce the number of expensive disk operations that are performed.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 5.3及更高版本中，服务器支持组提交。这是一项重要的优化，可帮助MariaDB减少执行的昂贵磁盘操作的数量。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 5.3 it takes less than a minute to run the same query. The EXPLAIN shows that the subquery remains uncorrelated, which is an indication that it is being executed via subquery materialization.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 5.3中，运行同一查询不到一分钟。EXPLAIN显示子查询保持不相关，这表明它是通过子查询实现来执行的。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 5.3 we added an optimizer switch which allows you to specify which algorithms will be considered when optimizing a query.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 5.3中，我们添加了一个优化器开关，该开关可让您指定优化查询时将考虑的算法。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 5.3 you will also get progress reporting for LOAD DATA INFILE.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB的5.3，你也将获得进展报告的 LOAD DATA INFILE 。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 5.3, when index_merge_sort_intersection is enabled, index_merge intersection plans can be constructed from non-equality conditions:
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB的5.3，当 index_merge_sort_intersection 被启用， index_merge 相交计划可以由不相等的条件构成：

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 5.5 and before there could only be one TIMESTAMP column per table that had CURRENT_TIMESTAMP defined as its default value. This limit has no longer applied since MariaDB 10.0.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 5.5及更低版本中，每个表只能有一个TIMESTAMP列，其CURRENT_TIMESTAMP定义为其默认值。自MariaDB 10.0起，该限制不再适用。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 5.5 and before, ALTER TABLE operations required making a temporary copy of the table, which can be slow for large tables.

trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 5.5中，此系统变量的实现是由Percona实现的实验版本，在XtraDB 5.5.30-30.2中已弃用。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 5.5, which is built using cmake, Makefile.PL is not generated automatically. If you want to run the perl tests, you will need to create it manually from Makefile.PL.in. It is fairly easy to do by replacing LIB and INC values with the correct ones. Also, libhsclient.so is not built by default; libhsclient.a can be found in plugin/handler_socket folder.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB的5.5，这是使用内置 cmake ， Makefile.PL 是不会自动生成。如果要运行perl测试，则需要从 Makefile.PL.in 手动创建它。通过用正确的值替换 LIB 和 INC 值，这很容易做到。另外，默认情况下不会构建 libhsclient.so 。 libhsclient.a 可以在 plugin/handler_socket 文件夹中找到。

trans-unit.source: In XtraDB/InnoDB tables, all indexes contain the primary key as a suffix. Thus, when using this storage engine, keeping the primary key as small as possible is particularly important. If a primary key does not exist and there are no UNIQUE indexes, InnoDB creates a 6-bytes clustered index which is invisible to the user.
trans-unit.target: 在XtraDB / InnoDB表中，所有索引都包含主键作为后缀。因此，在使用该存储引擎时，保持主键尽可能小尤为重要。如果主键不存在并且没有UNIQUE索引，InnoDB将创建一个6字节的聚集索引，该索引对于用户是不可见的。

trans-unit.source: In MySQL 5.7 changelog, one can find this passage:
trans-unit.target: 在MySQL 5.7 changelog中，可以找到以下段落：

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.0.0 and before, this system variable was an alias for the have_ssl system variable.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.0.0及 have_ssl ，此系统变量是have_ssl系统变量的别名。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.0.1 and later, if this system variable shows YES, then the server is linked with OpenSSL.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.0.1和更高版本中，如果此系统变量显示 YES ，则服务器已与OpenSSL链接。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.0.1, column names can be either numbers or strings. Also, the COLUMN_JSON and COLUMN_CHECK functions were added.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.0.1中，列名称可以是数字或字符串。此外，还添加了 COLUMN_JSON 和 COLUMN_CHECK 函数。

trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.0.10及更高版本中，此语句确保 ALTER TABLE 语句不复制该表。

This option is usually defined as /etc when building RPM packages, but it is usually not defined when building DEB packages or binary tarballs.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.0.13和更高版本中，位置取决于建立MariaDB时是否定义了 DEFAULT_SYSCONFDIR cmake 选项。在构建RPM软件包时，此选项通常定义为 /etc ，但在构建DEB软件包或二进制tarball时，通常不定义此选项。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.0.2 FederatedX got support for assisted table discovery.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.0.2中， FederatedX获得了对辅助表发现的支持。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.0.2 and later, IF EXISTS and IF NOT EXISTS clauses have been added for the following:
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.0.2和更高版本中，为以下内容添加了 IF EXISTS 和 IF NOT EXISTS 子句：

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.0.2 only, the syntax master_use_gtid=0|1 was used instead of master_use_gtid=no|current_pos. The master_use_gtid=slave_pos option did not have any equivalent.
trans-unit.target: 仅在MariaDB 10.0.2中，使用语法 master_use_gtid=0|1 代替 master_use_gtid=no|current_pos 。该 master_use_gtid=slave_pos 选项没有任何等价的。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.0.22 and later, a slave will apply any events it gets from the master, regardless of the binary log format. The binlog_format system variable only applies to normal (not replicated) updates.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.0.22和更高版本中，从属服务器将应用从主控服务器获得的所有事件，而不管二进制日志格式如何。该 binlog_format 系统变量仅适用于正常（不重复）的更新。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.0.5 and later you have:
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.0.5和更高版本中，您具有：

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.0.5 it was un-deprecated, and since then displays all members and sponsors of the MariaDB Foundation as well as other financial contributors.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.0.5中，此版本已弃用，此后显示了MariaDB基金会的所有成员和赞助者以及其他财务贡献者。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.0.5, applications can pass key/value connection attributes to the server when a connection is made. The session_connect_attrs and session_account_connect_attrs tables provide access to this information, for all sessions and the current session respectively.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.0.5中，建立连接后，应用程序可以将键/值连接属性传递给服务器。该session_connect_attrs和 session_account_connect_attrs 表提供了获取这些信息，分别为所有会话和当前会话。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.0.5, applications can pass key/value connection attributes to the server when a connection is made. The session_connect_attrs and session_account_connect_attrs tables provide access to this information, for all sessions and the current session respectively.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.0.5中，建立连接后，应用程序可以将键/值连接属性传递给服务器。该 session_connect_attrs 和session_account_connect_attrs表提供了获取这些信息，分别为所有会话和当前会话。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.0.7 and MariaDB 5.5.35, EXTRACT (HOUR FROM ...) was changed to return a value from 0 to 23, adhering to the SQL standard. Until MariaDB 10.0.6 and MariaDB 5.5.34, and in all versions of MySQL at least as of MySQL 5.7, it could return a value > 23. HOUR() is not a standard function, so continues to adhere to the old behaviour inherited from MySQL.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.0.7和MariaDB 5.5.35中，对 EXTRACT (HOUR FROM ...) 进行了更改，以遵循SQL标准返回从0到23的值。直到MariaDB 10.0.6和MariaDB 5.5.34为止，并且在所有MySQL版本中，至少从MySQL 5.7开始，它可能返回> 23的值。HOUR（）不是标准函数，因此继续遵循继承的旧行为从MySQL。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.0.7 and before, the relay_log_purge system variable was silently set to 0 when CHANGE MASTER was executed.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.0.7及 relay_log_purge ，当执行 CHANGE MASTER 时，relay_log_purge系统变量被静默设置为 0 。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.0.8 and before, the default InnoDB implementation is based on InnoDB from MySQL. In these versions, Percona's XtraDB is available to use as a dynamic plugin. To use XtraDB in these versions, the ignore_builtin_innodb system variable needs to be set, and the ha_xtradb plugin needs to be loaded with the plugin_load option. Both can be set in a server option group in an option file prior to starting up the server. See Installing Plugins for more information. For example:
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.0.8及更低版本中，默认的InnoDB实现基于MySQL的InnoDB。在这些版本中，Percona的XtraDB可用作动态插件。要在这些版本中使用XtraDB，需要设置 ignore_builtin_innodb 系统变量，并且必须使用 plugin_load 选项加载 ha_xtradb 插件。在启动服务器之前，都可以在选项文件的服务器选项组中设置两者。有关更多信息，请参见安装插件。例如：

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.1.2 a new temporal format was introduced from MySQL 5.6 that alters how the TIME, DATETIME and TIMESTAMP columns operate at lower levels. These changes allow these temporal data types to have fractional parts and negative values. You can disable this feature using the mysql56_temporal_format system variable.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.1.2中，MySQL 5.6引入了新的时间格式，该格式更改了 TIME ， DATETIME 和 TIMESTAMP 列在较低级别上的运行方式。这些更改允许这些时间数据类型具有小数部分和负值。您可以使用 mysql56_temporal_format 系统变量禁用此功能。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.1.2 and before, the rpl_semi_sync_master_wait_point system variable does not exist. However, in those versions, the master waits for the acknowledgement from slaves at a point that is equivalent to AFTER_COMMIT.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.1.2和 rpl_semi_sync_master_wait_point ，rpl_semi_sync_master_wait_point系统变量不存在。但是，在那些版本中，主服务器在等效于 AFTER_COMMIT 的点上等待从计算机的确认。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.1.2 and before, this system variable does not exist. However, in those versions, the master waits for the acknowledgement from slaves at a point that is equivalent to AFTER_COMMIT.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.1.2及更低版本中，此系统变量不存在。但是，在那些版本中，主服务器在等效于 AFTER_COMMIT 的点上等待从计算机的确认。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.1.28, you may encounter Error 1267 when performing comparison operations in views on tables that use binary constants. For instance,
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.1.28中，在使用二进制常量的表的视图中执行比较操作时，可能会遇到错误1267。例如，

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.1.30 and earlier, the node acting as slave would apply the transaction with the original GTID that it received from the master, and the other Galera Cluster nodes would generate their own GTIDs for the transaction when they replicated the write set.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.1.30及更早版本中，充当从节点的节点将应用具有从主节点接收的原始GTID的事务，而其他Galera Cluster节点在复制写集时将为事务生成自己的GTID。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.1.31 and later, the node acting as slave will include the transaction's original Gtid_Log_Event in the replicated write set, so all nodes should associate the write set with its original GTID. See MDEV-13431 about that.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.1.31和更高版本中，充当从节点的节点将在复制的写集中包含事务的原始 Gtid_Log_Event ，因此所有节点都应将写集与其原始GTID关联。有关此信息，请参见MDEV-13431。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.1.36, MariaDB 10.2.18, and MariaDB 10.3.10 and later, Mariabackup will default to the server's default datadir value.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.1.36，MariaDB 10.2.18和MariaDB 10.3.10及更高版本中，Mariabackup将默认为服务器的默认 datadir 值。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.2.0 and before, it does not allow user-defined functions (UDFs) to be used in expressions for generated columns.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.2.0及更低版本中，它不允许在生成的列的表达式中使用用户定义的函数（UDF）。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.2.0 and before, the following statements apply to MySQL compatibility for generated columns:
