trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.2.0及更低版本中，以下语句适用于生成的列的表达式：

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.2.1 and before, only a single InnoDB page cleaner thread is supported.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.2.1及更低版本中，仅支持单个InnoDB页面清洁器线程。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.2.1 and before, the default file format is Antelope. In MariaDB 10.2.2 and later, the Antelope file format is deprecated.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.2.1和更低版本中，默认文件格式为 Antelope 。在MariaDB 10.2.2和更高版本中，不建议使用 Antelope 文件格式。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.2.1 and before, the default file format isAntelope. In MariaDB 10.2.2 and later, the default file format is Barracuda and Antelope is deprecated.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.2.1和更低版本中，默认文件格式为 Antelope 。在MariaDB 10.2.2及更高版本中，默认文件格式为 Barracuda ，不建议使用 Antelope 。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.2.1 and before, the default row format is COMPACT.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.2.1及更低版本中，默认行格式为 COMPACT 。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.2.1 and before, the default row format is COMPACT. Therefore, in these versions, the easiest way to create an InnoDB table that uses the COMPACT row format is by not setting the ROW_FORMAT table option at all in the CREATE TABLE or ALTER TABLE statement.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.2.1及更低版本中，默认行格式为 COMPACT 。因此，在这些版本中，创建使用 COMPACT 行格式的InnoDB表的最简单方法是完全不在 CREATE TABLE 或 ALTER TABLE 语句中设置 ROW_FORMAT table选项。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.2.1 and before, the easiest way to create an InnoDB table that uses the DYNAMIC row format is by setting the ROW_FORMAT table option to to DYNAMIC in a CREATE TABLE or ALTER TABLE statement.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.2.1及 ROW_FORMAT 中，创建使用 DYNAMIC 行格式的InnoDB表的最简单方法是在 CREATE TABLE 或 ALTER TABLE 语句中将ROW_FORMAT table选项设置为 DYNAMIC 。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.2.1 and below, the default server_id value is 0. If a slave's server_id value is 0, then all masters will refuse its connection attempts. If a master's server_id value is 0, then it will refuse all slave connection attempts.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.2.1和更低版本中，默认的 server_id 值为 0 。如果从服务器的 server_id 值为 0 ，则所有主服务器都将拒绝其连接尝试。如果主服务器的 server_id 值为 0 ，则它将拒绝所有从服务器连接尝试。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.2.1 and later, the following statements apply to MySQL compatibility for generated columns:
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.2.1和更高版本中，以下语句适用于生成列的MySQL兼容性：

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.2.1 and later, the following statements apply to expressions for generated columns:
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.2.1和更高版本中，以下语句适用于生成的列的表达式：

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.2.1 you can define constraints in 2 different ways:
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.2.1中，您可以通过2种不同的方式定义约束：

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.2.10 and later, Mariabackup creates an empty InnoDB redo log file called ib_logfile0 as part of the --prepare stage. This file has 3 roles:
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB的10.2.10或更高版本，Mariabackup创建一个空InnoDB的重做日志文件称为 ib_logfile0 作为的一部分 --prepare 阶段。该文件具有3个角色：

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.2.10 and later, Mariabackup prevents this issue by creating an empty InnoDB redo log file called ib_logfile0 as part of the --prepare stage. That way, if the backup is manually restored, any pre-existing InnoDB redo log files would get overwritten by the empty one.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB的10.2.10或更高版本，Mariabackup通过创建一个空的防止这个问题的InnoDB重做日志文件名为 ib_logfile0 作为的一部分 --prepare 阶段。这样，如果手动还原了备份，则任何现有的InnoDB重做日志文件都将被空文件覆盖。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.2.13, MariaDB 10.3.5 and later, the table copy operation creates a lot fewer InnoDB undo log writes. See MDEV-11415 for more information.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.2.13，MariaDB 10.3.5和更高版本中，表复制操作创建的InnoDB撤消日志写操作少得多。有关更多信息，请参见MDEV-11415。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.2.18 and before, this temporary table will be in the same directory as the original table, and it's file name will be in the format #sql-ib${TABLESPACE_ID}-${RAND}, where ${TABLESPACE_ID} is the table's tablespace ID within InnoDB and ${RAND} is a randomly initialized number. Therefore, the datadir may contain files with file names like #sql-ib230291-1363966925.ibd.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.2.18及更低版本中，此临时表将与原始表位于同一目录中，并且文件名的格式为 #sql-ib${TABLESPACE_ID}-${RAND} ，其中 ${TABLESPACE_ID} 是InnoDB中表的表空间ID， ${RAND} 是随机初始化的数字。因此， datadir 可能包含文件名，例如 #sql-ib230291-1363966925.ibd 的文件。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.2.19 and later, this temporary table will be in the same directory as the original table, and it's file name will be in the format #sql${PID}_${THREAD_ID}_${TMP_TABLE_COUNT}, where ${PID} is the process ID of mysqld, ${THREAD_ID} is the connection ID, and ${TMP_TABLE_COUNT} is the number of temporary tables that the connection has open. Therefore, the datadir may contain files with file names like #sql1234_12_1.ibd.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB的19年2月10日以后，该临时表将在同一目录与原始表，它的文件名是格式 #sql${PID}_${THREAD_ID}_${TMP_TABLE_COUNT} ，其中 ${PID} 是 mysqld 的进程ID ， ${THREAD_ID} 是连接ID， ${TMP_TABLE_COUNT} 是连接已打开的临时表的数量。因此， datadir 可能包含文件名，例如 #sql1234_12_1.ibd 的文件。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.2.2 and before, the following statements apply to indexes for generated columns:
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.2.2及更低版本中，以下语句适用于生成的列的索引：

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.2.2 and later, InnoDB strict mode is enabled by default.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.2.2和更高版本中，默认情况下启用InnoDB严格模式。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.2.2 and later, InnoDB supports increasing the length of VARCHAR columns with ALGORITHM set to INPLACE, unless it would require changing the number of bytes requires to represent the column's length. A VARCHAR column that is between 0 and 255 bytes in size requires 1 byte to represent its length, while a VARCHAR column that is 256 bytes or longer requires 2 bytes to represent its length. This means that the length of a column cannot be increased with ALGORITHM set to INPLACE if the original length was less than 256 bytes, and the new length is 256 bytes or more.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.2.2和更高版本中，除非将 ALGORITHM 设置为 INPLACE ，否则InnoDB支持增加 VARCHAR 列的长度，除非需要更改表示列长度的字节数。甲 VARCHAR 列，它是在大小0到255字节之间需要1个字节来表示其长度，而 VARCHAR 列，它是256个字节或更长需要2个字节来表示其长度。这意味着，如果原始长度小于256个字节，而新长度为256个字节或更多，则在 ALGORITHM 设置为 INPLACE 的情况下，无法增加列的长度。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.2.2 and later, it is possible to use multiple InnoDB page cleaner threads.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.2.2和更高版本中，可以使用多个InnoDB页面清理器线程。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.2.2 and later, the innodb_default_row_format system variable can be used to set the default row format for InnoDB tables. The possible values are:
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.2.2和更高版本中， innodb_default_row_format 系统变量可用于设置InnoDB表的默认行格式。可能的值为：

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.2.2 and later, the default row format is DYNAMIC, as long as the innodb_default_row_format system variable has not been modified. Therefore, in these versions, the easiest way to create an InnoDB table that uses the DYNAMIC row format is by not setting the ROW_FORMAT table option at all in a CREATE TABLE or ALTER TABLE statement.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.2.2和更高版本中，只要 innodb_default_row_format 系统变量，默认行格式为 DYNAMIC 。因此，在这些版本中，创建使用 DYNAMIC 行格式的InnoDB表的最简单方法是完全不在 CREATE TABLE 或 ALTER TABLE 语句中设置 ROW_FORMAT table选项。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.2.2 and later, the default row format is DYNAMIC.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.2.2和更高版本中，默认行格式为 DYNAMIC 。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.2.2 and later, the easiest way to create an InnoDB table that uses the COMPACT row format is by setting the ROW_FORMAT table option to to COMPACT in a CREATE TABLE or ALTER TABLE statement.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.2.2和更高版本中，创建使用 COMPACT 行格式的InnoDB表的最简单方法是在 CREATE TABLE 或 ALTER TABLE 语句中将 ROW_FORMAT table选项设置为 COMPACT 。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.2.3 and before, statement-based logging is the default.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.2.3及更低版本中，默认情况下是基于语句的日志记录。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.2.3 and before, the default value of the log_warnings system variable is 1.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.2.3和 log_warnings 中，log_warnings系统变量的默认值为 1 。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.2.3 and later, InnoDB page compression can be enabled for all new InnoDB tables by default by setting the innodb_compression_default system variable to ON.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.2.3和更高版本中，默认情况下，可以通过将 innodb_compression_default 系统变量设置为 ON 来为所有新的InnoDB表启用InnoDB页面压缩。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.2.3 and later, the following statements apply to indexes for generated columns:
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.2.3和更高版本中，以下语句适用于生成的列的索引：

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.2.4 and later, mixed logging is the default.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.2.4和更高版本中，默认为混合日志记录。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.2.4 and later, the AUTO_INCREMENT counter is persistent, so this restriction is no longer present. Persistent, however, does not mean transactional. Gaps may still occur in some cases, such as if a INSERT IGNORE statement fails, or if a user executes ROLLBACK or ROLLBACK TO SAVEPOINT.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.2.4和更高版本中，AUTO_INCREMENT计数器是持久性的，因此不再存在此限制。但是，持久性并不意味着事务性。在某些情况下，例如INSERT IGNORE语句失败，或者用户执行ROLLBACK或ROLLBACK TO SAVEPOINT时，仍然可能出现间隙。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.2.4 and later, the default value of the log_warnings system variable is 2.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.2.4和更高版本中， log_warnings 系统变量的默认值为 2 。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.2.6 and later, the user_variables plugin is statically linked into the server by default, so it does not need to be installed.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.2.6和更高版本中，默认情况下 user_variables 插件静态链接到服务器，因此无需安装。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.2.6 and later, the following statements apply to data types for generated columns:
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.2.6和更高版本中，以下语句适用于生成的列的数据类型：

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.2.8 and before, Mariabackup did not support the --export option. See MDEV-13466 about that. In these versions of MariaDB, this means that Mariabackup could not create .cfg files for InnoDB file-per-table tablespaces during the --prepare stage. You can still import file-per-table tablespaces without the .cfg files in many cases, so it may still be possible in those versions to restore partial backups or to restore individual tables and partitions with just the .ibd files. If you have a full backup and you need to create .cfg files for InnoDB file-per-table tablespaces, then you can do so by preparing the backup as usual without the --export option, and then restoring the backup, and then starting the server. At that point, you can use the server's built-in features to copy the transportable tablespaces.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.2.8及更低版本中，Mariabackup不支持 --export 选项。有关此信息，请参见MDEV-13466。在这些版本MariaDB的，这意味着Mariabackup无法创建 .cfg 的文件InnoDB的文件，每个表的表空间中的 --prepare 阶段。在许多情况下，您仍然可以导入不带 .cfg 文件的每表文件表空间，因此在那些版本中，仍然有可能恢复部分备份或仅使用 .ibd 文件来恢复单个表和分区。如果您有完整备份并且需要为InnoDB每表文件表空间创建 .cfg 文件，然后可以像往常一样在不使用 --export 选项的情况下准备备份，然后还原备份，然后启动服务器。此时，您可以使用服务器的内置功能来复制可传输表空间。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.2.8 and before, Mariabackup did not support the --export option. See MDEV-13466 about that. In earlier versions of MariaDB, this means that Mariabackup could not create .cfg files for InnoDB file-per-table tablespaces during the --prepare stage. You can still import file-per-table tablespaces without the .cfg files in many cases, so it may still be possible in those versions to restore partial backups or to restore individual tables and partitions with just the .ibd files. If you have a full backup and you need to create .cfg files for InnoDB file-per-table tablespaces, then you can do so by preparing the backup as usual without the --export option, and then restoring the backup, and then starting the server. At that point, you can use the server's built-in features to copy the transportable tablespaces.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.2.8及更低版本中，Mariabackup不支持 --export 选项。有关此信息，请参见MDEV-13466。在早期版本MariaDB的，这意味着Mariabackup无法创建 .cfg 的文件InnoDB的文件，每个表的表空间中的 --prepare 阶段。在许多情况下，您仍然可以导入不带 .cfg 文件的每表文件表空间，因此在那些版本中，仍然有可能恢复部分备份或仅使用 .ibd 文件来恢复单个表和分区。如果您有完整备份并且需要为InnoDB每表文件表空间创建 .cfg 文件，然后可以像往常一样在不使用 --export 选项的情况下准备备份，然后还原备份，然后启动服务器。此时，您可以使用服务器的内置功能来复制可传输表空间。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.2.9 and before, Mariabackup creates xtrabackup_logfile to store the InnoDB redo log, In later versions, ib_logfile0 is created instead.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.2.9及更低版本中， ib_logfile0 创建 xtrabackup_logfile 来存储InnoDB重做日志，在更高版本中，将改为创建ib_logfile0。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.3.1 and before, InnoDB's multi-thread flush feature can be used. This is especially useful in MariaDB 10.1, which only supports a single page cleaner thread.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.3.1及更低版本中，可以使用InnoDB的多线程刷新功能。这在仅支持单个页面清理程序线程的MariaDB 10.1中特别有用。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.3.1 and later, it is possible to disable logging to the general query log for specific types of statements by setting the log_disabled_statements system variable. This option cannot be set dynamically. It can be set in a server option group in an option file prior to starting up the server. For example:
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.3.1和更高版本中，可以通过设置 log_disabled_statements 系统变量来禁用对特定类型的语句的常规查询日志的日志记录。此选项不能动态设置。可以在启动服务器之前在选项文件的服务器选项组中对其进行设置。例如：

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.3.1 and later, it is possible to disable logging to the slow query log for specific types of statements by setting the log_slow_disabled_statements system variable. This option cannot be set dynamically. It can be set in a server option group in an option file prior to starting up the server. For example:
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.3.1和更高版本中，可以通过设置 log_slow_disabled_statements 系统变量来禁用对特定类型的语句的慢速查询日志记录。此选项不能动态设置。可以在启动服务器之前在选项文件的服务器选项组中对其进行设置。例如：

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.3.10 and later, InnoDB supports setting a table's PAGE_COMPRESSED value to 1 with ALGORITHM set to INPLACE. InnoDB also supports changing a table's PAGE_COMPRESSED value from 1 to 0 with ALGORITHM set to INPLACE.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB的10.3.10或更高版本，InnoDB支持设置表格的 PAGE_COMPRESSED 值 1 与 ALGORITHM 设置为 INPLACE 。 InnoDB还支持在 ALGORITHM 设置为 INPLACE 的情况下将表的 PAGE_COMPRESSED 值从 1 更改为 0 。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.3.10 and later, InnoDB supports setting a table's PAGE_COMPRESSED value to 1 with ALGORITHM set to INSTANT. InnoDB does not support changing a table's PAGE_COMPRESSED value from 1 to 0 with ALGORITHM set to INSTANT.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.3.10及更高版本中，InnoDB支持将表的 PAGE_COMPRESSED 值设置为 1 ,并将 ALGORITHM 设置为 INSTANT 。 InnoDB的也没有支持更改表的 PAGE_COMPRESSED 从值 1 到 0 与 ALGORITHM 设置为 INSTANT 。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.3.10 and later, InnoDB supports setting a table's PAGE_COMPRESSED value to 1 with ALGORITHM set to NOCOPY in the cases where the operation supports having the ALGORITHM clause set to INSTANT.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.3.10及更高版本中，在操作支持将 ALGORITHM 子句设置为 INSTANT 的情况下，InnoDB支持将表的 PAGE_COMPRESSED 值设置为 1 ,且 ALGORITHM 设置为 NOCOPY 。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.3.2 and before, a global counter was updated each time a client connection dispatched a command. In these versions, the global and session status variable are always the same value.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.3.2及更早版本中，每次客户端连接调度命令时，都会更新全局计数器。在这些版本中，全局和会话状态变量始终是相同的值。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.3.2 and later, InnoDB supports adding columns to a table with ALGORITHM set to INSTANT if the new column is the last column in the table. See MDEV-11369 for more information. If the table has a hidden FTS_DOC_ID column is present, then this is not supported.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.3.2和更高版本中，如果新列是表中的最后一列，则InnoDB支持将 ALGORITHM 设置为 INSTANT 的表添加到表中。有关更多信息，请参见MDEV-11369。如果表中存在隐藏的 FTS_DOC_ID 列，则不支持此操作。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.3.2 and later, InnoDB supports adding columns to a table with ALGORITHM set to NOCOPY in the cases where the operation supports having the ALGORITHM clause set to INSTANT.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.3.2和更高版本中，在操作支持将 ALGORITHM 子句设置为 INSTANT 的情况下，InnoDB支持在将 ALGORITHM 设置为 NOCOPY 的表中添加列。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.3.3 and later, the Semisynchronous Replication feature is built into MariaDB server and is no longer provided by a plugin. This means that installing the plugin is not supported on those versions. In MariaDB 10.3.3 and later, you can skip right to Enabling Semisynchronous Replication.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.3.3和更高版本中，半同步复制功能内置于MariaDB服务器中，不再由插件提供。这意味着这些版本不支持安装插件。在MariaDB 10.3.3及更高版本中，您可以跳到启用半同步复制。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.3.3 and later, the Semisynchronous Replication feature is built into MariaDB server and is no longer provided by a plugin. This means that uninstalling the plugin is not supported on those versions.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.3.3和更高版本中，半同步复制功能内置在MariaDB服务器中，并且不再由插件提供。这意味着这些版本不支持卸载插件。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.3.3 and later, the global counter has been removed as a performance improvement. Instead, when the global status variable is queried, it is calculated dynamically by essentially adding up all the running client connections as they would appear in SHOW PROCESSLIST output. A client connection is only considered to be running if its thread COMMAND value is not equal to Sleep. When the session status variable is queried, it always returns 1.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.3.3和更高版本中，为提高性能，已删除了全局计数器。相反，当查询全局状态变量时，它实际上是通过将所有正在运行的客户端连接加在一起（如在 SHOW PROCESSLIST 输出中所显示的那样）来动态计算的。如果客户端连接的线程 COMMAND 值不等于 Sleep ,则认为该客户端连接正在运行。查询会话状态变量时，它始终返回 1 。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.3.3 and later, this system variable can also be changed dynamically with SET GLOBAL. For example:
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.3.3和更高版本中，也可以使用 SET GLOBAL 动态更改此系统变量。例如：

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.3.3 this function was renamed to VALUE(), because it's incompatible with the standard Table Value Constructors syntax, implemented in MariaDB 10.3.3.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.3.3中，此函数被重命名为 VALUE() ，因为它与MariaDB 10.3.3中实现的标准表值构造函数语法不兼容。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.3.6 and later, InnoDB supports dropping a CHECK constraint from a table with ALGORITHM set to INPLACE. See MDEV-16331 for more information.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.3.6和更高版本中，InnoDB支持从 ALGORITHM 设置为 INPLACE 的表中删除 CHECK 约束。有关更多信息，请参见MDEV-16331。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.3.6 and later, InnoDB supports dropping a CHECK constraint from a table with ALGORITHM set to INSTANT. See MDEV-16331 for more information.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.3.6和更高版本中，InnoDB支持从 ALGORITHM 设置为 INSTANT 的表中删除 CHECK 约束。有关更多信息，请参见MDEV-16331。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.3.6 and later, InnoDB supports dropping a CHECK constraint from a table with ALGORITHM set to NOCOPY in the cases where the operation supports having the ALGORITHM clause set to INSTANT.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.3.6和更高版本中，在操作支持将 ALGORITHM 子句设置为 INSTANT 的情况下，InnoDB支持从将 ALGORITHM 设置为 NOCOPY 的表中删除 CHECK 约束。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.3.7 and later, the old_alter_table system variable is deprecated. Instead, the alter_algorithm system variable defines the default algorithm for ALTER TABLE operations.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.3.7和更高版本中，不建议使用 old_alter_table 系统变量。相反， alter_algorithm 系统变量定义了 ALTER TABLE 操作的默认算法。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.3.7 and later, the InnoDB implementation has diverged substantially from the InnoDB in MySQL. Therefore, in these versions, the InnoDB version is no longer associated with a MySQL release version.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.3.7和更高版本中，InnoDB实现与MySQL中的InnoDB有很大不同。因此，在这些版本中，InnoDB版本不再与MySQL发行版本关联。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.3.8 and later, InnoDB supports removing system versioning from a column with ALGORITHM set to INPLACE. In order for this to work, the system_versioning_alter_history system variable must be set to KEEP. See MDEV-16330 for more information.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.3.8和更高版本中，InnoDB支持从 ALGORITHM 设置为 INPLACE 的列中删除系统版本控制。为了 system_versioning_alter_history 起作用，必须将system_versioning_alter_history系统变量设置为 KEEP 。有关更多信息，请参见MDEV-16330。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.3.8 and later, InnoDB supports removing system versioning from a column with ALGORITHM set to INSTANT. In order for this to work, the system_versioning_alter_history system variable must be set to KEEP. See MDEV-16330 for more information.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.3.8和更高版本中，InnoDB支持从 ALGORITHM 设置为 INSTANT 的列中删除系统版本控制。为了 system_versioning_alter_history 起作用，必须将system_versioning_alter_history系统变量设置为 KEEP 。有关更多信息，请参见MDEV-16330。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.3.8 and later, InnoDB supports removing system versioning from a column with ALGORITHM set to NOCOPY in the cases where the operation supports having the ALGORITHM clause set to INSTANT.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.3.8和更高版本中，如果操作支持将 ALGORITHM 子句设置为 INSTANT ，则InnoDB支持从 ALGORITHM 设置为 NOCOPY 的列中删除系统版本控制。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.4.0 and later, if you need to install version 1.0 of the authentication plugin instead of version 2.0, then you can do so. For example, with INSTALL SONAME or INSTALL PLUGIN:
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.4.0和更高版本中，如果需要安装身份验证插件的 1.0 版而不是 2.0 版，则可以安装。例如，使用 INSTALL SONAME 或 INSTALL PLUGIN ：

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.4.3 and later, InnoDB also supports increasing the length of VARCHAR columns with ALGORITHM set to INSTANT in a more limited manner if the ROW_FORMAT table option is set to COMPACT, DYNAMIC, or COMPRESSED. In this scenario, the following limitations apply:
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.4.3和更高版本中，如果将 ROW_FORMAT 表选项设置为 COMPACT ， DYNAMIC 或 COMPRESSED ，则InnoDB还支持以更有限的方式将 ALGORITHM 设置为 INSTANT 的 VARCHAR 列的长度增加。在这种情况下，以下限制适用：

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.4.3 and later, InnoDB supports increasing the length of VARCHAR columns with ALGORITHM set to INPLACE in the cases where the operation supports having the ALGORITHM clause set to INSTANT.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.4.3和更高版本中，在操作支持将 ALGORITHM 子句设置为 INSTANT 的情况下，InnoDB支持将 ALGORITHM 设置为 INPLACE 的情况下增加 VARCHAR 列的长度。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.4.3 and later, InnoDB supports increasing the length of VARCHAR columns with ALGORITHM set to INSTANT with no restrictions if the ROW_FORMAT table option is set to REDUNDANT. See MDEV-15563 for more information.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.4.3及更高版本中，如果 ROW_FORMAT 表选项设置为 REDUNDANT ，则InnoDB支持将 ALGORITHM 设置为 INSTANT 的情况下增加 VARCHAR 列的长度，而没有限制。有关更多信息，请参见MDEV-15563。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.4.3 and later, InnoDB supports modifying a column to allow NULL values with ALGORITHM set to INSTANT if the ROW_FORMAT table option is set to REDUNDANT. See MDEV-15563 for more information.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.4.3和更高版本中，如果 ROW_FORMAT 表选项设置为 REDUNDANT ，则InnoDB支持修改列以允许将 ALGORITHM 设置为 INSTANT 的 NULL 值。有关更多信息，请参见MDEV-15563。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.4.3 and later, InnoDB supports modifying a column to allow NULL values with ALGORITHM set to NOCOPY in the cases where the operation supports having the ALGORITHM clause set to INSTANT.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.4.3和更高版本中，在操作支持将 ALGORITHM 子句设置为 INSTANT 的情况下，InnoDB支持修改列以允许将 ALGORITHM 设置为 NOCOPY 的 NULL 值。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.4.3 and later, if innodb_checksum_algorithm is set to full_crc32 or strict_full_crc32, and if the table does not use ROW_FORMAT=COMPRESSED, then data files will be guaranteed to be zero-initialized.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.4.3和更高版本中，如果将 innodb_checksum_algorithm 设置为 full_crc32 或 strict_full_crc32 ，并且如果该表不使用 ROW_FORMAT=COMPRESSED ，那么将确保数据文件被零初始化。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.4.3 and later, if innodb_checksum_algorithm is set to full_crc32 or strict_full_crc32, and if the table does not use ROW_FORMAT=COMPRESSED, then InnoDB spatial indexes will be encrypted if the table is encrypted.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.4.3和更高版本中，如果将 innodb_checksum_algorithm 设置为 full_crc32 或 strict_full_crc32 ，并且如果该表不使用 ROW_FORMAT=COMPRESSED ，那么如果对该表进行了加密，则InnoDB空间索引将被加密。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.4.3 and later, the unix_socket authentication plugin is installed by default, and it is used by the 'root'@'localhost' user account by default. See Authentication from MariaDB 10.4 for more information.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.4.3和更高版本中，默认情况下安装 unix_socket 身份验证插件，默认情况下， 'root'@'localhost' 用户@root用户帐户使用该插件。有关更多信息，请参见MariaDB 10.4中的身份验证。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.4.3 and later, the unix_socket authentication plugin is installed by default, so if you do not want it to be available by default on those versions, then you will need to disable it.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.4.3和更高版本中，默认情况下安装了 unix_socket 身份验证插件，因此如果您不希望这些版本在默认情况下可用，则需要禁用它。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.4.3 and later, the unix_socket authentication plugin is installed by default, so this step can be skipped on those versions.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.4.3和更高版本中，默认情况下安装了 unix_socket 身份验证插件，因此可以在那些版本上跳过此步骤。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.4.3 and later, the built-in wsrep plugin has been changed to a replication plugin. Therefore, it is no longer considered an XA-capable storage engine, so it no longer forces MariaDB to use a transaction coordinator log by default.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.4.3和更高版本中，内置的 wsrep 插件已更改为复制插件。因此，它不再被视为具有XA功能的存储引擎，因此它不再强制MariaDB默认使用事务协调器日志。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.4.5 and before, MariaDB Server is statically linked with the bundled yaSSL libraries in .deb packages provided by Debian's and Ubuntu's default repositories.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.4.5及更低版本中，MariaDB Server与Debian和Ubuntu默认存储库提供的 .deb 软件包中的捆绑yaSSL库静态链接。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.4.5 and before, MariaDB Server is statically linked with the bundled yaSSL library in binary tarballs on Linux.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.4.5及更低版本中，MariaDB Server 在Linux上的二进制压缩文件中与捆绑的yaSSL库静态链接。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.4.5 and before, MariaDB Server is statically linked with the bundled yaSSL library in .deb packages provided by Debian's and Ubuntu's default repositories.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.4.5及更低版本中，MariaDB Server与Debian和Ubuntu默认存储库提供的 .deb 包中的捆绑yaSSL库静态链接。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.4.6 and later, MariaDB Server is statically linked with the bundled wolfSSL libraries in .deb packages provided by Debian's and Ubuntu's default repositories.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.4.6和更高版本中，MariaDB Server与Debian和Ubuntu的默认存储库提供的 .deb 包中的捆绑的wolfSSL库静态链接。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.4.6 and later, MariaDB Server is statically linked with the bundled wolfSSL library in binary tarballs on Linux.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.4.6和更高版本中，MariaDB Server 在Linux上的二进制压缩文件中与捆绑的wolfSSL库静态链接。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.4.6 and later, MariaDB Server is statically linked with the bundled wolfSSL library in .deb packages provided by Debian's and Ubuntu's default repositories.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.4.6和更高版本中，MariaDB Server与Debian和Ubuntu的默认存储库提供的 .deb 包中的捆绑的wolfSSL库静态链接。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.4.6 and later, MariaDB's clients and utilities and MariaDB Connector/C are are dynamically linked with the system's Schannel libraries in MSI and ZIP packages on Windows. libmysqlclient is still statically linked with the bundled wolfSSL library.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.4.6和更高版本中，MariaDB的客户端和实用程序以及MariaDB Connector / C与Windows上MSI和ZIP包中系统的Schannel库动态链接。libmysqlclient仍然与捆绑的wolfSSL库静态链接。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.4.6 and later, MariaDB's clients and utilities and MariaDB Connector/C are dynamically linked with the system's GnuTLS libraries in .deb packages provided by Debian's and Ubuntu's default repositories. libmysqlclient is still statically linked with the bundled wolfSSL libraries.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.4.6及更高版本中，MariaDB的客户端和实用程序以及MariaDB Connector / C与Debian和Ubuntu的默认存储库提供的 .deb 包中的系统GnuTLS库动态链接。libmysqlclient仍然与捆绑的wolfSSL库静态链接。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.4.6 and later, MariaDB's clients and utilities and MariaDB Connector/C are dynamically linked with the system's GnuTLS library in .deb packages provided by Debian's and Ubuntu's default repositories. libmysqlclient is still statically linked with the bundled wolfSSL libraries.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.4.6和更高版本中，MariaDB的客户端和实用程序以及MariaDB Connector / C在Debian和Ubuntu的默认存储库提供的 .deb 软件包中与系统的GnuTLS库动态链接。libmysqlclient仍然与捆绑的wolfSSL库静态链接。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB 10.4.6 and later, MariaDB's clients and utilities and MariaDB Connector/C are statically linked with the GnuTLS library in binary tarballs on Linux. libmysqlclient is still statically linked with the bundled wolfSSL library.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.4.6和更高版本中，MariaDB的客户端和实用程序以及MariaDB Connector / C在Linux上的二进制压缩文件中与GnuTLS库静态链接。libmysqlclient仍然与捆绑的wolfSSL库静态链接。

trans-unit.target: 在 innobackupex 模式下，Mariabackup具有以下差异：

trans-unit.source: In innobackupex mode, which can be enabled with the --innobackupex option, the --databases option can be used as described above, or it can be used to refer to a file, just as the --databases-file option can in the normal mode.
trans-unit.target: 在 innobackupex 模式下（可以使用 --innobackupex 选项启用），可以如上所述使用 --databases 选项，也可以将其用于引用文件，就像 --databases-file 选项在正常模式。

trans-unit.source: In systemd 233 and before, setting LimitNOFILE=infinity actually sets the open file limit to 65536. See systemd issue #6559 for more information. Therefore, in these systemd versions, it is not generally recommended to set LimitNOFILE=infinity. Instead, it is generally better to set LimitNOFILE to a very large integer. For example:
trans-unit.target: 在 systemd 233及 LimitNOFILE=infinity ，设置LimitNOFILE = infinity实际上将打开文件限制设置为 65536 。有关更多信息，请参见systemd问题＃6559。因此，在这些 systemd 版本中，通常不建议设置 LimitNOFILE=infinity 。相反，通常最好将 LimitNOFILE 设置为非常大的整数。例如：

trans-unit.source: In systemd 234 and later, setting LimitNOFILE=infinity actually sets the open file limit to the value of the kernel's fs.nr_open parameter. Therefore, in these systemd versions, you may have to change this parameter's value.
trans-unit.target: 在 systemd 234和更高版本中，设置 LimitNOFILE=infinity 实际上将打开文件限制设置为内核的 fs.nr_open 参数的值。因此，在这些 systemd 版本中，可能必须更改此参数的值。

trans-unit.source: In ACID terminology, the "D" stands for durability. In order to ensure durability with group commit, innodb_flush_log_at_trx_commit=1 and/or sync_binlog=1 should be set. These settings are needed to ensure that if the server crashes, then any transaction that was committed prior to the time of crash will still be present in the database after crash recovery.
trans-unit.target: 在ACID术语中，“ D”代表耐久性。为了确保组提交的持久性，应设置 innodb_flush_log_at_trx_commit=1 和/或 sync_binlog=1 。这些设置是必需的，以确保如果服务器崩溃，那么崩溃恢复后，在崩溃之前提交的任何事务仍将存在于数据库中。

trans-unit.source: In CONNECT version 1.03 (until MariaDB 10.1.5) ODBC tables are not indexable. Version 1.04 (from MariaDB 10.1.6) adds remote indexing facility to the ODBC table type.
trans-unit.target: 在CONNECT版本1.03（直到MariaDB 10.1.5）中，ODBC表不可索引。版本1.04（来自MariaDB 10.1.6）将远程索引功能添加到ODBC表类型。

trans-unit.source: In ColumnStore the block size is 8192 bytes
trans-unit.target: 在ColumnStore中,块大小为8192字节

trans-unit.source: In Debian/Ubuntu packages SphinxSE is statically compiled into the MariaDB server, there is no need to use the INSTALL SONAME statement.
trans-unit.target: 在Debian / Ubuntu软件包中，SphinxSE被静态编译到MariaDB服务器中，无需使用 INSTALL SONAME 语句。

trans-unit.source: In Extent Elimination, ColumnStore scans the columns in join and filter conditions. It then extracts the logical horizontal partitioning information of each extent along with the minimum and maximum values for the column to further eliminate Extents. To eliminate an Extent when a column scan involves a filter, that filter is compared to the minimum and maximum values stored in each extent for the column. If the filter value is outside the Extents minimum and maximum value range, ColumnStore eliminates the Extent.
trans-unit.target: 在Extent Elimination中,ColumnStore会扫描连接和过滤条件下的列,然后提取每个extent的逻辑水平分区信息以及列的最小值和最大值。然后,它提取每个extent的逻辑水平分区信息以及列的最小值和最大值,以进一步消除Extents。当列扫描涉及到一个过滤器时,要消除一个Extent,该过滤器会与存储在每个范围中的列的最小值和最大值进行比较。如果过滤器的值在Extents的最小值和最大值范围之外,ColumnStore就会消除该Extent。

trans-unit.source: In Galera-based replication:
trans-unit.target: 在基于Galera的复制中。

trans-unit.source: In Galera:
trans-unit.target: 在加莱拉:

trans-unit.source: In HTAP deployments the only queries issued to MariaDB ColumnStore are those specific to OLAP workloads, which does not include writes. In order to update ColumnStore with new data written to the MariaDB Servers, configure MaxScale on the back-end to stream writes to ColumnStore.
trans-unit.target: 在HTAP部署中,向MariaDB ColumnStore发出的唯一查询是那些特定于OLAP工作负载的查询,其中不包括写入。为了用写入MariaDB服务器的新数据更新ColumnStore,在后端配置MaxScale以流式写入ColumnStore。

trans-unit.source: In InnoDB, separate threads could COMMIT ids in the 'wrong' order.
trans-unit.target: 在InnoDB中,单独的线程可以以 "错误 "的顺序COMMIT ids。

trans-unit.source: In InnoDB, there is no practical way to reclaim the freed space from ibdata1, other than to reuse the freed blocks eventually.
trans-unit.target: 在InnoDB中,除了最终重用释放出来的块之外,并没有实际的办法从ibdata1中回收释放出来的空间。

trans-unit.target: 在MacOS中,创建一个名为/Library/LaunchDaemons/com.mariadb.server.plist的文件,内容如下(根据实际情况编辑)。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB (from 10.0.3 and 5.5.31):
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB中(从10.0.3和5.5.31开始)。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB Cluster, the Server replicates a transaction at commit time by broadcasting the write set associated with the transaction to every node in the cluster. The client connects directly to the DBMS and experiences behavior that is similar to native MariaDB in most cases. The wsrep API (write set replication API) defines the interface between Galera replication and MariaDB.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB Cluster中,服务器在提交时通过向集群中的每个节点广播与事务相关的写集来复制事务。客户端直接连接到DBMS,并在大多数情况下体验到与本地MariaDB类似的行为。wsrep API(写集复制API)定义了Galera复制和MariaDB之间的接口。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB ColumnStore 1.1.0 a tool - columnstoreBackup to automate the backup/restore across the MariaDB ColumnStore nodes is available.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB ColumnStore 1.1.0中,提供了一个工具--columnstoreBackup,用于在MariaDB ColumnStore节点上自动备份/恢复。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB ColumnStore there is a set of SQL tracing stored functions provided to see the distributed query execution plan between the UM and the PM.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB ColumnStore中，提供了一组SQL跟踪存储的函数，以查看UM和PM之间的分布式查询执行计划。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB Community Server, Mariabackup first supported BACKUP STAGE commands in MariaDB 10.4.1.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB社区服务器中，Mariabackup首先在MariaDB 10.4.1中支持 BACKUP STAGE 命令。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB Replication, one server operates as the master receiving all writes from the application and replicating changes to the cluster. The other servers operate as slaves, receiving reads from the application and only accepting writes from the master server.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB Replication中,一台服务器作为主服务器运行,接收来自应用程序的所有写入,并将更改复制到集群。其他服务器作为从机操作,接收来自应用程序的读,只接受来自主服务器的写。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB it is not always necessary to run an explicit CREATE TABLE statement for a table to appear. Sometimes a table may already exist in the storage engine, but the server does not know about it, because there is no .frm file for this table. This can happen for various reasons; for example, for a cluster engine the table might have been created in the cluster by another MariaDB server node. Or for the engine that supports table shipping a table file might have been simply copied into the MariaDB data directory. But no matter what the reason is, there is a mechanism for an engine to tell the server that the table exists. This mechanism is called table discovery and if an engine wants the server to discover its tables, the engine should support the table discovery API.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB中，并非总是需要运行显式的 CREATE TABLE 语句来显示表。有时存储引擎中可能已经存在一个表，但是服务器不知道该表，因为该表没有 .frm 文件。这可能由于各种原因而发生；例如，对于集群引擎，该表可能是由另一个MariaDB服务器节点在集群中创建的。或者对于支持表传送的引擎，表文件可能已被简单地复制到MariaDB数据目录中。但是，无论是什么原因，都有一种机制可以使引擎告知服务器该表存在。这种机制称为表发现 并且如果引擎希望服务器发现其表，则该引擎应支持表发现API。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB one can also use a simplified syntax:
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB中也可以使用简化的语法。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB replication, a slave should be of a version same or newer than the master. Because of this, one should first upgrades all slaves to the latest version before changing a slave to be a master. In some cases one can have a slave to be of an older version than the master, as long as one doesn't execute on the master any SQL commands that the slave doesn't understand. This is however not guaranteed between all major MariaDB versions.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB复制中,从机的版本应该与主机相同或更新。正因为如此,在将一个从站改为主站之前,应该先将所有的从站升级到最新的版本。在某些情况下,只要不在主站上执行任何从站不理解的SQL命令,就可以让从站的版本比主站旧。然而,这一点在所有主要的MariaDB版本之间是无法保证的。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB you can combine this with virtual columns to enforce uniqueness over a subset of rows in a table:
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB中，您可以将其与虚拟列结合使用，以对表中的行子集实施唯一性：

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB, CROSS JOIN is a syntactic equivalent to INNER JOIN (they can replace each other). In standard SQL, they are not equivalent. INNER JOIN is used with an ON clause, CROSS JOIN is used otherwise.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB中， CROSS JOIN 与 INNER JOIN 等效（它们可以互相替换）。在标准SQL中，它们不是等效的。 INNER JOIN 与 ON 子句一起使用，否则使用 CROSS JOIN 。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB, FALSE is a synonym of 0 and TRUE is a synonym of 1. These constants are case insensitive, so TRUE, True, and true are equivalent.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB中， FALSE 是0的同义词，而 TRUE 是1的同义词。这些常量不区分大小写，因此 TRUE ， True 和 true 是等效的。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB, XA transactions can only be used with storage engines that support them. At least InnoDB, TokuDB, SPIDER and MyRocks support them. For InnoDB, XA transactions can be disabled by setting the innodb_support_xa server system variable to 0.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB中，XA事务只能与支持它们的存储引擎一起使用。至少InnoDB，TokuDB，SPIDER和MyRocks支持它们。对于InnoDB，可以通过将innodb_support_xa服务器系统变量设置为0 来禁用XA事务。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB, a table can be split in smaller subsets. Both data and indexes are partitioned.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB中,一张表可以被分割成更小的子集。数据和索引都是分区的。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB, an extra column TIME_MS has been added to the INFORMATION_SCHEMA.PROCESSLIST table, as well as to the output of SHOW FULL PROCESSLIST.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB中，已向 INFORMATION_SCHEMA.PROCESSLIST 表以及 SHOW FULL PROCESSLIST 的输出中添加了额外的 TIME_MS 列。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB, an extra column TIME_MS has been added to the INFORMATION_SCHEMA.PROCESSLIST table. This column shows the same information as the column 'TIME', but in units of milliseconds with microsecond precision (the unit and precision of the TIME column is one second).
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB中，已向INFORMATION_SCHEMA.PROCESSLIST表添加了额外的列 TIME_MS 。该列显示与“ TIME ” 列相同的信息，但以毫秒为单位，精度为微秒（“ TIME ”列的单位和精度为一秒）。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB, as long as the sql_mode, language, and other settings that were in effect during the CREATE TABLE remain unchanged, the generated column expression will always be evaluated the same. If any of these things change, then please be aware that the generated column expression might not be evaluated the same way as it previously was.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB中，只要在CREATE TABLE期间有效的 sql_mode ，语言和其他设置保持不变，生成的列表达式将始终被评估为相同。如果这些情况有任何变化，请注意，生成的列表达式的计算方式可能与以前不同。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB, available compression algorithms can be seen in the rocksdb_supported_compression_types variable. The set of supported compression algorithms depends on the platform.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB中，可以在rocksdb_supported_compression_types变量中看到可用的压缩算法。支持的压缩算法集取决于平台。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB, the SRID value is just an integer associated with the geometry value. All calculations are done assuming Euclidean (planar) geometry.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB中,SRID值只是一个与几何值相关联的整数。所有的计算都是在假设欧氏(平面)几何体的情况下进行的。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB, the default character set is latin1, and the default collation is latin1_swedish_ci (however this may differ in some distros, see for example Differences in MariaDB in Debian). Both character sets and collations can be specified from the server right down to the column level, as well as for client-server connections. When changing a character set and not specifying a collation, the default collation for the new character set is always used.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB中，默认字符集为latin1，默认排序规则为latin1_swedish_ci（但是在某些发行版中可能有所不同，例如，参见Debian中MariaDB的差异）。字符集和排序规则都可以从服务器一直指定到列级别，也可以从客户端服务器连接指定。更改字符集但未指定排序规则时，始终使用新字符集的默认排序规则。

trans-unit.source: In MariaDB, the default character set is latin1, and the default collation is latin1_swedish_ci (however this may differ in some distros, see for example Differences in MariaDB in Debian). You can view a full list of character sets and collations supported by MariaDB at Supported Character Sets and Collations, or see what's supported on your server with the SHOW CHARACTER SET and SHOW COLLATION commands.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB中，默认字符集为latin1，默认排序规则为latin1_swedish_ci（但是在某些发行版中可能有所不同，例如，参见Debian中MariaDB的差异）。您可以在“ 支持的字符集和排序规则”中查看MariaDB 支持的字符集和排序规则的完整列表，或者使用SHOW CHARACTER SET和SHOW COLLATION命令查看服务器支持的功能。

trans-unit.source: In MyISAM, rows are DELETEd as the statement is executed, and there is no provision for ROLLBACK. Some of the rows will be deleted, some won't. You probably have no clue of how much was deleted. In a single server, simply run the delete again. The delete is put into the binlog, but with error 1317. Since replication is supposed to keep the master and slave in sync, and since it has no clue of how to do that, replication stops and waits for manual intervention. In a HA (High Available) system using replication, this is a minor disaster. Meanwhile, you need to go to each slave(s) and verify that it is stuck for this reason, then do
trans-unit.target: 在MyISAM中,当语句执行时,行会被DELETEd,而且没有ROLLBACK的规定。有些行会被删除,有些不会。你可能不知道删除了多少。在单台服务器中,只要再运行一次删除即可。删除的内容会放到binlog中,但是会出现1317的错误。由于复制应该保持主从机同步,由于它不知道如何做到这一点,所以复制停止并等待人工干预。在使用复制的HA(High Available)系统中,这是个小灾难。同时,你需要到每个slave(s)去验证它是否因为这个原因而卡住了,然后再执行

trans-unit.source: In MySQL (or with optimizer_switch='semijoin=off,materialization=off'), one will get this EXPLAIN:
trans-unit.target: 在MySQL中（或与 optimizer_switch='semijoin=off,materialization=off' ），将得到以下 EXPLAIN ：

trans-unit.source: In MySQL (up until at least MySQL 5.7.14):
trans-unit.target: 在MySQL中(至少到MySQL 5.7.14为止)。

trans-unit.source: In MySQL 4.1 and before, the REDUNDANT row format was the default row format.
trans-unit.target: 在MySQL 4.1及 REDUNDANT 版本中，REDUNDANT行格式是默认行格式。

trans-unit.source: In MySQL 5.1 table names are encoded so that the file names are identical on all computers. Old table names that contains forbidden file name characters will show up prefixed with #mysql50# in SHOW TABLES until you convert them.
trans-unit.target: 在MySQL 5.1中，对表名进行了编码，以便在所有计算机上文件名都相同。包含禁止的文件名字符的旧表名将在 SHOW TABLES 中以＃mysql50＃前缀显示，直到您将它们转换。

trans-unit.source: In MySQL all the following will return 2: In MariaDB, starting from 5.3.1 the last 2 queries would return 3.
trans-unit.target: 在MySQL中,以下所有的查询都会返回2:在MariaDB中,从5.3.1开始,最后两个查询会返回3。

trans-unit.source: In MySQL, EXPLAIN execution takes a slightly different route from the way the real query (typically the SELECT) is optimized. This is unfortunate, and has caused a number of bugs in EXPLAIN. (For example, see MDEV-326, MDEV-410, and lp:1013343. lp:992942 is not directly about EXPLAIN, but it also would not have existed if MySQL didn't try to delete parts of a query plan in the middle of the query)
trans-unit.target: 在MySQL中， EXPLAIN 执行与优化实际查询（通常是 SELECT ）的方式略有不同。不幸的是，这导致了 EXPLAIN 中的许多错误。（例如，见MDEV-326，MDEV-410，和LP：1013343。LP：992942是不是直接左右 EXPLAIN ，但它也将不会存在，如果MySQL并没有试图删除查询计划的部分中部查询）

trans-unit.source: In MySQL, JSON is an object and is compared according to json values. In MariaDB JSON strings are normal strings and compared as strings. One exception is when using JSON_EXTRACT() in which case strings are unescaped before comparison.
trans-unit.target: 在MySQL中，JSON是一个对象，并根据json值进行比较。在MariaDB中，JSON字符串是普通字符串，并作为字符串进行比较。一种例外是使用JSON_EXTRACT（）时，在这种情况下，在比较之前不转义字符串。

trans-unit.source: In Red Hat / CentOS it is also possible to install a RPM or a tar ball. The RPM is the preferred version, except if you want to install many versions of MariaDB or install MariaDB in a non standard location.
trans-unit.target: 在Red Hat / CentOS中，还可以安装RPM或tar球。RPM是首选版本，除非您要安装许多版本的MariaDB或在非标准位置安装MariaDB。

trans-unit.source: In Red Hat / CentOS it is also possible to install a RPM or a tar ball. The RPM is the preferred version, except if you want to install many versions of MariaDB or install MariaDB in a non standard location.
trans-unit.target: 在Red Hat / CentOS中，还可以安装RPM或tar球。RPM是首选版本，除非您要安装许多版本的MariaDB或在非标准位置安装MariaDB。

trans-unit.source: In SQL Developer choose Tools -> Preferences
trans-unit.target: 在SQL Developer中，选择“工具”->“首选项”

trans-unit.source: In SQL, one needs to define the type of each column in a table. Dynamic columns do not provide any way to declare a type in advance ("whenever there is a column 'weight', it should be integer" is not possible). However, each particular dynamic column value is stored together with its datatype.
trans-unit.target: 在SQL中,需要定义表中每个列的类型。动态列不提供任何方法来预先声明类型("只要有一列'重量',就应该是整数 "是不可能的)。但是,每个特定的动态列值都与其数据类型一起存储。

trans-unit.source: In TOAD Edge 1.2, support for MariaDB 10.1 has been added.
trans-unit.target: 在TOAD Edge 1.2中，添加了对MariaDB 10.1的支持。

trans-unit.source: In Unions, Views, and sub-queries, a Table Value Constructor (TVC) allows you to inject arbitrary values into the result-set. The given values must have the same number of columns as the result-set, otherwise it returns Error 1222.
trans-unit.target: 在联合、视图和子查询中,表值构造函数(TVC)允许你向结果集注入任意值。给定的值必须与结果集的列数相同,否则会返回错误1222。

trans-unit.source: In Windows, the plugin can also be enabled during a new MSI installation. The MSI GUI installation provides the "Enable feedback plugin" checkbox to enable the plugin. The MSI command-line installation provides the FEEDBACK=1 command-line option to enable the plugin.
trans-unit.target: 在Windows中，也可以在新的MSI安装过程中启用该插件。MSI GUI安装提供了“启用反馈插件”复选框以启用插件。MSI命令行安装提供了FEEDBACK = 1命令行选项来启用插件。

trans-unit.source: In a Galera (or InnoDB Cluster?) environment, each node could be receiving input. If can afford to loose a few rows, have `Staging` be a non-replicated MEMORY table. Otherwise, have one `Staging` per node and be InnoDB; it will be more secure, but slower and not without problems. In particular, if a node dies completely, you somehow need to process its `Staging` table.
trans-unit.target: 在Galera（或InnoDB Cluster？）环境中，每个节点都可以接收输入。如果负担得起松散的几行，则将“ Staging”作为不可复制的MEMORY表。否则，每个节点只有一个“ Staging”并成为InnoDB；它会更安全，但速度较慢，而且并非没有问题。特别是，如果一个节点完全死亡，则您需要以某种方式处理其“登台”表。

trans-unit.source: In a State Snapshot Transfer (SST), the cluster provisions nodes by transferring a full data copy from one node to another. When a new node joins the cluster, the new node initiates a State Snapshot Transfer to synchronize its data with a node that is already part of the cluster.
trans-unit.target: 在状态快照传输(SST)中,集群通过将一个完整的数据副本从一个节点传输到另一个节点来提供节点。当一个新节点加入群集时,新节点会启动状态快照传输,以使其数据与已经是群集一部分的节点同步。

trans-unit.source: In a WHERE clause, RAND() is evaluated each time the WHERE is executed.
trans-unit.target: 在WHERE子句中,每次执行WHERE时都会评估RAND()。

trans-unit.source: In a WITH CHECK OPTION clause for an updatable view, the LOCAL and CASCADED keywords determine the scope of check testing when the view is defined in terms of another view. The LOCAL keyword restricts the CHECK OPTION only to the view being defined. CASCADED causes the checks for underlying views to be evaluated as well. When neither keyword is given, the default is CASCADED.
trans-unit.target: 在可更新视图的 WITH CHECK OPTION 子句中,LOCAL 和 CASCADED 关键字决定了当视图被定义为另一个视图时的检查测试范围。LOCAL关键字仅将CHECK OPTION限制在被定义的视图上。CASCADED 会使底层视图的检查也被评估。当两个关键字都没有给出时,默认为CASCADED。

trans-unit.source: In a debug build, write a debugging log. A typical debug options string is d:t:o,file_name.
trans-unit.target: 在调试版本中，编写调试日志。典型的调试选项字符串是 d:t:o,file_name 。

trans-unit.source: In a deployment with multiple UM nodes the system will round robin requests from the mysqld handling the query to any ExeMgr in the cluster for load balancing. A higher bandwidth network such as 10g or 40g will be of benefit for large result set queries.
trans-unit.target: 在有多个UM节点的部署中,系统将从处理查询的mysqld向集群中的任何ExeMgr循环请求,以实现负载均衡。更高带宽的网络,如10g或40g,对于大的结果集查询会有好处。

trans-unit.source: In a large table, "counting the disk hits" is the important part of performance. Since InnoDB is used, and the PRIMARY KEY (clustered) is used, most operations hit only 1 block.
trans-unit.target: 在一张大表中,"计算磁盘命中率 "是性能的重要部分。由于使用的是InnoDB,而且使用的是PRIMARY KEY(集群),所以大部分操作只打到1个块。

trans-unit.source: In a multi server deployment data will be passed around via TCP/IP networking. At least a 1G network is recommended.
trans-unit.target: 在多服务器部署中,数据将通过TCP/IP网络进行传递。建议至少使用1G的网络。

trans-unit.source: In a multiple PM deployment, the sizing should be based from available physical memory on the PM servers, how much memory to reserve for block caching, and the number of simultaneous join operations that can be expected to run times the average small table join data size.
trans-unit.target: 在多PM部署中,应根据PM服务器上的可用物理内存、为块缓存预留多少内存,以及可预期运行的同时加入操作的数量乘以平均小表加入数据大小来确定大小。

trans-unit.source: In a numeric context (note this is not performing date calculations):
trans-unit.target: 在数字背景下(注意这不是在进行日期计算)。

trans-unit.source: In a query, only one standard index can be used. However, block indexing can combine the restrictions coming from a where clause implying several clustered/sorted columns.
trans-unit.target: 在一个查询中,只能使用一个标准索引。然而,块索引可以结合来自where子句的限制,意味着几个集群/排序的列。

trans-unit.source: In a row based system adding redundant columns adds to the overall query cost but in a columnar system a cost is only occurred if the column is referenced. Therefore additional columns should be created to support different access paths. For instance store a leading portion of a field in one column to allow for faster lookups but additionally store the long form value as another column. Scans on a shorter code or leading portion column will be faster.
trans-unit.target: 在基于行的系统中,增加冗余列会增加整体的查询成本,但在列式系统中,只有当列被引用时才会发生成本。因此应该创建额外的列来支持不同的访问路径。例如将字段的前导部分存储在一列中,以便更快地进行查询,但另外将长表值存储为另一列。在较短的代码或前导部分列上的扫描会更快。

trans-unit.source: In a single server or combined deployment, the sum of NumBlocksPct and TotalUmMemory should typically not exceed 75% of physical memory. With very large memory servers this could be raised but the key point is to leave enough memory for other processes including mysqld.
trans-unit.target: 在单个服务器或组合部署中，NumBlocksPct和TotalUmMemory之和通常不应超过物理内存的75％。对于非常大的内存服务器，这可能会提高，但关键是要为其他进程（包括mysqld）留出足够的内存。

trans-unit.source: In a standard Multi-Node configuration install with more than 1 User Module, the query request are scaled-out across all User Modules using an automatic round-robin distribution functionality. This means that the MariaDB server process will distribute the query requests to all User Modules (ExeMgrs) in the MariaDB ColumnStore system. The ExeMgr will handle the processing of the query request and pass back the resulting data to the initial MariaDB server process, which will in turn provide that result set to the calling client. This round-robin distribution is handled on a session by sessions basis.
trans-unit.target: 在标准的多节点配置安装中,如果有1个以上的用户模块,查询请求会使用自动循环分配功能在所有用户模块中进行缩减。这意味着MariaDB服务器进程将把查询请求分发到MariaDB ColumnStore系统中的所有用户模块(ExeMgrs)。ExeMgr将处理查询请求的处理过程,并将结果数据传回初始MariaDB服务器进程,后者再将该结果集提供给调用客户端。这种循环分配是以会话为单位进行处理的。

trans-unit.source: In a typical installation on a dedicated server, at least 70% of your memory should be assigned to InnoDB buffer pool; sometimes it can even reach 85%. But be very careful: don't assign to the buffer pool more memory than it can allocate. If it cannot allocate memory, InnoDB will use the disk's swap area, which is very bad for performance. If swapping is disabled or the swap area is not big enough, InnoDB will crash. In this case, MariaDB will probably try to restart several times, and each time it will log a message like this:
trans-unit.target: 在专用服务器上的典型安装中，应至少将70％的内存分配给InnoDB缓冲池；有时甚至可以达到85％。但是要非常小心：不要给缓冲池分配比它可以分配的更多的内存。如果无法分配内存，InnoDB将使用磁盘的交换区，这对性能非常不利。如果禁用了交换或交换区域不够大，InnoDB将崩溃。在这种情况下，MariaDB可能会尝试重新启动几次，并且每次它将记录如下消息：

trans-unit.source: In addition installing OpenJDK8 for java support requires the backports repo and the following command:
trans-unit.target: 另外安装支持java的OpenJDK8需要backports repo和以下命令。

trans-unit.source: In addition to MariaDB Server reserved words, ColumnStore has additional reserved words that cannot be used as table names, column names or user defined variables, functions or stored procedure names.
trans-unit.target: 除了MariaDB Server 保留字之外，ColumnStore还具有其他保留字，它们不能用作表名，列名或用户定义的变量，函数或存储过程名。

trans-unit.source: In addition to MariaDB, Table Elimination is found in both Microsoft SQL Se...
trans-unit.target: 除了MariaDB,表消除在Microsoft SQL Se...

trans-unit.source: In addition to MariaDB, Table Elimination is found in both Microsoft SQL Server 2005/2008 and Oracle 11g. Of the two, Microsoft SQL Server 2005/2008 seems to have the most advanced implementation. Oracle 11g has been confirmed to use table elimination but not to the same extent.
trans-unit.target: 除了MariaDB之外,在Microsoft SQL Server 2005/2008和Oracle 11g中都有表消除功能。在两者中,Microsoft SQL Server 2005/2008似乎拥有最先进的实现。Oracle 11g已被证实使用表消除,但程度不一样。

trans-unit.source: In addition to a performance problem, ...
trans-unit.target: 除了性能问题外,...

trans-unit.source: In addition to downloading and building MariaDB, Ports also downloads and build any libraries on which MariaDB depends. Each port it builds will take you to a GUI window where you can select various build options. In the case of MariaDB, this includes various storage engines and specific features you need in your build.
trans-unit.target: 除了下载和联编 MariaDB,Ports 还会下载和联编 MariaDB 所依赖的任何库。它所编译的每个 port 都会带您进入一个 GUI 窗口,您可以在其中选择各种编译选项。就 MariaDB 而言,这包括各种存储引擎和您在联编过程中需要的特定功能。

trans-unit.source: In addition to reading options from the command-line, mysql.server can also read options from option files.
trans-unit.target: 除了从命令行读取选项外， mysql.server 还可以从选项文件读取选项。

trans-unit.source: In addition to reading options from the command-line, mysql can also read options from option files. If an unknown option is provided to mysql in an option file, then it is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 除了从命令行读取选项外， mysql 还可以从选项文件读取选项。如果在选项文件中向 mysql 提供了未知选项，则将其忽略。

trans-unit.source: In addition to reading options from the command-line, Percona XtraBackup can also read options from option files.
trans-unit.target: 除了从命令行读取选项外，Percona XtraBackup还可以从选项文件读取选项。

trans-unit.source: In addition to regular suite directories, mtr supports overlays. An overlay is a directory with the same name as an existing suite, but which is located in a storage engine or plugin directory. For example, storage/myisam/mysql-test/rpl could be a myisam overlay of the rpl suite in mysql-test/suite/rpl. And plugin/daemon_example/mysql-test/demo could be a daemon_example overlay of the demo suite in storage/example/mysql-test/demo. As a special exception, an overlay of the main suite, should be called main, as in storage/pbxt/mysql-test/main.
trans-unit.target: 除常规套件目录外，mtr还支持overlays。一个覆盖是使用相同的名称作为现有套件一个目录，但它位于一个存储引擎或插件目录。例如， storage/myisam/mysql-test/rpl 可以是 mysql-test/suite/rpl 中rpl套件的myisam覆盖。并且 plugin/daemon_example/mysql-test/demo 可以是 storage/example/mysql-test/demo 中演示套件的daemon_example覆盖。作为特殊例外，应将main套件的覆盖称为 main ，如 storage/pbxt/mysql-test/main 。

trans-unit.source: In addition to releasing table locks acquired by the LOCK TABLES statement, the UNLOCK TABLES statement also releases the global read lock acquired by the FLUSH TABLES WITH READ LOCK statement. The FLUSH TABLES WITH READ LOCK statement is very useful for performing backups. See FLUSH for more information about FLUSH TABLES WITH READ LOCK.
trans-unit.target: 除了释放 LOCK TABLES 语句获取的表锁外， UNLOCK TABLES 语句还释放 FLUSH TABLES WITH READ LOCK 语句获取的全局读锁。该 FLUSH TABLES WITH READ LOCK 语句执行备份是非常有用的。有关具有 FLUSH TABLES WITH READ LOCK 更多信息，请参见 FLUSH 。

trans-unit.source: In addition to setting server_audit_output_type, you will have to provide the file path and name of the audit file. This is set in the variable, server_audit_file_path. You can set the file size limit of the log file with the variable, server_audit_file_rotate_size.
trans-unit.target: 除了设置server_audit_output_type之外，您还必须提供审核文件的文件路径和名称。这是在变量server_audit_file_path中设置的。您可以使用变量server_audit_file_rotate_size设置日志文件的文件大小限制。

trans-unit.source: In addition to standard client features, it includes:
trans-unit.target: 除标准客户端功能外,还包括:

trans-unit.source: In addition to sufficient parallelism, it is also necessary to have enough transactions per second wanting to commit that the flush operations are a bottleneck. If no such bottleneck exists (i.e. transactions never or rarely need to wait for the flush of another to complete), then group commit will provide little to no improvement.
trans-unit.target: 除了足够的并行性之外,还需要每秒有足够多的事务想要提交,以至于刷新操作成为瓶颈。如果不存在这样的瓶颈(即事务从来不需要或很少需要等待另一个事务的刷新完成),那么组提交就不会有什么改进。

trans-unit.source: In addition to the "bottled" MariaDB Server package available from Homebrew, you can use Homebrew to build MariaDB from source. This is useful if you want to use a different version of the server or enable some different capabilities that are not included in the bottle package.
trans-unit.target: 除了Homebrew提供的 "瓶装 "MariaDB服务器包,你还可以使用Homebrew从源码中构建MariaDB。如果你想使用不同版本的服务器,或者启用一些瓶装包中没有的不同功能,这很有用。

trans-unit.source: In addition to the common groups, many client programs will also read client options from the option group with the same name as the program. For example, mysqldump also reads client options from the [mysqldump] option group.
trans-unit.target: 除了公用组外，许多客户端程序还将从选项组中读取与该程序同名的客户端选项。例如， mysqldump 还从 [mysqldump] 选项组读取客户端选项。

trans-unit.source: In addition to the default option groups, also read option groups with the given suffix.
trans-unit.target: 除了默认的选项组外,还可以读取带有给定后缀的选项组。

trans-unit.source: In addition to the default option groups, also read option groups with this suffix.
trans-unit.target: 除了默认的选项组,还可以读出带这个后缀的选项组。

trans-unit.source: In addition to the given groups, also read groups with this suffix.
trans-unit.target: 除了给定的组别外,还可以读出带这个后缀的组别。

trans-unit.source: In addition to the given groups, read also groups with this suffix.
trans-unit.target: 除给定的组别外,还应将此后缀的组别改为。

trans-unit.source: In addition to the given option groups, also read groups with this suffix.

trans-unit.source: In addition to the system wide flags, at SQL global and session level, the following system variables exists for managing per user memory limit for joins.
trans-unit.target: 除了系统范围内的标志外,在SQL全局和会话级别,存在以下系统变量用于管理每个用户的内存限制。

trans-unit.source: In addition to the two-table schema, there are a set of Stored Routines to encapsulate the necessary code.
trans-unit.target: 除了两表模式外,还有一套Stored Routine来封装必要的代码。

trans-unit.source: In addition to these, the User Module also runs processes for DMLProc, DDLPrc and cpimport.
trans-unit.target: 除此之外,用户模块还运行DMLProc、DDLPrc和cpimport的进程。

trans-unit.source: In addition to these, you also need to install gnutls or openssl, depending on the TLS implementation you want to use.
trans-unit.target: 除了这些，还需要安装 gnutls 或 openssl ，这取决于要使用的TLS实现。

trans-unit.source: In addition to updates, you can also remove rows that fall within certain time periods.
trans-unit.target: 除了更新,你还可以删除属于特定时间段的行。

trans-unit.source: In addition to using prepared statements from the libmysqld, you can also do prepared statements from any client by using the text based prepared statement interface.
trans-unit.target: 除了使用来自libmysqld的准备好的语句外,还可以通过使用基于文本的准备好的语句界面从任何客户端做准备好的语句。

trans-unit.source: In addition you should run the upgrade stored procedure below for a major version upgrade.
trans-unit.target: 此外,你应该运行下面的升级存储过程进行主要版本升级。

trans-unit.source: In addition, an optional special column was added whose name is given by the RankCol option. This column contains the name of the source column from which the value of the OccurCol column comes from. It permits here to know the race of the pets whose number is given in number.
trans-unit.target: 此外，还添加了一个可选的特殊列，其名称由RankCol选项指定。此列包含OccurCol列的值所来自的源列的名称。它允许在这里知道以数字给出数字的宠物的种族。

trans-unit.source: In addition, changing the timestamp system variable with a SETtimestamp statement affects the value returned by NOW() but not by SYSDATE(). This means that timestamp settings in the binary log have no effect on invocations of SYSDATE().
trans-unit.target: 此外，使用SET timestamp 语句更改timestamp系统变量将影响NOW（）返回的值，而不影响SYSDATE（）返回的值。这意味着二进制日志中的时间戳设置对SYSDATE（）的调用没有影响。

trans-unit.source: In addition, it can't handle blob data types and only supports multi inputs to one block if the input field names are equal for all input sources.
trans-unit.target: 此外,它不能处理blob数据类型,只有在所有输入源的输入字段名都相同的情况下,才支持多输入到一个块。

trans-unit.source: In addition, some package managers support the use a build dependency command. When using this command, the package manager retrieves a list of build dependencies and install them for you, making it much easier to get started on the compile. The actual option varies, depending on the distribution you use.
trans-unit.target: 此外,一些软件包管理器支持使用构建依赖命令。当使用这个命令时,包管理器会检索一个构建依赖列表,并为你安装它们,使你更容易开始编译。实际的选项有所不同,这取决于你使用的发行版。

trans-unit.source: In addition, the server can be configured to verify checksums in two other places.
trans-unit.target: 此外,服务器还可以配置为在另外两个地方验证校验和。

trans-unit.source: In addition, you must adhere the following rule for transactional tables:
trans-unit.target: 此外,对于事务性表,你必须遵守以下规则。

trans-unit.source: In all cases, any action on logs happens at the exact moment of the dump.
trans-unit.target: 在所有情况下,对日志的任何操作都发生在转储的确切时刻。

trans-unit.source: In all cases, it is safer to drop and re-create the table (outward tables) or to make another one from the table that must be modified.
trans-unit.target: 在所有的情况下,比较安全的做法是放弃并重新创建表(外向表),或者从必须修改的表中再做一个表。

trans-unit.source: In all cases, the transaction log is flushed at least once every second. This means that it is only every possible to loose database changes that occurred within the last second.
trans-unit.target: 在所有情况下,事务日志至少每秒钟刷新一次。这意味着,只有在最后一秒内发生的数据库变化才有可能被删除。

trans-unit.source: In all distributions, the %I is the MariaDB instance name. In the above node1 case, it would use the option file at the path/etc/my.cnf.d/mynode1.cnf for RHEL-like distributions and /etc/mysql/conf.d/mynode1.cnf for Debian-like distributions.
trans-unit.target: 在所有发行版中， %I 是MariaDB实例名称。在上面的 node1 的情况下，它会使用选项文件的路径 /etc/my.cnf.d/mynode1.cnf 为RHEL状分布和 /etc/mysql/conf.d/mynode1.cnf 为Debian状分布。

trans-unit.source: In all macros the first two parameters are name of the attribute as should be used in SQL in the CREATE TABLE statement, and the name of the corresponding member of the ha_table_option_struct structure.
trans-unit.target: 在所有宏中，前两个参数是 CREATE TABLE 语句在SQL中应使用的属性名称，以及 ha_table_option_struct 结构的相应成员的名称。

trans-unit.source: In all of the scenarios below, the thread pool implementation prefers to wake up a sleeping worker thread that already exists in the thread group, rather than to create a new thread.
trans-unit.target: 在下面的所有方案中，线程池实现都希望唤醒线程组中已经存在的睡眠工作线程，而不是创建新线程。

trans-unit.source: In all other cases, if a NOT NULL column without a DEFAULT value is not referenced, an empty value will be inserted (for example, 0 for INTEGER columns and '' for CHAR columns). See NULL Values in MariaDB:Inserting for examples.
trans-unit.target: 在所有其他情况下，如果未引用没有 DEFAULT 值的 NOT NULL 列，则将插入一个空值（例如，对于 INTEGER 列为 0，对于 CHAR 列为”）。有关示例，请参见MariaDB：Inserting中的NULL值。

trans-unit.source: In all other cases, the arguments are compared as case-insensitive strings.
trans-unit.target: 在所有其他情况下,参数都作为大小写不敏感的字符串进行比较。

trans-unit.source: In all these cases the evaluation of IN is performed as described in the previous paragraph via index lookups into the materialized subquery. In all remaining cases when NULL cannot be substituted with FALSE, it is not possible to use index lookups. This is not a limitation in the server, but a consequence of the NULL semantics in the ANSI SQL standard.
trans-unit.target: 在所有这些情况下,IN的评估都是通过索引查询到具体化的子查询,如前一段所述。在所有剩下的情况下,当NULL不能被FALSE代替时,就不能使用索引查找。这不是服务器的限制,而是ANSI SQL标准中NULL语义的结果。

trans-unit.source: In all these special cases, NULL is equivalent to the DEFAULT keyword.
trans-unit.target: 在所有这些特殊情况下， NULL 等同于 DEFAULT 关键字。

trans-unit.source: In all versions of MariaDB, this sets sql_mode that is equivalent to:
trans-unit.target: 在所有版本的MariaDB中，这将设置 sql_mode 等效于：

trans-unit.source: In almost all cases mysql_upgrade should be able to convert your tables, without you having to dump and restore your data.
trans-unit.target: 在几乎所有情况下，mysql_upgrade都应该能够转换表，而不必转储和还原数据。

trans-unit.source: In almost all cases, the suite directory name is the suite name. A notable historical exception is the main suite, which is located directly in the mysql-test directory.
trans-unit.target: 在几乎所有情况下，套件目录名称都是套件名称。一个主要的历史例外是主套件，它直接位于 mysql-test 目录中。

trans-unit.source: In an INSERT ... ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE statement, you can use the VALUES(col_name) function in the UPDATE clause to refer to column values from the INSERT portion of the statement. In other words, VALUES(col_name) in the UPDATE clause refers to the value of col_name that would be inserted, had no duplicate-key conflict occurred. This function is especially useful in multiple-row inserts.
trans-unit.target: 在INSERT ... ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE语句中，可以在UPDATE子句中使用 VALUES(col_name) 函数从该语句的INSERT部分引用列值。换句话说， UPDATE 子句中的 VALUES(col_name) 指的是在没有重复键冲突的情况下将要插入的col_name的值。此功能在多行插入中特别有用。

trans-unit.source: In an Incremental State Transfer (SST), the cluster provisions nodes by transferring a node's missing writesets from one node to another. When a new node joins the cluster, the new node initiates a Incremental State Transfer to synchronize its data with a node that is already part of the cluster.
trans-unit.target: 在增量状态转移(SST)中,集群通过将一个节点缺失的写入集从一个节点转移到另一个节点来提供节点。当一个新节点加入集群时,新节点会启动增量状态转移,以使其数据与已经是集群一部分的节点同步。

trans-unit.source: In an SST, the cluster provisions nodes by transferring a full data copy from one node to another.
trans-unit.target: 在SST中,集群通过将一个完整的数据副本从一个节点转移到另一个节点来提供节点。

trans-unit.source: In an asynchronous replication setup where a master replicates to a galera node acting as slave, parallel replication (slave-parallel-threads > 1) on slave is currently not supported (see MDEV-6860).
trans-unit.target: 在主服务器复制到充当从服务器的galera节点的异步复制设置中，当前不支持从服务器上的并行复制（从服务器-并行线程> 1）（请参阅MDEV-6860）。

trans-unit.source: In an integer range FOR loop, MariaDB will compare the lower bound and upper bound values, and assign the lower bound value to a counter. If REVERSE is not specified, and the upper bound value is greater than or equal to the counter, the counter will be incremented and the statement will continue, after which the loop is entered again. If the upper bound value is greater than the counter, the loop will be exited.
trans-unit.target: 在一个整数范围的FOR循环中,MariaDB会比较下界和上界的值,并将下界的值分配给一个计数器。如果没有指定REVERSE,并且上界值大于或等于计数器,那么计数器将被递增,语句将继续,之后再次进入循环。如果上界值大于计数器,则退出循环。

trans-unit.source: In any case, doing what is "right" for the business logic overrides other considerations.
trans-unit.target: 在任何情况下,做对业务逻辑 "正确 "的事,都会凌驾于其他考虑之上。

trans-unit.source: In any case, the location of the remote table can be changed in the Federated server without having to alter all the tables using this server.
trans-unit.target: 在任何情况下,都可以在Federated服务器中改变远程表的位置,而不必改变使用该服务器的所有表。

trans-unit.source: In between (hot/popular ids, etc) -- count as something in between
trans-unit.target: 介于两者之间(热门/流行ID等)--算作介于两者之间的东西。

trans-unit.source: In binary files, numeric fields and record length can be aligned on 4-or-8-byte boundaries to optimize performance on certain processors. This can be modified in the OPTION_LIST with an "align" option ("packed" meaning align=1 is the default).
trans-unit.target: 在二进制文件中，数字字段和记录长度可以在4或8字节边界上对齐，以优化某些处理器上的性能。可以在OPTION_LIST中使用“ align”选项进行修改（“ packed”表示默认为 align=1 ）。

trans-unit.source: In both Jessie and Stretch there is also a mariadb-server package which is a MariaDB-specific analog to the mysql-server package. In Jessie this package depends on mariadb-server-10.0 and in Stretch this package depends on mariadb-server-10.1 (the same as the default-mysql-server package).
trans-unit.target: 在Jessie和Stretch中，还有一个 mariadb-server 软件包，它是特定于MariaDB的 mysql-server 软件包的类似物。在Jessie中，此程序包取决于 mariadb-server-10.0 ，在Stretch中，此程序包取决于 mariadb-server-10.1 （与 default-mysql-server 程序包相同）。

trans-unit.source: In both cases, after correcting the error, remake the indexes with the OPTIMIZE TABLE command.
trans-unit.target: 在这两种情况下，纠正错误后，都可以使用OPTIMIZE TABLE命令重新制作索引。

trans-unit.source: In both cases, when our tables become huge and we don't need to store all historical data any more, we can drop the oldest partitions in this way:
trans-unit.target: 在这两种情况下,当我们的表变得巨大,我们不需要再存储所有的历史数据时,我们可以通过这种方式放弃最老的分区。

trans-unit.source: In both of the above cases Country will be scanned first and for each matching country (one in this case) all rows in City will be checked for a match. As there is only one matching country this will be faster than the original query.
trans-unit.target: 在上述两种情况下，都将首先扫描“ Country 然后针对每个匹配的国家/地区（在本例中为一个），检查“ City 所有行是否匹配。由于只有一个匹配的国家/地区，因此比原始查询要快。

trans-unit.source: In case any user mapping is performed, the original user name is returned by the SQL function USER(), while the authenticated user name is returned by the SQL function CURRENT_USER(). The latter actually defines what privileges are available to a connected user.
trans-unit.target: 如果执行任何用户映射，则原始用户名由SQL函数 USER() 返回，而经过身份验证的用户名由SQL函数 CURRENT_USER() 返回。后者实际上定义了对连接的用户可用的特权。

trans-unit.source: In case of error, warnings are replaced by messages sent to stderr.
trans-unit.target: 如果出现错误,警告会被发送到stderr的信息所取代。

trans-unit.source: In case we separate historical data from recent data, we will probably need to take regular backups of one partition, not the whole table.
trans-unit.target: 如果我们把历史数据和近期数据分开,我们可能需要定期备份一个分区,而不是整个表。

trans-unit.source: In case we want to destroy a container, perhaps because the image does not suit our needs, we can stop it and then run:
trans-unit.target: 假如我们想毁掉一个容器,或许因为图像不适合我们的需求,我们可以停止它,然后运行。

trans-unit.source: In case you have a serious problem and have to use --safe-recover:
trans-unit.target: 如果您遇到严重问题，必须使用 --safe-recover ：

trans-unit.source: In cases of failover where the underlying storage data is externally mounted, (such as with EC2 EBS or SAN), the mapping of data blocks to Performance Modules is re-organized across working Performance Modules, and the Extent Maps on the User Modules are re-evaluated, so that queries are sent to the appropriate nodes. That is, the DB Roots attached to the failed Performance Module are attached to working Performance Modules. This process is transparent to the user and does not require manual intervention.
trans-unit.target: 在底层存储数据是外部挂载的故障切换情况下,(如使用EC2 EBS或SAN),数据块到Performance Modules的映射会在工作Performance Modules上重新组织,用户模块上的Extent Maps也会被重新评估,从而将查询发送到相应的节点。也就是说,连接到失败的性能模块上的DB Roots被连接到工作的性能模块上。这个过程对用户是透明的,不需要人工干预。

trans-unit.source: In cases where a valid XPath expression does not match any text nodes in a valid XML fragment, (including the implicit /text() expression), the EXTRACTVALUE() function returns an empty string.
trans-unit.target: 如果有效的XPath表达式与有效的XML片段中的任何文本节点都不匹配（包括隐式的 /text() 表达式），则 EXTRACTVALUE() 函数将返回一个空字符串。

trans-unit.source: In cases where the InnoDB system tablespace has grown too large, the process to reduce it in size is a little more complicated than increasing the size. MariaDB does not allow you to remove data from the tablespace file itself. Instead you need to delete the tablespace files themselves, then restore the database from backups.
trans-unit.target: 在InnoDB系统表空间增长过大的情况下,缩小表空间大小的过程要比增加表空间大小复杂一些。MariaDB不允许你从表空间文件本身删除数据。相反,你需要删除表空间文件本身,然后从备份中恢复数据库。

trans-unit.source: In cases where the storage engine supports ALTER TABLE... DISABLE KEYS statements, the LOAD DATA INFILE statement automatically disables indexes during the execution.
trans-unit.target: 如果存储引擎支持 ALTER TABLE... DISABLE KEYS 语句，则 LOAD DATA INFILE 语句在执行期间自动禁用索引。

trans-unit.source: In cases where you don't mind restarting the server or you are setting the server up from scratch for the first time, you may find it more convenient to configure TLS options for replication through an option file. This is done the same way as it is for other clients. The specific options that you would need to set would depend on whether you want one-way TLS or two-way TLS, and whether you want to verify the server certificate. See Securing Connections for Client and Server: Enabling TLS for MariaDB Clients for more information.
trans-unit.target: 如果您不介意重新启动服务器或第一次从头开始设置服务器，则可能会发现配置TLS选项以通过选项文件进行复制更为方便。这样做的方式与其他客户端相同。您需要设置的特定选项取决于您是单向TLS还是双向TLS，以及是否要验证服务器证书。有关更多信息，请参阅保护客户端和服务器的连接：为MariaDB客户端启用TLS。

trans-unit.source: In cases where you have existing Aria tables that you would like to encrypt, the process is a little more complicated. Unlike InnoDB, Aria does not utilize background encryption threads to automatically perform encryption changes (see MDEV-18971 about that). Therefore, to encrypt existing tables, you need to identify each table that needs to be encrypted, and then you need to manually rebuild each table.
trans-unit.target: 如果您有要加密的现有Aria表，则过程会稍微复杂一些。与InnoDB不同，Aria不使用后台加密线程来自动执行加密更改（有关信息，请参阅MDEV-18971）。因此，要加密现有表，您需要确定每个需要加密的表，然后需要手动重建每个表。

trans-unit.source: In cases where you have two servers using different character-sets, using SELECT INTO OUTFILE to transfer data from one to the other can have unexpected results. To ensure that MariaDB correctly interprets the escape sequences, use the CHARACTER SET clause on both the SELECT INTO OUTFILE statement and the subsequent LOAD DATA INFILE statement.
trans-unit.target: 如果您有两台服务器使用不同的字符集，则使用 SELECT INTO OUTFILE 将数据从一个服务器传输到另一个服务器可能会产生意外结果。为确保MariaDB正确解释转义序列，请在 SELECT INTO OUTFILE 语句和后续的 LOAD DATA INFILE 语句上使用 CHARACTER SET 子句。

trans-unit.source: In cases where you load data from a file into a table that already contains data and has a Primary Key, you may encounter issues where the statement attempts to insert a row with a Primary Key that already exists. When this happens, the statement fails with Error 1064, protecting the data already on the table. In cases where you want MariaDB to overwrite duplicates, use the REPLACE keyword.
trans-unit.target: 如果您将数据从文件加载到已经包含数据并具有主键的表中，则在语句尝试插入具有已存在的主键的行时可能会遇到问题。发生这种情况时，该语句将失败，并显示错误1064，从而保护表中已经存在的数据。如果您希望MariaDB覆盖重复项，请使用 REPLACE 关键字。

trans-unit.source: In cases where you need to back up a number of databases or specific tables in a database, you may find the syntax for the --databases and --databases-exclude options a little cumbersome. Using this option you can set the path to a file listing the databases or databases and tables you want to back up.
trans-unit.target: 如果需要备份数据库中的许多数据库或特定表，则 --databases 和 --databases-exclude 选项的语法可能会有些麻烦。使用此选项，您可以将文件的路径设置为列出要备份的数据库或数据库和表的文件。

trans-unit.source: In cases where you want to back up most databases on a server or tables on a database, but not all, you can set the specific databases or tables you don't want to back up using the --databases-exclude option.
trans-unit.target: 如果要备份服务器上的大多数数据库或数据库中的表（但不是全部），则可以使用 --databases-exclude 选项设置不想备份的特定数据库或表。

trans-unit.source: In cases where you want to encrypt tables manually or set the specific encryption key, use InnoDB.
trans-unit.target: 如果要手动加密表或设置特定的加密密钥，请使用InnoDB。

trans-unit.source: In certain cases it makes sense to run a specific test or a group of tests several times with different server settings. This can be done using so-called combinations. Combinations are groups of settings that are used alternatively. A combinations file defines these alternatives using my.cnf syntax, for example
trans-unit.target: 在某些情况下，使用不同的服务器设置多次运行一个特定的测试或一组测试是有意义的。这可以使用所谓的combinations来完成。组合是可替代使用的设置组。组合文件使用 my.cnf 语法定义了这些替代方法，例如

trans-unit.source: In certain cases it may be necessary to override the choice of the optimizer. Typically this is needed for benchmarking or testing purposes, or to mimic the behavior of an older version of the server, or if the optimizer made a poor choice.
trans-unit.target: 在某些情况下,可能需要覆盖优化器的选择。通常情况下,这是出于基准测试或测试的目的,或者是为了模仿旧版本服务器的行为,或者是优化器做出了错误的选择。

trans-unit.source: In certain cases, a statement may not be deterministic, and therefore not safe for replication. If MariaDB determines that an unsafe statement has been executed, then it will issue a warning. For example:
trans-unit.target: 在某些情况下，语句可能不是确定性的，因此复制不安全。如果MariaDB确定已执行了不安全的语句，则它将发出警告。例如：

trans-unit.source: In columnar storage, similar data is stored within each column file, which allows for excellent compressibility. While the actual space savings depends on the randomness of the data and the number of distinct values that exists, many data-sets show compression rates saving between 65% and 95% space.
trans-unit.target: 在列式存储中,类似的数据被存储在每个列式文件中,这使得压缩性非常好。虽然实际节省的空间取决于数据的随机性和存在的不同值的数量,但许多数据集显示压缩率可以节省65%到95%的空间。

trans-unit.source: In combination with start* and no test name, drops arguments to mysqld except those specified with --mysqld (if any).
trans-unit.target: 与start *和无测试名称结合使用时，将参数删除到mysqld中，除非使用 --mysqld 指定（如果有的话）。

trans-unit.source: In contrast to SQL_MODE, stored programs use the current user's OLD_MODEvalue.
trans-unit.target: 与SQL_MODE相比，存储的程序使用当前用户的 OLD_MODE 值。

trans-unit.source: In contrast, MariaDB Server is dynamically linked with the system's OpenSSL libraries in .deb packages provided by MariaDB Foundation and MariaDB Corporation.
trans-unit.target: 相反，MariaDB Server 在由MariaDB Foundation和MariaDB Corporation提供的 .deb 软件包中与系统的OpenSSL库动态链接。

trans-unit.source: In contrast, MariaDB's clients and utilities, libmysqlclient, and MariaDB Connector/C are dynamically linked with the system's OpenSSL libraries in .deb packages provided by MariaDB Foundation's and MariaDB Corporation's repositories.
trans-unit.target: 相比之下，MariaDB的公司客户和公共事业，的libmysqlclient和MariaDB的连接器/ C与系统的动态链接的OpenSSL库中 .deb 通过MariaDB的基金会和MariaDB的公司的资料库提供的软件包。
